review_text: We enjoyed our stay! Stacey was a great host and even included a welcome note and snacks! The property also has a lot of amenities that we had free access to (pool, mini golf, ping pong, etc). Unit is on the first floor and there was lots of parking near to the unit. You could hear people walking in the above unit, but it didn't bother us. Other than that, it was very quiet. There were also useful extra items in the unit such as small cooler, beach chairs, beach towels, two standing fans, pack and play for baby, etc. Very central location and close to Kapa'a town, which has a lot of restaurants. We had a small issue during our stay and Stacey was quick to respond and provide a resolution. We appreciated her attentiveness to make our stay an enjoyable one. We hope to return again!
This rental exceeded our expectations and Stacey seemed to have thought of everything to make our stay comfortable.
Very very nice! I’ll come back someday!

This is our third time staying here. We keep coming back because it’s the perfect location. Central to both south and north shores + walkable to get coffee, lunch, shopping, etc. You can walk to watch the sunrise at the beach and it’s just steps from the pool. Stacey keeps it nice and clean and stocked with all the supplies you need!

Central location in Kauai, ideal starting point for excursions in all directions. The location directly on the beach was also great for walks along the coast.
The condo is on the first floor and was super well decorated.
It's a little clairvoyant: if you shower upstairs, then the rushing from the water is clearly audible. But I didn't have a problem with that.
I'd love to go back here anytime.

Loved the apartment. Very clean on arrival and everything is in new to great condition. I have never stayed in any rented house that had as much as this place did. You didn’t need to go the store for the annoying 1oz of cooking oil, salt and pepper for example. It had all the basics and then some, including a welcome basket of snacks. It’s also the first rental that has sharp knives that don’t bend, it might seem trivial but was a nice surprise for people who like to cook.
It’s so easy to walk or bike anywhere and there’s an abundance of restaurants very close. Would gladly stay again.
You can hear the people walking above but it did not affect our stay. Loved it

Stacey’s condo felt like home and was easily walkable to town! Stacey made it super easy to check in, I had all the information I needed before arriving and had the resort receptionist, Stacey and an on island point of contact if I needed anything during the stay. The island is absolutely stunning and the condo’s location made it so easy to explore all the trails, restaurants and beaches Kauai has to offer without wasting too much time driving there.

Stacey’s condo was well stocked with all the necessities and more. The place was very clean and the location was prime. Very short walk to old town Kapa’a, with great food options, coffee shops and shopping.
We were welcomed to the condo with a personal note from Stacey and treats for us to enjoy. The complex amenities were great and the staff very friendly.
Perfect place for young families!

The place was great, the kitchen very well equiped, the bathroom was big, and the living room has a nice view to the yard with palm trees. The apartment is also equiped with beach umbrella and towels for for the beach that we used a lot. The location was also very good, lot of nice places to eat around! Would definetely recommend!
Everything was as advertised, no complaints. Stacy is very accommodating.

Stacey's place was one of our best-ever vacation rentals. She was extremely responsive prior to our trip and let us know that she was available to answer any questions we might have during our stay. Her rental was stocked with all advertised amenities plus a number of welcome surprises. The condo was the perfect location to get to the beach, the 7+ mile bike path, and lots of restaurants. We would not hesitate to stay with her again the next time we might find ourselves in Kapa'a.

Overall, we liked the place. The coffee maker was off the hook. I may think about buying one. The beds were awful. The bed and the fold out couch squeaked to the point that you could hear someone rolling over in bed. We cooked a pizza only to find out there were no pizza pan or pizza cutter. The number of dinner plates could have been better. Would like to have had two umbrellas. Being on the first floor was a mistake for us. The first floor is quite noisy. The people above us were getting up a 5 in the morning. The cleaning people, which they came several times made a lot of noise moving furniture around. Our sleep was effected by the things and the chickens, and I know several of these things the owner cannot do anything about, but in the end they did affect the overall feeling.

I cannot begin to list all the positive reasons to stay here. Great suite with everything you would ever need, great area central to everything. Pool area was wonderful and the Sandy beaches just a short walk away we’re incredible. You would not be disappointed renting this property.

This condo has it all. The location is perfect, walking distance to shops and restaurants, and the bike path and ocean are just a few steps away. The resort amenities are fun and add a nice element to the experience. Even though it's a condo, it's a resort so the best of the both! The condo is well stocked with helpful items like beach towels/chairs, ample quality linens, kitchen items, and useful items like spices and shampoo/soap. etc. The space is well laid out with dining table, sofa and large TV in living area, and a nice sized one-bedroom down the hall. My family of three was very comfortable and enjoyed our time. Check-in and check-out couldn't have been any easier and communication with Stacey was super fast and comprehensive. We will absolutely book again for our next trip.
Stacey was a great host and the condo was very nice. Convenient to many attractions, stores, and restaurants.
Stacey is an awesome host. This place is great but if you are bothered by people making a noise upstairs then this isn’t for you. Apart from that this is a 10 star place.

Wonderful stay and host! very well stocked for all living needs and fun activities. Clean, convenient, exceptional communication, and very nice touches like welcome snacks and drinks. Can't wait to come back!

Location was in the middle of everything with a beach, restaurants, and shops walking distance away, then much more to see with drives to the north or south of the island. It was very clean with a comfortable bed plus easy parking directly outside the unit. The unit is located in Pono Kai Resort so there are many added amenities from that as well such as a pool and fitness center.

My wife and I stayed at Stacey’s place for three weeks and it was everything we had hoped for and more. The unit has nice upgrades (cookware, cutlery, TV size) and had a lot of good amenities (boogie boards, beach chairs, plenty of extra beach and shower towels, fans, first aid kit.) She also left a nice welcoming basket with snacks. The location of her place is the best we have found and this is our 14th year coming to Kauai. You are 45 minutes from the north shore or 45 minutes from the south shore so you can explore all of Kauai. There is a bike/walking path right behind the property on the beach and it is perfect for walks morning, day and night. Also there are plenty of restaurants and shops within a 5-10 minute walk in Kapaa. Stacey was very quick to respond and was very friendly. We would definitely stay at her place again.
A perfect stay at Stacey's. No neighbors' sound sounds have gone up to us. Everything was as described in the listing on an enchanting site. I would go back without hesitation!

The location is a close walk to the beach which was beautiful. The host is great as she left snacks and a fun treat in the fridge. She provided all the necessities you need for a trip to the beach. The only downfall was the walls are pretty thin and you can hear your neighbors and people outside. This didn’t factor in to our stay much as we stayed active and out on the beach often during the day enough to pass right out at night.

Amazing place! Perfect location to the beach and to town/restaurants!! The place was super clean and right across from the pool so it was very convenient. It was a very short walk to town which has a ton of restaurants and shopping! We will definitely stay here again
Great stay!
Great place to stay!

Me and my wife visited Stacey’s condo as part of our late honeymoon/ 1 year wedding anniversary. We had a great time! The condo is very nice and clean, and we loved the location. The town of Kapa’a it’s self is great, lots of good restaurants and convenient to getting to the other parts of the island as well. Beach access is also easily walkable from the condo. The beach gear like towels and chairs, boogie boards and even a couple pieces of snorkeling gear were super nice to have as well!
The only downside to the condo is if you are noise sensitive you may have trouble. You can easily hear your neighbors above and beside you, and while it didn’t bother us much if you’re a light sleeper or would be bothered by that it could be an issue. If you plan on using the washer/dryer make sure you have change or small bills (there is a coin machine on the resort.) All in all we really enjoyed our stay and recommend it!

Awesome stay!
Stacey was super responsive and helpful, even after checkout.
Location was perfect in the middle of the island, close to airport, walking distance to beach, stores, restaurants.
Could not have asked for a better stay, other than a longer vacation to enjoy.

Our stay in Kauai was absolutely amazing. Stacey made sure the place was stocked with everything you could need for an adventurous stay including great beach gear and accessories. Overall, this was an amazing place to stay but out of transparency, the main bedroom will get hot since the A/C doesn’t reach the room and depending on the guests on the second floor it could be very noisy, even at time. The resort itself had great amenities and we enjoyed how walkable the location was to the nearby town.

The host is amazing at communicating. She was responsive. The inside of the condo was really clean and spacious for the price. My only hesitation of giving this flawless ratings is something out of the host control: the noise. If you’re looking for a peaceful stay, this won’t feel like it. It’s on the 1st floor and you hear everything above you. The people staying above me stomped ALL day long - regardless of time. Woke me up at 615am walking around the bedroom 2 of my 3 nights. Other than that, convenient location too.

Kauai is amazing and this place is the best. It is an AirBNB in a resort right on the beach and walking/biking path. The location is mid-island so easy access to all areas. The accomodations were very clean and comfortable. Host solved a minor issue very quickly. Can't say enough about this place, it's the best!

Probably one of the best Airbnb experiences we’ve had in a very long time. Check in was easy and comfortable!
The apartment is so cozy, super clean and has everything you may need plus so many small, thoughtful touches we did not even expect and we truly appreciate.
The area worked perfect for us, and this was such a great experience! Would highly recommend!

This place is absolute wonderful. The condo was super clean and just so perfect for my husband and I on our honeymoon. Stacey has the place stocked!!! The beach chairs and little cooler was such a bonus!! The Pono Kai was awesome as well - the BBQs came in handy for cooking. We loved how close to the beach and town it was. Close enough to walk to grab a drink or dinner in town. I recommend the pono market for good Hawaiian plates and jimmys for a good drink/view! The only small downside was the noise from our neighbors above the bedroom. You could hear every step they took even when they woke up at 6 am. So just be aware for super light sleepers like myself!

Centrally located, clean, and perfect for a Kauai visit. Walking distance to old downtown Kapaa and any bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and shopping. You can walk along the bike path or road into town. If you don’t feel like driving far to a beach, you can walk right over to a beach just outside of the condo. Well stocked with kitchen items, and beach chairs, towels, and umbrella. Being on the bottom level is lovely to have the grounds just outside your lanai door.
Loved staying in Stacey’s beautiful condo. Really made me feel at home and had special touches to the room to help us feel welcomed. Would highly recommend staying here.

Stacey is very kind and understanding.
She responds quickly, and resolve any issues if we had any.
She is a great host❣️😊

This is a great place to stay in Kapa'a. The resort is right on the beach, with a bunch of cool amenities like a pool, hot tub, giant chessboard, croquet, hammocks, BBQ grills, and others. The condo itself has everything you need for a home away from home. The appliances are all new. The atmosphere is terrific, highly recommend it.

We spent 8 nights at Stacey’s and loved our stay. First, a nice note and complimentary snacks & beverages welcomed us. The kitchen and bathroom were beautifully updated and modernized. We loved having a full size kitchen, living room, and dining area. After dropping over $100 just on breakfast (for 2) the first two days, we cooked our own breakfasts after that which saved a lot of money and was far more relaxing. New ceiling fans helped circulate the AC so we could sleep comfortably (Tip: sleep with the fans on and the BR door open.) I was pleasantly surprised to find beach chairs, beach umbrella, and beach towels provided. We definitely needed those (especially the umbrella!). The grounds are gorgeous, and we loved walking the adjacent bike path along the ocean. Parking was easy and free, the location was convenient to both north and south shore, and we loved walking into town almost every day. We also used the onsite laundry. Can’t wait to go back!

This is our second time returning to this Airbnb. It has been updated by Stacy since our last stay in 2021. We always find a very convenient location. very close and walkable to a lot of restaurants and stores. The beaches only steps away. We love the amenities and thanks Stacey for stocking it with coffee and snacks.

Stacey was always quick to respond to all of our questions and an excellent host. The unit was well stocked and clean.
We had not previously rented an AirBNB unit in a resort before, only single family homes, so were unaware of what amazing amenities could be in store for us. This resort offers a long list of amenities, you could spend your entire vacation walking to shops and restaurants closeby and also engaged in amentieis right here on the property! Bocche ball, mini golf, croquet, games to check out, pool, hot tub, pickle ball, outdoor chess game, picnic tables hammacs and grills placed throughout the property not to forget the paved coastal trail that goes by the resort. And an herb garden to add to your home prepared meals!
Enjoyable location for a beautiful vacation!

We loved staying here! Great location next to the beach and tons of activities at the resort. Lots of good food within walking distance and optimally located on the island to get wherever you want to explore. Stacey was very responsive for communication and was a fantastic host! Would absolutely stay here again.

We loved it here! Beautiful location right next to the beach and Stacey made our stay very welcoming. We had a beautiful welcoming gift with snacks and drinks.
We were located close to different shops and restaurants.
One thing that can make the place better is having an air conditioner in the bedroom. The bedroom does get hot at night, so we just slept in the pull down bed in the living room.
Overall great spot and would definitely be back.
right next to the beach, close to Lihue
We enjoyed our stay a lot! Great instructions from the host and lots of small amenities that made our stay wonderful.
Great location! Had everything I needed. Stacey was quick to respond. Would definitely stay here again.

Great location, communication.
Comfortable, clean.
Highly recommended.

This condo was perfect! It faces the pool and has a great lawn area with a hammock right outside. The beach is a short five minute walk away. It's also walking distance to all the shops and restaurants in Kapa'a. Be sure to try Kountry Kitchen for the best Loco Moco on the island and Java Kai has great coffee. The condo was just right for the two of us to have a nice relaxing trip. We loved that we could come back after a day of adventures and lounge in the pool or hot tub.
Stacey's is a great find, close to many attractions, and the grounds are beautifully landscaped.

Torrey’s place was perfect! Clean and comfortable with a beautiful view and lots of towels to take to the beach. Great shower pressure and temperature, peaceful and relaxing — would definitely stay again!

Amazing place with great ocean views! It was also in the perfect location for us to be able to easily explore both the North and South Shore.
Check in was seamless and easy, and the place was spacious and very clean. There was also a handy book full of lots of local recommendations.
We would definitely stay here again if we were to ever come back!

We had a lovely stay for a few nights. The location was convenient access to all parts of the island we wanted to drive to and the views were beautiful to wake up to every morning. They provided everything we needed and we enjoyed borrowing snorkel gear.

This studio is amazing!! The views are incredible, the multiple windows allow for a great breeze all day and night! The studio is in a nice, quiet/safe neighborhood, in a central location in Kauai. The provided amenities such as washer and dryer, snorkel/beach gear is such an added bonus! We will definitely be back when we are back to Kauai next!
Couldn’t have found a better place to stay! Has everything you could need plus an awesome view with all the windows:) We loved it!!
I'd give this place more than 5 stars if I could! It's wonderful. Great neighborhood, amazing views, clean, airy, and simply relaxing. Fantastic hosts.

10/10 would recommend! When I return to Kauai someday, I will definitely look up these girls!! The space was clean, cozy, and peaceful. Great location on the island. The girls are so friendly and made us feel like ohana!

We stayed 4 nights in the apartment! Everything was so nicely arranged and we felt so welcomed with cute little notes with our name on it. Also, there were plenty of products in case we have forgotten anything. The view to the ocean is simply amazing. In the last night, there was a heavy thunderstorm which was really scary but we were happy that the apartment was on a mountain so flooding did not really affect us.
Thank you for letting us stay in your apartment! Highly recommend it to anyone going to Kauai!
I had an amazing stay at the Torrey’s place!

Torrey and Sarah definitely go above and beyond for their guests! They were super accommodating when we needed to reschedule our trip. We received clear and prompt instructions before arrival and felt very welcomed when we got there and during our stay. What a great view! We enjoyed starting our day watching the sunrise from bed and having coffee on the deck overlooking the ocean. We appreciated their personalized recommendations for dining and activities on the island. They made it even better by providing all of the things you would want to enjoy a day at the beach. Highly recommend staying here!

If you ever have a chance to stay here, you should! Beautiful view, comfortable and has everything you need for a long or short stay. They provided all of the things you need. Friendly and respectful of your space. Easy to get ahold of when needed! Will always stay here whenever we can.

Very clean and comfortable! Great place to stay because it’s a very central location to activities both north and south. Super clean with beautiful views! Responsive host w great instructions. Great value! Would stay here again!

We loved it! It’s clear Torrey and Sarah put a lot of thought and effort into hosting - great local recommendations, fully stocked with beach towels, toiletries, and snorkel gear available to use. The space itself was clean and cozy, and the balcony had great views of the ocean and mountains more inland - perfect place to have a coffee as the sun rises. We’ll definitely try to book here again in the future!

One of our favorite b and b airs of the living room with exceptional sea and mountain views! We even had trouble leaving in the morning. Otherwise, the accommodation is very clean. A lovely decor. It has everything you need to be at home.

We will definitely be back, the town of Kapa’a is beautiful. So many local cafes and restaurants. Perfect location in regards to exploring the rest of the island. The studio has the most amazing views of the ocean then moves to the mountains. And has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Thank you
We had a wonderful stay! Beautiful view, quiet neighborhood, all the amenities you need are provided and more! Great location, close to beaches, shopping, restaurants.

The space was cozy and well-stocked with everything we needed! The view was amazing, and the breeze of the tradewinds with the windows open was quite comfortable. Kapa'a was just a few minutes down the hill, or a pleasant 25-minute walk. Lots of restaurants nearby, as well as the beach and bike path. The house was very central to the calmer beaches of the north side and the beautiful hikes of the south side. Having a washer and dryer available was great! The neighborhood was quiet....except for those darn roosters, lol! Great host and very responsive! Thanks Torrey!

The pictures of the place were beautiful but when we arrived it was a WOW!! The place made you feel like it was a taste of home. Everything you needed they had….
I definitely would recommend this place to anyone, it was total serenity.
Mahalo
Sherry and Greg

Our stay at Terry and Sara was amazing, dreamy and lovely. It was a fabulous start for our honeymoon. Thank you so much for your availability and your kindness. We recommend this little paradise to everyone.

everything absolutely top. We enjoyed the stay very much. The kitchen equipment was great. Also a grill was on site and some ingredients such as oil. Also the bathroom was super equipped. Very friendly and always eager. absolute plus point are the beach stuff that you can easily borrow, such as cooler, towels, umbrella, chairs, water shoes and even boogy boards.
Would come back anytime without thinking. Thanks!
Perfect location! So lovely and beautiful. We would defenetly book again!!
Wonderful stay! The view and space is even better than pictures. Lovely hosts and fantastic coffee.

The location and the stay was amazing and beautiful!
The views in the morning sunrises were fabulous. I went on walks everyday and the neighborhood was always with children playing outside and adults talking to the neighbors. Plants everywhere I saw, flowers, Lulu (breadfruit) and much more.
I will be coming back and staying here all my Kauai adventures.
Thank you what an amazing experience.
Joni
Beautiful little house! Perfect spot to stay easy to get across the island. Great location, the place is more magical than the pictures. Definitely coming back again! Thank you
Wonderful location. Beautiful view. Great necessities. Fantastic holiday!

Torrey and Sarah's place is a terrific find. It is conveniently located and just off the beaten path to provide a real local experience. They've given attention to every convenience and detail to make you feel at home during your stay. They are friendly and willing to share tips and recommendations. We would love to return to Kauai and would not hesitate to stay here again! Mahalo for a great experience.
We had an absolutely amazing stay! The views were incredible and in such a quiet neighborhood. The town was perfect and the commute around the island was easy from the condo.
I work 6 days a week and really needed to get away. My expectations were exceeded, and I could not recommend this place more.

We loved the authentic feel of the property and neighborhood. Good central location to launch from for exploring all sides of this amazing island. Kauai has been our favorite and definite planning on returning. Will definitely book with Torrey and Sarah if it is available! A bonus was the panoramic ocean/city view at a distance! Thanks for sharing this piece of paradise.
We loved our sweet nest. Beautiful views, quiet and had a lovely and consistent breeze. We would definitely stay here again!

This is a gem of a find. Book it if you can! Torrey's place has many of the amenities you would want for a stay on Kauai. We cooked breakfast daily and enjoyed our coffee on the deck with the beautiful light and gorgeous views. The communication, attention to details, and ease of arrival were all excellent. They provide many tips and ideas for places to visit, eat, and drink around the island. I would def stay again if I was lucky enough to find availability!

Torry & Sarah’s place was one of our favorite AirBnB’s ever. The view was spectacular. So many windows - you are always surrounded by a beautiful view. The location was great for exploring the east and north shores. This will be our first choice for a return trip to Kauai.

We couldn’t have asked for a better place to celebrate my wife’s 40th birthday in paradise! The view of the ocean from the huge windows was so peaceful. It was a perfect place to relax and reset before going off on our next adventure.
The studio was super clean, nicely decorated and included some really nice touches that surprised us (in a good way) upon our arrival. There’s a great balcony with chairs to sit and enjoy the amazing view. Torrey and Sarah are great hosts and were friendly and responsive.
The location in Kapa’a was a nice middle ground between the north shore, with Hanalei and Haena State Park, and the south side with Poipu and Waimea. Kapa’a itself has plentiful amenities and a great vibe.
Bottom line — we loved our stay and highly recommend Torrey and Sarah’s place!

What a fabulous place to stay. It had everything we needed!! The view is out of this world.!! Torrey and Sarah were wonderful hosts.All the amenities you could ask for! Great location. Lovely, comfortable bed. Beautiful deck for watching sunrises and sunsets!! Wish I was there right now!
Super awesome stay. We’d come back and recommend to friends and family.

We spent 4 nights in the beautiful apartment of Torrey and Sarah. It is well located; only a 5-minute drive to the old town of Kapa'a. There you will find great restaurants and small shops. The location is basically a good starting point for all activities south and east of Kauai. If you don't book another accommodation in the north, you can also get to Hanalei relatively quickly from here, etc.
The apartment was very clean, superbly equipped and seeing the sunrises out of bed was fantastic!

Absolutely unique! Hosts have taken care of the smallest detail. They make you feel fully cared for. Delicious coffee with vanilla and nuts macadamia complete the experience :) beautiful view from the window/terrace, very clean, lots of beautiful dishes in the kitchen, delicate linens. just paradise !

The home is awesome!
Amazing views. Cannot recommend enough. Torrey manages it very well. We had ample instructions available in good time. They also have a mini book with more guidelines and todos.
She is great to talk too and we loved all their recommendations around the island. 10/10 would come back again.

More than pleasant studio with a breathtaking view of the shore in the distance. Good location, super clean with many attentions from the owners that make the stay easier. We'll be back for our next stay. Mahalo for everything.

Torrey and Sarah are great hosts! The communication and response time was noted to be exceptional right from the start. The studio is very cozy with a great view and has all the necessary essentials, plus more! I’m not sure when I’ll be back in Kauai, but I would definitely stay with them again!

The ocean view you see in the morning is really so cool,
I feel like I'm getting a gift from my trip to Kauai:)
The condition of the accommodation is good and I like everything in general, so I want to visit again next time ~!
Thank you for hospitality! It was wonderful!

I already cant wait to book another trip and stay here. I last minute changed my mind from doing a trip to Washington to kauai based off this airbnb listing and I’m so glad! I spent my 30th birthday here with my partner for his first time in Hawaii and it was nothing but awesome! Great communication from before we got there (Even with our late night flight delays and requests for later check out) to the very end. The little details (filled ice trays, complimentary laundry/boogie boards/beach umbrellas, etc) really make the difference! The location can’t be beat! Just a quick 20 minute walk to food, drinks, and beach! I can’t speak of this place highly enough.

We had a wonderful stay. The studio is located in a quiet neighborhood and is just a short drive from the beach and restaurants. It’s central location on the island also made it easy to go to both the North and South shore.
The amenities were top notch and we really appreciated all the beach gear. We highly recommend this Airbnb and hope to stay again in the future.
Torrey and Sarah truly thought about all of the details! We loved our stay and look forward to hopefully coming back! Definitely book your stay here!
perfect location and stay during my first time in the garden island! great hosts- would love to visit again with Torrey and Sarah!

Wow what a view! This place made our first stay in Kauai incredibly memorable with the view of the town, ocean and mountains. We enjoyed the deck with morning coffee, cocktails and grilling. The studio was open, private and breezy. We had everything we needed for the beach including a cooler because we love to picnic. My husband and I loved our stay and wish we had another night or 2 there. Next time!

We highly recommend Torrey and Sarah's place! It was just perfect and we would definitely come back - if the way from Germany wouldn't be that far. ;-) If you are looking for a place to stay with perfect location, breathtaking views, cleanliness and all the trimmings look no further! :-)
------------
We can absolutely recommend the apartment of Torrey and Sarah! It was simply perfect and we would definitely come again, if it wasn't so far from Germany. ;-)
If you are looking for an apartment in perfect location, fantastic view, super clean... Well you name it, they have it... Stop looking, you just found it! :-)

Torrey was such an amazing host. She was so easy to communicate with and had such a welcoming place to stay. Everything was so clean and orderly. AC was a nice thing to have and the small welcome gift was so sweet! We will definitely try to stay here again!
Torrey and Sarah were amazing! Perfect spot for a couple, great view. The location is great as well, near restaurants and the beach. Highly recommend for couples looking for a getaway.

This stay was a dream. Cute little studio with all the necessities. It is close to beaches, shops, local food, etc. If you’re debating booking, this is a sign to book now. You won’t regret it one bit :)

We loved our stay here, we were not ready to leave when it was time to head to our next destination! We are definitely spoiled when it comes to amenities now. The beach gear was so convenient, having a cooler, beach chairs with pockets for storage, an umbrella, sand mat, and of course beach towels available for free was amazing and made our beach time much more enjoyable. The space is open but well divided by furniture, and all very cute. The bathroom cabinet has pretty much anything you should need, and a little extra fun like books, games, and electric candles. We spent what downtime we had on the balcony looking out to sea and at the mountains, it's a great way to begin or end the day. I messaged ahead of our arrival for hiking recommendations and was given several options with helpful descriptions, and the guidebook in the space is extensive! Our trip was definitely made better by all the information provided. Most of our meals were at places from the guidebook and we were never disappointed! We even did a little shopping at a couple recommended spots and found some locally made perfume to take home. The location of this Airbnb is nice as you are a bit out from Lihue airport and docks but the drive back isn't long (and it's beautiful - 20-30m) if you choose to do an adventure from there. There are beaches nearby, and if you want to hit up Hanalei it is a bit more of a drive but still very doable and very beautiful, maybe 45m if traffic cooperates. Kapa'a is a cute little town with plenty to explore and an easy path along the beach if you are looking to meander with a view. If we are fortunate enough to head back to Kauai in the future we would definitely stay with Torrey and Sarah again!
We loved our stay… the condo is in a great location and very homely. The view is spectacular and host had good recommendations / advice for our stay.

My girlfriend and I stayed here for a week on Kauai and loved every second of it. Kind and responsive hosts, incredible view, guide book with a plethora of great recommendations for food and activity across the island, and all your beach essentials at your fingertips. The studio itself is very cozy - a perfect space for two people. There is a/c if you need it, but we were comfortable the whole time with the fans on and windows open, so it was not needed. We also recommend this location because there are a lot of amenities in Kapa'a and also basically equidistant from the north and south ends of the island, so you really can get anywhere without too long of a drive. We will definitely be looking to stay here again if we come back!

A wonderful stay in this beautiful studio. Close to many restaurants and beaches in Kapa’a. Great trail close by for running, walking, biking. All you need and more provided including many extra personal touches. Great central location on the island.

We loved our stay at this Airbnb. It was clean, small, but had a beautiful view overlooking the ocean and the jungle, we awoke to the birds every day.
The reason this isn’t a 5 star review is solely because the parking is shared with the neighboring Airbnb and I wish that had been more clear, and the AC was only good for a few hours before it needed drained so overnight use wasn’t great.
Instead we opted to open the many windows and get a cross breeze going which for the most part made up for it.
I would absolutely recommend you stay here regardless of those few things. It was a perfect home base for our trip and I would absolutely stay here again. Much love to Torrey and Sarah for their hospitality. The guide book they put together is really something.

We absolutely loved everything about this place and location. It’s super clean and the view is outstanding. It is a residential neighborhood and very quiet with only the sounds of nature lulling you to sleep. If you’re looking for a place right on the beach, this is not it, but we’ve stayed on the beach before and would choose this location again over the pricy beach locations. Plus you can see the ocean perfectly! Kapa’a is central to getting to the beaches and sights in the north and the south. The only thing we missed was a microwave, but we made the most of the outdoor grill and stove, so really we were provided for perfectly. We will definitely stay here on our next trip to paradise!

Nice, clean and open! Had a great view for sunrise. So refreshing to feel the breeze in the studio. They had everything that we needed - nail polish remover, aloe vera and laundry! Well-stocked bathroom and kitchen. The only downside would be the crickets and roosters at night/early morning but ear plugs are provided!

Cute studio with a great location as a home base for exploring the island. Very close to downtown Kapaa and convenient to East shore beaches. Torrey was quick to respond to any questions/concerns we had, and there were lots of little homey touches. I would highly recommend this place!
Amazing accommodations and extraordinarily kind and responsive hosts. Property essentially located and had exceptional views. Highly recommended.

My husband and I spent a few days here in Kauai. We fell in love with the space the second we walked in. The pictures don't do it justice. And the location is incredible! We were able to enjoy the food trucks on the East Coast, visit the wonderful beaches on the South Coast, and go on beautiful hikes/enjoy the fun towns on the North Coast. However, our favorite part was probably cooking dinner with their available grill and waking up to the sunrise pouring through the windows.
We highly recommend!

Talk about paradise! Torrey and Sarah’s space was so lovely. The view is so incredible and even though it poured rain majority of our trip, we had the best time just hanging out on the lanai.
Great food and coffee just a few minutes away. Could not recommend more!
Perfect studio to explore Kaui. You will not find anything better for sure.

This studio has a beautiful view and is located in a quiet neighborhood. I loved going out in the mornings with a cup of coffee to watch the sunrise. It is very conveniently located, close to all restaurants and shops in Kapaa. The hosts went out of their way to make this little spot feel like home including providing toiletries, coffee, books, games, and even art supplies. Thank you!

We loved our stay at the studio! The location was great and provided the perfect home base for exploring the entire island. Kapa’a itself is a very cute beach town and we loved the food options there! The hosts provided us with fresh fruit from the garden which was an added plus. Overall, I’d recommend it to anyone staying on the island.
Great space with wonderful view. Located close to airport and in between Waimea canyon and the Na Pali coast hikes if you are on outdoor enthusiast. Nice personal touches and clean space.

The most peaceful and beautiful stay! Torrey and Sarah are very kind and thoughtful in providing the best accommodations. The room views are amazing and love the location to easily explore the whole island. So grateful to stay at Torrey and Sarah’s place. Peace to ALL

I had a wonderful stay here! Torrey and Sarah were lovely hosts and their studio was absolutely perfect. The view is amazing and everything is very clean and nicely decorated. I loved how it is in a nice neighborhood but close to the cute town. It was a great launching point for exploring both the north and south parts of the island.

My boyfriend and I had an amazing stay here and couldn’t have asked for a better place to have stayed in Kauai. The view was absolutely breathtaking and the location was very convenient from everything on the island. The Airbnb was clean, spacious and so relaxing. We would definitely stay here again!
This is a beautiful studio with amazing views and wonderful hosts!

Hebrew below.
Torry is amazing, i had a confusion about the leaving date and needed to take off one day earlier, she accepted to change the dates immidiatly.
In addition, the apartment was very very clean! And comfortable.
The location was close to everything, right in the middle of Kauai. I recommend staying here.
Tori is amazing, I got confused on the flight date and had to change and leave a day earlier she responded immediately to the request and agreed.
In addition, the apartment was very clean and comfortable, an excellent location in the center of the island. Would recommend staying here!
Really nice place ,clean good places to eat about 5 minutes drive… highly recommend
Torrey’s place is bright and cheerful. Very well decorated with everything you would need. Would definitely stay again if I make it back to Kauai!

This place was the best place to stay at and my husband and I had a fantastic time. Torrey was very professional, kind, thoughtful, and provided great hospitality! The studio had such a great view and was at a convenient location on the island. They gave us fresh fruit from their garden mid week and provided so many extra supplies around the house if we needed. Thank you again Torrey!
Be ready not wanting to leave ever :-)

This is definitely one of the very best airbnbs we have ever stayed at! The view is STUNNING!!! The studio is very spacious as well as beautifully designed and decorated. It was so bright, airy and comfortable. We had everything we could possibly need- even including beach chairs and boogie boards. I sure hope to stay here again one day! I can't express enough how beautiful this airbnb is!
Lovely unit with lots of thoughtful touches.

We really enjoyed all the windows in this studio space. The breeze was AMAZING!!! The beach gear and washer/dryer access was very convenient for our stay. The parking spot was great and the neighborhood was safe.
As the listings states, you will definitely be woken up to roosters in the early AM but earplugs solved that issue for me (deep sleepers, like my husband, was not bothered at all). Small amount of visiting bugs, which is expected and not a concern for us. Overall, we wouldn’t hesitate to stay again!

Absolutely beautiful. The place was a steal for the price, and the host was great. She responded to any needs we had promptly. The location is central to everything on the island and equal distance from both the north and south sides. The view was perfect. Would definitely stay there again.

The space was absolutely beautiful, clean, and perfect location for adventures on any side of the island, or to stay close and take a walk through Kapaa town just down the road. One of our favorite things about the studio were all the windows where golden light shone through sunrise and sunset each day.
Torrey was also incredibly kind and helpful through our booking process and throughout our entire stay!
Looking forward to coming back again sometime!🌺
Fabulous studio, views are amazing and we loved just taking it all in on the balcony.

Such an incredible spot! Conveniently located to restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores and a great location if you are planning to traverse the island. It was such a retreat. The space was clean, cutely decorated, and had every accommodation you could think of!

Torrey and Sarah are excellent hosts and we couldn’t have stayed in a better spot!! Quaint and cozy with all the amenities we needed, and the perfect size to enjoy a nice little island getaway for two. Lots of natural light with incredible views! The windows pick up a great breeze so we didn’t even need to use the AC. The location is centrally located, which allowed us to hit most of the island during our stay. Torrey was also extremely helpful in helping us track down a wonderful rental car from a friend when we were coming up short on options, and quick to answer any questions we had. Not to mention, she was kind enough to offer us some fresh homemade banana bread (which was DELICIOUS!!!) We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to plan a trip to Kauai, and hope to make it back one day because there is so much more for us to see!!!

Everything about this place was perfect. The location is ideal if you’re interested in seeing the whole island while also having a lot very close to you. The studio is spacious and the lanai is the perfect place to enjoy morning coffee with a view. If we could give more than 5 stars for the value, we absolutely would. Extremely low cost for such a great place. Thank you!

If I could put 6 stars I would. This place has amazing views of the beach and mountains and is in a great spot located centrally on the island so you don’t have to drive too far. Had all the amenities you could ask for and the host went above and beyond by having some extra amenities like bananas and coffee. They went out of their way to add little touches like leaving a handwritten note welcoming us for our stay. We could not have picked a better place to stay on island. I would definitely stay here again on my next visit to Kauai.

Torreys place is about a ten minute drive from Lihue airport which was super convenient. As well as easy highway access. A handful of food trucks and food places are also a few minutes from there. Her place was cute and clean with some added thoughtful measures for guests like coffee grinds and beach towels etc. She was extremely quick with responding back as well to any messages. I would recommend her place

It’s such a cute, cozy place, with a great view and everything we could need while we were there. We loved all the little details that made our stay even better (like sunscreen, after sun lotion, & a usable kitchen). Would definitely stay here again! :)

Wow! This is the best and most well-thought out Airbnb I have ever stayed in. The location is perfect as you are right in the middle of the North shore and the south side which make both very easy to explore. You are also not too far away from Koke’e State Park. Many food options are only a 5 minute drive away. The studio itself was mind blowingly beautiful. You have amazing views of Mt. Waialeale and of the ocean. The neighborhood is very quite as well. What set this Airbnb apart from others I have stayed in is the amenities. Fully stocked kitchen, wine glasses, plates, silverware, knives, cooking ware- everything you could need. There was shampoo, sunscreen, lotion, sewing kit, lighter, and more. Everything we needed was there. The hosts are very nice and gifted us with fresh papaya and lychee berries. Everything about our stay helped make our honeymoon unforgettable. Next time we come to Kauai, we will plan our trip around the availability of this Airbnb.
This place is amazing. Super clean and welcoming. Beautiful views and nearby the water but not so close that there is a lot of traffic. Best air bnb we stayed at during our trip. Highly recommend

Torrey and Sarahs place was lovely. It's location in Kapa'a was ideal for us to get around to different parts of the island and it has a small town charm. Torrey and Sarah were wonderful as hosts, answering all of our questions and giving us detailed recommendations and advice for our stay, which was invaluable for us while staying on an island with so much to do. Their thoughtfulness before, during, and after our stay was unmatched. They even dropped a ripe papaya off for us on the doorstep from their garden (it was delicious). We felt welcome from the moment we arrived and felt like we were in a home away from home. All in all, an unforgettable trip.

This home is fantastic! Morning coffee with an ocean view was the best part of my days here. The location is perfectly central, great neighborhood, and the studio is clean, bright and super cozy. Torrey and Sarah really added personal touches that made me feel welcomed into their home from the moment I walked in. Everything you need is here, and they are super attentive and responsive if any questions come up. I honestly was sad to leave and cannot wait to come back soon. Kauai is so special to me and staying here this time around really was too!! Mahalo for the wonderful hospitality Torrey and Sarah! Xo
The location was perfect! Within walking distance of great restaurants and the beach. Heather was very responsive to messages and their guide and suggestions were wonderful.
Super awesome place to stay. Right next to the beach and I’m pretty sure we ate at the lava lava beach club like 10 times. Super responsive and friendly hosts as well. Definitely recommend!!
Great location by the ocean- really enjoyed sitting on the balcony with the view. Check in and instruction are all clear and easy

Just an absolutely fabulous stay!! Location, apartment, and the hosts were everything we could have asked for to make our vacation incredible.
Thank you Khaled & Heather!
Khaled and Heather are amazing hosts! The place is amazing and I highly recommend this place!
This was a great place for my wife and I to celebrate our first kid-free trip in over a decade! I also learned how to cook eggs in the microwave, lol
Great stay at Khalid and Heather’s. Location was right at the water and close to all amenities.
We had a great stay - the condo has every amenity you could think of, and hosts were super communicative!
Wonderful apartment! Location is stunning! Great view of the ocean. Wonderful amenities. Apartment was clean and bright and modern. Loved it!
Very good location near small shopping area with restaurants and best of all, shave ice!

Khaled and Heather’s place in Kapa’a was absolutely amazing. The view and top floor were exactly what I was looking for. They had plenty of kitchen necessities to make the simple meals I wanted to make when I didn’t want to go out. They were both incredibly responsive and proactive with their instructions, which lended to having everything at my fingertips when I needed it. They also had numerous beach items that made enjoying the area that much more possible. I ended up keeping one of the folding beach chairs in the car during my stay to be able to set up a place wherever I wanted to enjoy my lunch or morning coffee with the sunrise or beautiful day. This island is known as the healing island, and this place creates a beautiful foundation for healing/new beginnings/breathing and rebooting. Highly recommend!
What a beautiful spot 🌴🌈🐓 ocean views, sunrise from the lanai, and walking paths to great beaches. Great place to spend time on the island.

My husband and I really enjoyed Heather and Khaled’s place for our anniversary celebration. They were very welcoming and their place was perfect for our needs. We enjoyed the beach mats and guide books. We will definitely stay at their place again on a trip back to Kauai! Thanks for everything!
Such a beautiful location and lots of amenities in the area. Sunrise was beautiful as we started our day and would love to stay here again. Thank you for the experience and welcoming us in your home.
We had such a wonderful stay! Beautiful views, fantastic location, and super responsive hosts!
Amazing place! Super close to restaurants and grocery stores, all within a super short walk! The view from the balcony was amazing

the property was beautiful! So breathtaking 😍 lots of things to do , everyone was super friendly and welcoming . Easy to get to where you’re going everything is close ! The supermarket has everything you need and it’s right across the street. the ocean view was felt so surreal ,I would love to come back for another maybe longer vacation in the future🥰🥰

This place was great! Extremely clean and had all the extras you could think of (coffee maker, tea kettle, beach gear and towels, etc). The view off the porch was lovely for drinking coffee in the morning. It was close to lots of walkable options and a quick drive to other towns and the airport. Great stay!
We loved staying at Khaled & Heather’s place in Kauai. Very convenient location and was right on the beach! We loved walking to get coffee and watching the sunrise. Highly recommend this Airbnb!
Beautiful location. Comfy place. Great little touches such as beach chairs, snorkels, Boogey boards, cooler, etc. The resort needs to reconfigure their parking spaces. They are way toooo small. LOL!
Such a beautiful place for a staycation. A lot of restaurants are close by. You actually don't have to drive. The place is super cute and homely. I would come back!! Thank you Khaled and Heather!!
Felt like a nice hotel, but better!

We LOVED our stay here - it even exceeded our expectations! Such a beautiful property - we especially enjoyed the pool and hot tub. The condo itself was super clean, beautifully decorated, and was super well equipped with everything you could need. It was so nice having everything for the beach and hiking poles. Heather was also super lovely and checked in regularly to see if we needed anything. Highly recommend!

The view was absolutely beautiful! It's had so many thoughtful touches with their guest comfort in mind. A place to hang swimsuits, sissors!! Toaster oven, coffee maker, chocolate candy, insulated cups, beach chairs, plugs next to bed to charge your cell phones. Extra sheets because I don't like to share! The air-conditioning worked great, and shower pressure was perfect. We walked to Jojos for shaved ice , got souvenirs, and this amazing prepared food in the market and didn't even need to move our car. The owners were very responsive and super friendly. You need to stay here! The grounds, the pool, and the location were perfect!!! 10 min away from the airport, 15 away from helicopter rides, and 15 min from mountain tubing. I highly recommend it!!!
It's just amazing, great location, coconut market next to it, easy to eat.The host thoughtfully provided a variety of swimming, snorkeling equipment, etc. It was relaxing to stay here!

We loved our stay at Khaled & Heather’s place! Great location with Coconut Marketplace right next door (we loved Chicken in a Barrel and JoJo’s shave ice) and great central location on the island to drive to either the north or south shores. Having the beach umbrella and chairs was a huge convenience that we missed when we checked into a hotel later in our trip.

My husband and I booked Khaled & Heather’s condo 11 months prior to our stay and immediately Heather responded with a friendly hello. She was so sweet, making sure everything was good when we arrived and wishing us a wonderful stay. The condo was exactly how it was portrayed in the listing. It is a beautiful condo with beautiful views! We will definitely stay at Khaled & Heather’s condo again!
Host was amazing! Heather provided outstanding communications and tips. Best condo view, yet felt private on patio. I would definitely enjoy staying there again.

My partner and I loved Heather and Khaled's place. It's in a great location close to the center of Kapaa and also halfway between Hanalei Bay and Poipu. They made us feel right at home with how clean the apartment was, the beach accessories, and the Hawaiian Host chocolates. They also send a link to a site that includes helpful information such as checkin, checkout, wifi, parking, local spots, etc. This resource was so helpful and valuable! We'd definitely stay here again!

Khalid and Heather were great hosts. The space was exactly what we needed and you can’t beat the sunrise at that incredibly close beach. They were great at communicating and had completely reasonable expectations for a guest in their beautiful space. We would definitely stay here again.

Beautiful stay for our honeymoon! Conveniently located only about 10-15 minutes from the airport. Heather was very friendly and made sure we had everything we needed! We loved relaxing on the lanai and walking down to Lava Lava Beach Club for yummy drinks and watching the hula show at Coconut Marketplace which was only a short walk away! Would definitely recommend!

The place was beautiful. Right on the beach and had plenty of food and shopping places around. Heather was also very sweet and responsive. The place was resourceful. It had what we needed to prepare meals and go to the beach. 10/10.

We felt at home from the first second in Khaled & Heather's place. There is everything you need for a few relaxing days.
The space is in a good location on the island. You can reach everything well and have some opportunities to eat in the evening.
We'd come back anytime to enjoy the sun on Kauai.
Nice location, right on the ocean. Pool, tiki bar and market place are very convenient. The unit has everything you need.
Loved our stay here! Great hosts who definitely made our trip amazing with all the available touches they added to their rental!

This condo has a beautiful view and very relaxing lanai. We loved sitting out and watching and listening to the waves. The condo had everything we needed and we would highly recommend it to anyone staying in Kauai

We had an amazing stay at Heather and Khaled’s Airbnb! We arrived and had a smooth check in experience. The location was amazing and love the ocean and pool view from the balcony! You are literally steps away from the beach! Heather and Khaled provide a link with all the details you need for checking in, checking out, and even recommendations of what to do which was so helpful! Our favorite was walking out to the beach and watching the sunrise. The room was very nice and clean and included so many supplies for you to use during your stay such as a beach bag, snorkel gear, hiking sticks, chairs, cooler, boards, and more! Loved everything about this Airbnb and all the amenities! We definitely enjoyed our stay and would stay here again in the future!

This place was phenomenal! We rented a car but easily could have been happy with how walkable it was to the the beach, restaurants, shopping, and so many cool little hiking spots! Hope to be back sometime soon!

This was the perfect place to stay. Right on the beach, access to the pool and hot tub, and in the right spot so both the North Shore and Waimea Canyon were about equidistant. It felt like staying at a resort without the resort fees. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone coming to Kauai. Khaled and Heather were very responsive and took care of all of our needs. Thank you!
Lovely, clean space with great access to pool/beach!
Perfect location. Clean. And a wonderful host. We would reommend this place to anyone going to Kauai.

We had an excellent stay!! Perfect place to spend our honeymoon and was within a wonderful central location to get to the north, south and west coasts quickly. They provided an excellent guide and information prior to check in! The website they have created was an extremely helpful and resourceful tool during our stay.

Excellent location, beautiful view from balcony. Does have a small refrigerator and ability to light cooking for like breakfasts and lunches. Can walk to dinners and having a bath with happy hour out front was nice. Gardens are stunning.
Great place and hosts!!

Had an awesome stay at Khalid & Heathers place. Super thankful for some of the gear they left for us to use. It is super close to all kinds of activities and located in the middle of the island, so anywhere you go is close!! Would definitely recommend. We will likely come back!

Great view, good location and very clean. Khaled and Heather’s communication and information package was helpful, particularly as we arrived late at night. The beach was quiet in the morning and the amazing coffee shop next door was wonderful surprise.
Beautiful stay and convenient location
Loved our stay at this condo! Awesome water views and walking distance to many restaurants and stores! Plenty of extras for us to use which we were grateful for!

Khaled and Heather’s place was clean and the room was very cozy. We enjoyed the ocean view, stroll along the beach, and the bar. Heather was a great host and easy to communicate with. I would recommend this place to anyone.

We could not have been happier with our stay at the Islander. There was not a single item we needed in our unit that was not available. It immediately felt like home and we’ll always remember our time at this very special place.

Great condo in a wonderful location, Heather and Khaled were super fast and responsive, super helpful i greatly appreciated their assistance. Recommended to my friends and family so they can have a great place to stay too

Heather mentioned try to view the sunrise. We so enjoyed its beauty every morning. It is such a great way to start the day. They also had for use beach chairs & snorkeling gear that we enjoyed. They had many extras for use. We ventured out but always appreciated being back to our home away from home. Appreciated having the toaster oven for making foods at home and not having to eat every meal out. Thank you Khaled & Heather for sharing your place with us and others. We hope to come back before too many years pass.
Nice studio on a nice location. Amazing fish market and coffee shop within a 1 minute walk
We enjoyed the very quiet beach, and the location allowed easy access to explore the island. I liked having the Marketplace so close. Condo was extremely clean and kitchenette was well equipped.

Heather did a fantastic job at communication! Their website has pretty much everything you need to know from check in to adventures to check out and everything in between! Photos were accurate, condo is right by the beach and had plenty amenities there! Thank you Khaled and Heather!

Khaled & Heather deserve their good reputation. It seemed to us that they thought of everything. All the details were in place. The condo is just as advertised, with a great view of the ocean and the adjoining garden. The room is cozy and comfortable. We loved sleeping to the sounds of the ocean with the ceiling fan on. The location is excellent with shops and eating places right next door. We want to stay here again next year.
VERY NICE RESORT & FLOWERS WERE WELL PLANTED
Prefect place to stay.

As soon as we stepped foot into Khalid & Heather’s place we knew instantly that we had to come back and immediately looked at the calendar to see when we could come back! Lemme tell you - if you see this is available, book it! There’s a reason there is so little availability! The view alone is stunning but the location is amazing! Restaurants, stores, grocery, coffee, and THE OCEAN are all right next door!

Five days at Heather & Khaled’s place was the perfect escape! With beautiful ocean views and a cozy bed to come back to after a busy day of exploring, it was exactly what we were looking for. We took advantage of the snorkeling gear, beach mats, hiking poles and cooler during our stay. Having all of these extra things available to us was wonderful. We would recommend this cozy stay to absolutely anyone coming to visit Kaua’i!!

This place was amazing! Centrally located on the island, amazing view, great complex with all the amenities you’d need — we would happily rent this again and again. Heather was excellent at communicating with us about our reservation, and the condo had everything we needed. The pool and grounds are beautifully maintained and the pool bar is a ton of fun at night to meet other visitors. A few good spots to eat within walking distance, and right next to the Kauai bike path for walks and rides. Highly recommend!
This was a very nice place to stay
What a great time! The host was very communicative and it was exactly what we wanted. We loved it. 10/10, they rock!

The communication with the host was excellent, Heather was highly professional and friendly as our host. She was on top of things we needed to know from start to finish of our stay, and even gave us a whole website of local recommendations of places to eat and things to do after we booked.
Clean condo, great view from the lanai, awesome morning sunrises, beautiful gardens surrounding the property, and a bar with live music every night right on the beach just a few minute stroll down the beach from the condo. If you are looking for a great home base to be able to hit all the big ticket items in Kauai, this is it. Everything is about a 30-45 min drive North or South (minus Waimea Canyon), which gave us tons of freedom to get lots of hiking, kayaking, exploring, and a variety of beaching in during our honeymoon.
Great!! 5 stars

My wife and I spent 3 nights at this condo and really enjoyed our stay. Although on the smaller side, it was quite comfortable and had everything we needed. Heather is a wonderful communicator a resulting in an effortless check-in and a great stay. The condo is very conveniently located next to a set of shops and restaurants, which met all of our needs. As well, the condo is very close to the major road on the east side of the island allowing us to get to other areas of Kauai fairly readily. We would not hesitate to go back to this condo.
Great stay!
Khaled and Heather have a great condo perfectly located in Kapa’a. It is a perfect “home base” to explore the island from, and they were tremendous hosts.

Stayed for a single night after a long day of traveling, and it was exactly what we needed! We arrived to a cool and clean condo. The location is fantastic! Not far from the airport, and great view of the ocean. The beach is mere steps away! Plus, it is closely located to cafes, stores, groceries and more! Highly recommend!!

Heather and Khaled’s place was amazing. It was well equipped with kitchenwares and even equipment for the beach. You really don’t even need to buy snorkel gear. They thought of everything. The surrounding community was quiet and peaceful. The beach was amazing as well. 10/10 always would recommend.

Beautiful condo! It was perfect and Heather was great to work with. We loved the virtual information book, it was so helpful. The condo is surrounded by great food options and a short drive to almost everywhere on the island. I would highly recommend Khaled and Heather’s place.

The hosts were very prompt in their replies and maintained consistent communication. They even sent over their housekeeper who was just as friendly and accommodating as the hosts. I was missing a fitted bed sheet and the housekeeper or hosts assumed I’d sleep in the same bed as my dad, not on the pull out sofa bed, so it had not been prepared for our stay. The sofa bed at the place was outrageously uncomfortable. I got a migraine from the pain in the middle of the night. I still have intense (10/10 pain) muscle soreness in my upper middle back from that one night not yet alleviated. The only reason I stayed here was because I needed to extend my stay by one night due to changing flight plans. Previously I slept in a bed (9/13-9/20) and had no pain, and prior to that I even slept on a regular sofa (9/8-9/13) on the Big Island at a friend’s house and was super comfortable. However, this sofa bed is not acceptable. Overall, the place was visually very nicely decorated and organized, and I appreciated the garden shower head and shower toiletries.

The condo was lovely and clean, the perfect size for two people with an awesome view of the ocean. Heather and Khaled provided beach towels for our use during our stay which was very helpful. Heather was very clear and prompt in all communication and the check-in/check-out process was so easy. Great location and great stay!!
Great location! Very nice place. We really enjoyed our stay.
so awesome! we loved it! clean and great place, thank you so much!

Everything about our stay was wonderful! There were so many things supplied in the condo that came in handy and the location and view are amazing. Such a great place for an even better price! We enjoyed our first time in Kauai and our honeymoon, thank you for the amazing stay!
Amazing view, amenities, and location! Such a nice way to experience Kauai.
This place was perfect! The location is amazing. You can walk to different shops and restaurants. Check in and check out were very sumo. Highly recommend!

Simple/straightforward studio space with a queen bed. Perfect for two people. A real resort vibe. We loved the close proximity to shops, restaurants and the pool bar. Khalid and Heather were communicative and helped figure out an issue with the A/C. Overall fun stay!
Great space to call home for the week. You can walk to anything you need from this studio and the hosts are exceptional.
The room was beautiful, as was the resort it was located in. The location was VERY convenient and walking distance from many things. Would definitely recommend!
Lovely little spot and the beach is stunning. Great communication from host. Would stay again!

Great location for a couple looking to get away. Beach access and also over looks the pool/bar area, which may get a little noisy at night. The hosts had great, fast communication. Would stay here again!

Had a wonderful stay. Would highly recommend. The communication was fantastic with clear instructions for a smooth and easy check in and helpful hints on what to see and do. The apartment was very spacious with a great balcony with wonderful views of the ocean. The location was very central to sightsee both sides of the island and shops and restaurants were only a few minutes walk. Overall a great stay. 👍

Khaled and Heather do a phenomenal job of hosting! They were very communicative, provided clear instructions for check in days in advance, and had a virtual guide with lots of local recommendations. The condo itself is fully stocked and at a great resort. We loved how close we were to coffee shops, restaurants, and the ocean! We will hopefully be back soon.

The unit was well-equipped with kitchen items, beach items, etc. It's located on the top floor with no elevator so that's something to keep in mind if you have a lot of luggage or a person with a disability in your party. The room was comfortable and Heather was very communicative and responsive. She gave very clear instructions on where to park, how to enter the unit, etc. Also very conveniently located in the heart of Kapaa so lots of food and shopping options nearby.

Beautiful space to stay with ocean view from the balcony! Central location with shopping and food places nearby! The condo resort has lots of plants around the property. We loved all of the different native plants with information signage that tells you about the local plants (like a botanical garden).
Great stay!

Great stay at Khalid & Heather’s place! The condo had everything you need for a fun day on the beach and is conveniently located next to a marketplace with shops, restaurants and a grocery store. Clean space and very welcoming. Instructions and guide were helpful. Thanks!
Amazing views, great shopping/food right out front and down the street! They had beach toys for guests to use: snorkels, flippers, boogie boards! we had an amazing stay

the appartment is perfect for some days in Kauai. really close to shops, restaurants and some nice beaches. its fully equiped with some gears for the beach and hiking which are quite useful. i would really like to come back!

A beautiful condo and wonderful stay! The location was optimal for us since our stay wasn’t too long. Made it easy to travel south or north each day! Lots of super helpful beach equipment provided. Communication before, during and after was also very friendly and responsive. We had many great adventures and look forward to returning for more!

This is a great condo with everything you need! Great location, views, and nearby food! Communication with Heather & Khaled was great and the place we super clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again!

This condo was in a good location. We loved the pool bar!!! And the shower was to die for. Never thought a shower would be such a big deal but wow—the water pressure was absolutely fantastic. The bathroom was nice and roomy and the whole place really has everything you’d need! 10/10 would recommend!

Amazing spot. Heather & Khaled have the best recommendations too, we got coffee every morning and watched the sunrise. The lanai is perfect for relaxing and has the best views. Definitely stay here if you are looking for a prime spot in Kauai!
We had a great stay! It was easy to check in and out, the hosts were easy to reach, and the place is clean and in a good location.
Cute place and very well appointed. Conveniently located next to shops and restaurants right in walking distance! Note this is on the third floor and there are no elevators!
We had a great stay in Heather’s unit. Will definitely come stay again next time we are in Kauai!
Close to Kappa Town and marketplace, had everything you could think of needing, would definitely stay here for the duration of my next visit.

This condo is fantastic. For me, the location was unbeatable, having the little market right behind it, the ocean views and the poolside bar made everything beyond easy. You're a quick walk/jog from the Sleeping Giant trailhead and there are just so may great things nearby even if you don't rent a car.
The place was clean, super easy to check into, and overall I would definitely come back and stay again. The hosts are lovely people who really care about hospitality, and I couldn't have enjoyed my stay more!
Great views, very clean. I would stay there again

Highly recommend anyone visiting Kauai to stay here. The place is comfortable, clean, and the perfect place to watch the sunrise as you get ready for your day. Great central location on the island for activities north and south. Walking distance to markets and restaurants. Thank you Khaled & Heather!
Awesome location with great amenities! Very close to the beach and some great hikes/tours.
Fantastic spot if going to Kauai. We had a great time! The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. Would absolutely recommend to stay there!

Amazing location, hosts were great quick responses and very accommodating with early check in. Right beside local shops and restaurants. Middle of the island so easy to get around North and South of the island for different activities. 10/10!!

We couldn’t ask for a more perfect condo. Everything you need is provided or a quick walk to the Coconut Marketplace. Local restaurants, shops, convenience store, and the beach right here. No need to rent a car if you just want a few relaxing days by the beach/pool.

This place is great! Has all amenities needed to enjoy and have a great time in Kauai. Cozy, comfortable stay that will blow your mind and that will make you come back again and again. Very close to stores, restaurants, bars, and the beach. Best views from the balcony, and aloha vibes everywhere. Two thumbs up!

We really enjoyed our stay at Heather’s condo. It has beautiful views of the water, mountains and pool area, and we enjoyed sitting on the balcony at all times of day! The spot is cozy, but it truly has all you need for a comfortable stay. It was our first trip to Kauai, so we ended up exploring a bit around the island (north and south), although there are things to do nearby still, including the marketplace in walking distance!

My husband and I were supposed to stay here but due to an unexpected passing away of my mother in law, my daughter and husband stayed instead. Heather was so kind and gave them a kind note of condolence as well as macadamia chocolates. She let them put their luggage in early too. She was good about communicating. They loved how close to the beach they were and the fabulous restaurants next door since they didn’t have a car. They loved Sleeping Giant ahi tacos, happy hour at Wings & Tings, the Chinese/Thai restaurant was also very good…all in the Coconut marketplace next door. And the ABC market offered lots of souvenirs as well as hot food items. They loved their stay.
Awesome place with a great location. owners were very responsive!

This place is awesome! It came with so many great amenities and was so close to the cute shops. The owners were great with communication. The place is exactly as described, we would most definitely stay there again!
Pretty views of the country ocean nice place.
What a wonderful stay! A beautiful view of the ocean and short walk to the pool. Very close to town and the airport. We had an amazing time.

Resort type condo had a great view with many amenities. The location was central to any and everything. Smith Family Luau down the street and tons of shopping steps away. The market was a life saver for distilled water for my husbands sleep machine! If you are a shower person, this room has the best one ever!
Great location and hosts were responsive and kind!
Great location. The bar and beach were especially memorable! Will definitely be back.

Such a great space! There is a pool and jacuzzi and walking path nearby. The view is so pretty. We watched the rain from the patio and had coffee and took walks along a beautiful path. It was a wonderful place.

Khaled & Heather were very communicative and quick to reply, they are great hosts. We didn’t have any issues, condo was accurate, wifi works, beach & hiking gear was great to have, lots of towels, and nice little things like coffee and soaps. The property has everything you need and Kapaa is a great central location on the island. And the view! We definitely recommend.

Heather’s place for perfect. We liked everything from watching sunrise every morning, eating malasadas at the beach, dinner and live music at the lava lava beach club to some of the most amazing hikes within one hour drive.

Khaled and Heather’s place was the perfect jumping off point for us during our visit to Kauai. The space itself was clean, fully stocked, and exactly as described. We even saw a monk seal at the beach right outside! Would not hesitate to recommend this space to someone.

It’s a really nice place to stay in Kauai. It’s located in the middle of the island if you want to drive around. Very convenient. We loved the hut tub and meeting new people in the evening. Would recommend to our family and friends to stay there!

Khalid and Heather’s thorough communication made the trip easier for a planner like me! The location is perfect and they thought of every possible detail to make the trip most enjoyable. We highly recommend!
Beautiful location and views. Had amazing time! If you are ever visiting the stunning island of Kauai, this is a great place to stay.

This is a small but cozy Airbnb in a great location. The bathroom is very nice and the balcony overlooks the pool. Speaking of which, the pool and hot tub and outdoor bar are charming and have a great vacation vibe. Airbnb is located steps from the beach, great place to watch the sunrise. (note: not necessarily the best swimming beach.) but overall the location was fantastic, a short drive to many restaurants. WiFi and A/C worked great. Although we were rarely in the Airbnb itself, it did have a large mini fridge, microwave, and other kitchenette amenities had we wanted them. They did provide quite a few things to make our stay more fun including lots of beach towels and other beach accessories. Overall loved this Airbnb and can’t wait to stay here again.

Such a find! Heather and Khaled's place was amazing! the condo itself was very thoughtfully planned out and seemed to have everything we needed and didn't know we needed. I really appreciated the local guide Heather sent as well. I loved the ocean view, easy pool access, and walkability to so much!! I wish I would've found this place earlier in my searching so we could have stayed a few more days!

The condo was beautiful and filled with Aloha spirit. We were here for only two days of our stay and somehow got our days mixed up. We missed our check out time as we were out on a boat until late afternoon. When we returned to shore and we turned on our phone there were several messages filled with worry about our safety. We contacted the host immediately and made arrangements to remove our things from the room so they could clean.
They were sweet and understanding and mostly happy that we were safe!
I would definitely recommend staying here if you get the opportunity.
