Beautiful condo in great location. Listing was spot-on. Amenities were great and lots within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again on next visit.
Mahalo! This condo was perfect for my two kids and I. We enjoyed the location and the quick access to the beach. Would book again.
Everything about the condo was perfect. We quickly felt right at home and had the best stay for our honeymoon. Would highly recommend a friend to stay there if we had to.

Very convenient location and a beautiful space to call home during vacation! Parking is easy and there are plenty of places nearby to walk for food. Would love to stay there again during my next trip to Kauai.

Great, affordable, clean place to stay! Conveniently located halfway between everything you need to see. Great ocean view. Had an amazing first trip to Kauai. Hope to visit again in the future. Mahalo!

Khaled and Heather have a gem of a spot. Here you get the best of both a resort stay and a homey Airbnb. The place was immaculate, and little details such as chocolates and a coffee were included. There’s everything you can imagine for having a great time in Kauai. I thought the binoculars and hiking poles were especially thoughtful. We had a Wifi problem that Heather immediately responded to, plus comp’d us for the time it took us to fix. I will be recommending this Airbnb to all my friends and family if they come back to Kauai. (Get the burrito at the Sleeping Giant Grill!)

Khaled & Heather thought of everything! They're place was impeccable, well-equipped, and very central. Thank you so much for thinking of providing things we didn't even think of ourselves. We had a wonderful time and hope to be back someday!
AmaZing location, pitchers and dank food all walking distance. Much business to explore. Customer service was Also fantastic. Thank you Khaled and Heather!

Great spot right on the beach! Has everything you need.
Hosts are very responsive.
Close to markets, hiking and kayaking to the secret falls.
Really enjoyed my time.

Khaled and Heather were great hosts! The condo was very clean and around EVERYTHING you need - coffee, eateries, small shops. I really appreciated the detailed instructions that were sent to me before my stay as well! Would def stay here again!

We were visiting Kauai for my sisters wedding and had no idea what to expect or what to do while there. This was my 2nd time using an Airbnb, and was nervous about what to pack. Heather was super responsive and gave excellent insight for our trip! When we arrived the condo was perfect and the extra care that Heather and Khaled had given their guests were shocking! We didn’t need anything but our own food, which was easily accessible across the street at the Coconut Market. The location and view from this unit was incredible! Highly recommend this condo/host!
awesome area, be sure to check out lydgate Beach the great place to swim with no waves

We had such an amazing time staying at Islander on the Beach. It was a central location to all we wanted to see and do. The Coconut Marketplace was a quick, delicious place to eat and shop. The condo was right on the beach, fun for snorkeling and swimming. Communication was super quick and very informative. Highly recommend- thank you for letting us stay!

Staying here was a dream being able to always hear the soothing sounds of the ocean. We loved being able to walk to get coffee or pick up snacks and groceries at the nearby marketplace. You are also only a few steps from a very quiet beach. Khalid and Heather have thought of everything and they provide so many extras to make your stay comfortable. They are great with communication and give you all the details days in advance so you’re well prepared when you arrive.
Sweet room in an awesome location. Thanks for the lovely stay!
Perfect paradise. Thank you!

We loved staying here and after exploring the island felt it was in an absolute ideal location. Place was clean, bed was comfy, and complimentary beach supplies were a huge plus. Would love to stay again and 5/5 rating!
We really enjoyed our stay. Heather was fantastic interact with and the condo was clean, well equipped and ideally suited for our needs. Would recommend.

This was one of the best Airbnb stay that we've had. The hosts are wonderful and have put in a lot of thoughtfull touches into the condo to make the stay very comfortable, such as providing a really cool electronic guidebook with instructions, beach / snorkeling gear and etc.
Great condo! Communication was good, plenty of amenities, and close to the beach and a grocery store.
Definitely surpassed our expectations:)

Amazing condo! The view was delightful and easy access to the beach for sunrise. Great beach accessories provided, although quite sandy. I appreciated the welcome guide that had tons of useful info & recommendations. The door was easy to use with a coded entry vs having to keep up with a key.
One of the best Airbnb’s I’ve been in. Amazing views and proximity to restaurants, shops, attractions. Fully stocked with everything you need for the beach. Awesome stay!

Great location to get to many things on the island. Very thorough directions and prompt responses from hosts. The added equipment and supplies allowed us to save money (cook at home, avoid rental fees) and maximize our adventuring (hiking poles, beach chairs, etc.). They put loving thoughtfulness into their suggestions and help ensure guests love the island as much as they appear to. We had a lovely stay!

This is the perfect place to stay to explore Kauai! The Coconut Marketplace within walking distance was so convenient and had great food! The view from the lanai was great. The gear provided was much used and we were thankful to have it. Great stay!!

Heather and Khaled's condo was the perfect choice for our Kauai adventure. The grounds and surrounding area quickly felt like home base, and it is true that the location is perfectly central to the rest of the island. We loved the instant access to the beach, pool, and some of the island's best coffee at Imua, 3 mins walk from the condo. If you stay on the south shore, you'll have a harder time getting to beautiful and relaxing Hanalei on the north shore and vice versa; so, this really is the right location to explore all of Kauai.
If you still haven't decided on Kauai and you want to take my word for it, just decide now. In one stress-free week, we swam with turtles (on multiple beaches and serendipitously), saw whales, hundreds of dolphins, a mom and baby goat in the Waimea canyon. The Na Pali coast, Waimea Canyon, and beaches of Kauai will leave you speechless. We were also able to take a helicopter ride, and I could go on and on about it, but it was probably the most amazing and moving hour of my life. (and that's a 10 minute drive from this condo).
The condo itself has everything you need to feel comfortable and equip yourself for the island's many beaches. Heather and Khaled are also super accommodating, and the guide book in the condo was thorough and helpful.
I’ll recommend this condo without hesitation.

Khaled and Heather’s place was perfect for our visit to Kauai. The space had everything we needed to round out our experience since we had a kitchenette, snorkeling supplies, as well as beach equipment. I highly recommend you stay here as it is perfectly located as well as has great views from the balcony. Couldn’t have asked for a better host or place.

Was a fantastic spot for us to explore the entire island. Very centrally located. Also was great when we just wanted to relax at the hot tub in the complex or hang out and check out the local area. Would highly recommend...everything went so smoothly, and we really enjoyed our stay!

Stayed for 8 nights and it went above my expectations. Pretty much centrally located to everything on the island. Many things you can walk to also!. Pool and hot tub got an A+. The beach is literally a few steps away with a picture perfect sunrise. Quick response from the owners and very friendly. Quite area also. Will be staying again in the future, highly recommend.
Great location and beautiful place to stay. Convenient to go around the island
Great hosts! Fast, clear communication. Heather went above and beyond to make sure our stay was comfortable and check-in was effortless. Would definetely recommend!
Great hosts, great ocean view and great location. The unit had pretty much everything that we needed for our stay.
Great cozy condo is a very central location on the island. The hosts were so thoughtful and communicative during our stay. We plan on staying again in the future!

Centrally located condo with a great ocean view. It is less than an hour away from any of the famous beaches and sites of Kauai. The condo is well equipped with beach towels, snorkel and hiking poles, binoculars and even a cooler box. Few extras like tea bags and coffee were appreciated. The owners were kind enough and left us a special gift, a chocolate box and beach towels. The owner’s were prompt to reply to any question or concern. Also, their check in instructions and detailed information and tips for the area were very helpful.

We had a great time staying in Heather and Khaled’s place. We found it super central for driving around the island which was nice for driving to different beaches and hikes each day. The hidden gem is the coffee roaster next door!

This was a great place to stay! Amazing location, beautiful view of the ocean. And the hosts fully stocked the condo with snorkels, fins, chairs, boogie boards and basics to get started on your adventure. Would definitely stay here again. Thank you so much!
Amazing hospitality and a great location. Tough to beat ocean views and Kapa’a

Khaled & Heather’s place was amazing. So glad we chose to stay here for our trip to Kauai. The location is very convenient to travel to any side of the island. Also the condo is on the beach and the pool and jacuzzi was the perfect addition. I would definitely stay here again.

I was unable to stay there because of COVID quarantine, but my two daughters had the time of their life. They loved the location and said the apartment was beautiful. Lots of communication from the owners. Would definitely recommend this place to stay.

The stay was amazing and we loved the pool, beach and proximity to everything. The room was beautiful and very clean. The host was amazing and had a welcome package with recommendations for everything. I will definitely stay there again. Thank Khaled and Heather for making our visit to Kauai easy and memorable.
you can absolutly have wonderful vacation. clean roon, cozy bed, if you want just relax, enjoy beach, hiking,,,whatever you want to do, the host covered all. well equipped. amazing amenities.

The hosts were wonderful, sending a helpful welcome packet in advance of my trip & always responding promptly to messages.
The condo was beautiful with all the amenities needed. It is centrally located & within walking distance to the ocean & a shopping center. I especially enjoyed the view from the lanai & local artwork adorning the walls. I would love to stay again in the future.

Great spot with access to a cool beach and pool.

It is an interesting cross between airbnb and a resort. You get all amenities as if staying in a resort and you get the good communication, clear instructions and care from the airbnb host.
The location was perfect, easy access to different places, nearby stores, also liked the view from the balcony very much. Made a nice start of the day for us!

We had a very pleasant time in Heather's studio. Everything was perfect, the location, the studio and its equipment., the beautiful setting. All Heather's good advice made the holidays great. If we go back to Kauai, without hesitation, it will be at Heather's
Great place and location. Very clean and hosts provided lots of info on the area.
Great stay! Great hosts! I definitely recommend this place. Thanks Heather and Khalid.
Exceptional in every way.
Really close to the ocean & with a nice view right next to the pool and bar. Really good value compared to other stays!
Great location, great communication, the condo was a little dated but nevertheless in a beautiful area facing the beach and pool!

What a wonderful, relaxing place! The moment you enter the spacious, clean, and comfortable room and make your way to the lanai, you already regret you'll be leaving again. We enjoyed breathtaking sunrises on the beach and our morning coffee on the lanai looking at the ocean, the restaurants close by, and relaxing at the pretty and clean pool area with a happy hour drink from the bar. Once you're back from dinner (get takeaway and enjoy it on the lanai!) you will hear the ocean waves while you fall asleep. We already look forward to going back and can absolutely recommend staying here. Thanks for having us!

Great condo with a view of the ocean and overlooking the pool area.. Location is excellent and near restaurants and a local market. Will recommend to family members and friends who plan on going to Kauai

Our second stay in the studio and it was as good as the first time.
Location is great, close to so many restaurants and to just sit on the lanai and listen to the waves is so relaxing.
We never ran out of things to do, if you like the outdoors Kauai is the place.
Great location. The view from the lanai was really nice. Heather communicated really good. We had everything we needed in the studio and more. The beach chairs was a plus.

Heather and Khaleds condo is great! We really enjoyed our stay. The view from the condo is just beautiful and the resort with pool, hot tub and tiki bar was really nice. We also enjoyed the snorkeling gear and the beach chairs and umbrella! We would defenitely book this condo again!
Great location, spacious, clean. Easy acess onto the beach to see sunrise.

Can’t recommend enough!! This oceanfront slice of paradise is a tropical dream! This complex offers a peaceful resort feel and Khaled and Heather stocked the cozy place with every beach and exploration amenity thinkable! Very communicative and thoughtful.

This was a perfect place for our Honeymoon! The best part about the trip is Khalid and Heather put together a welcome packet with tons of information on what to do while visiting, it saved us a ton of planning time!

I cannot say enough great things about this place. Very clean, comfortable, and in the perfect location with the best amenities you can find on Kauai. Honestly, we had booked a high end resort for part of our trip and I almost canceled it because Khaled and Heathers place was in a better location with more to do and friendlier people! Would definitely stay here again.
Would definitely recommend staying here! Great location with easy check in process. Always quick to respond and lots of local recommendations in the welcome book.

I can only recommend this accommodation. Tips for designing the vacation and the most accurate descriptions of the property come from Khaled & Heather without being asked. The contact is really nice. The room with separate bathroom is clean and stocked with anything you might need, even guidebooks and various Accessories for a stay at the beach can be found there. The view from the balcony is magnificent. The location was perfect for us. What else to say? Aloha.

Everything you need is provided. Kitchen appliances including a blender to make those cold frosty drinks , fresh towels, shampoo/conditioner etc. Tommy Bahamas beach chairs , snorkel gear, boogie board and even use of a day cooler was an awesome touch. ABC store open late just around the corner with everything you need , even a small little pub right next door with live late night entertainment and a late night menu. Everything you need, is there !

Stay here!! This place is so nice to come home to at the end of the day. Khaled and Heather are very attentive and communicate very quick. They also have awesome recommendations both affordable and luxurious. We loved our stay!

Absolutely amazing place to stay! The location and view is wonderful, as is the poolside bar and hot tub! Khaled and Heather did an amazing job making sure we were prepared for our trip to include an extremely helpful welcome packet. They had anything that we could’ve possibly forgotten and then some. Nearby shops and restaurants make this place a must for any vacation!
Great place and excellent location! We were totally blown away by all the recommendations made and could not have had a better time!

We came here on our honeymoon and it was a wonderful stay. It is centrally located to explore the island and right on the beach. They have any gear you would need for a beach day away and we loved their lanai. We would come stay again!

Excellent place to stay in an overpriced vacation housing market. Very communicative hosts who provide helpful and detailed info about check-in, logistics, and local recommendations. The location is convenient to places for restaurants etc. (next to Coconut Marketplace), so we didn't end up using the kitchen, but it seemed like the basic equipment was there. Loved that they had netflix/etc., guidebooks, and amenities such as beach umbrellas, snorkel gear, beach chairs, beach bags, towels, etc. and there was a box of chocolates upon welcome. Parking was very easy, and this was a central location from which to explore. Overall, highly recommended!!

Very thoughtful and attentive hosts! Everything is accurately described. We enjoyed the fun vibes of the pool and tiki bar downstairs, and the location makes it an easy trip to a bunch of local adventures and beaches!

This condo is very conveniently located for exploring Kauai. Khaled and Heather were very responsive. We enjoyed the grounds at Islander on the Beach and the dinner options at the Cocunut Marketplace next door.
We were well cared for by Khaled and Heather and loved their little piece of paradise. It’s cosy but airy and just a lovely spot.

Wow great place to stay , the room was very clean and the location was great, the beach was so close you could hear the waves, e everything you need was close ,
The place was great the wife loved the shower and the view from the window , it was easy to check in and we also got a parking pass in no time after we arrived the directions were perfect and the parking information helped .
It’s a must stay we will be returning again if available...........

What a beautiful place to rest, relax, play and use as home base for our trip to Kauai! Condo was very clean, great suggestions from the host, and about the easiest check-in check-out! Loved our time! Many, many thanks!

The studio is located in the hotel "Islander on the Beach," but you have nothing to do with the hotel except that you have to get a parking permit card. The studio is very well appointed and has sea views. On the balcony you can sit protected, even when it rains. Overall, we can recommend this studio to anyone who wants to visit Kauai.
Beautiful views and a relaxing peaceful atmosphere.
Great location and had a beautiful view and surrounding scenery! Exactly what we needed for a relaxing getaway. Deb’s unit was comfortable, clean and welcoming.

This is our second stay at Deb’s place. It has a wonderful view of the ocean and all the amenities we needed. The pool is nice and the hot tub was wonderful. The easy ocean access was great too. It’s as close as you bc a get to “downtown Kapaa.” Close to restaurants, bike rentals, and shops. We will be back again!

A great place facing the ocean. Awesome sunrises. Very centrally located. Easy walk to shopping. The resort is also very nice with several amenities. A nice walking/cycling trail right along the beach in front of the resort. The condo is nicely furnished with pretty much everything you need. There’s a notebook with detailed instructions on how to work the TV and pretty much everything you need to know about the resort, fun destinations and Kauai.
Everything was excellent. We would highly recommend.

Deb's place was absolutely beautiful! the view from the Lanai could have kept me happy the whole time, but I loved the fact that it was centrally located on the island. We took adventures to every side of the island andd nothing was too far away. I will definitely be back!!

What a lovely vacation spot ! We spent a lot of time outdoors, but the location, the view and the accommodations were excellent. The balcony for sunrises in the morning- PERFECT ! The grounds are kept well and the hot tub was great reprieve after long hike down to Napali Coast beach. Great restaurants near by- Bobby V's has a great HH and delicious food ! Deb was so kind and responsive. I felt like we should have met her for HH ! Really loved this condo and location. Highly recommend Deb's place !

I really like the patio where you can see the beach and ocean and get the ocean breeze. And I like the nice white fuzzy towels. And the proximity to town was great. And it was very clean. Comfortable. And the pool and hot tub on site were great. Very clean.

The condo at Pono Kai was peaceful and located right on the ocean with a great view of the sunrise! Deb was very communicative, her instructions were clear and the recommendations were all great. The amenities of the condo complex were a plus as well! There is plenty to do for singles, couples and families as well! We would definitely like to stay here again :-)

We loved staying at Debs Place.
It really was so comfortable and welcoming. The view was amazing!
Front and center view of the ocean!
The home was fully stocked with all necessities. The condo was perfect for two.
Thanks Deb

Beautiful location inside a resort, steps away from beach and wonderful walking path along the water that we explored on a two hour bike ride. Enjoyed the lanai watching the waves morning and night.
Amazing 1 bedroom condo, loved this place and local recommendations on things to do. Deb is a great host, highly recommended! Would book this stay again.
Great location on the beach with nice amenities inside condo and and the complex.

As a few other reviews have said, you can hear just about every movement from surrounding apartments. As long as you’re prepared for that going in, there are no other reasons not to stay at Deb’s airbnb. It was clean, Deb was responsive and accommodating, and the location was perfect in terms of ocean view and getting around the island. Plenty of restaurants nearby.

Debs place was absolutely perfect. Super clean. It seems she had thought of everything we could ever need - beach chairs, cooler, chip clips - little things you don't think of until you need it. Central location on the island was great. Being able to walk to great restaurants was really nice - our favorites were Sam's Oceanfront and Pono Market. We rented bikes close by to take on the bike path right outside of the room which was super fun. More affordable than other comparable units on Kauai. Deb was kind and super responsive. Would stay here again 100%.
Great place.
Great place! Deb was very responsive and helpful. Definitely will rent again! Thanks for a wonderful week
The suite is in an ideal location, with lots to walk to close by. The views from the deck were incredible and the suite was well equipped with everything we needed. Would love to stay here again!

Deb's beachfront condo in Kapaa was an absolute gem! Immaculately clean, it provided the ideal space for a couple. The well-equipped kitchen and private balcony with ocean views were highlights. The beach access, proximity to amenities, and a responsive host made our stay seamless. Highly recommended for a cozy and unforgettable retreat!!!

We had a blast spending time at Deb’s place. The property feels like home and has everything you might need. Very clean and tidy condo! We had a pleasure to meet Deb herself, she’s extremely nice and sweet lady. It was a pleasure to spent time at Kauai🫶🏻
Great location to beach and restaurants. Deb is a great host and communicates well. Although the resort is older, can see pride of ownership as unit is well maintained.
Very nice!
Absolutely amazing place with an incredible view. We’ve stayed here a couple of times now and it’s been so perfect each time.

Right on the beach and easy access to running, walking and bike routes. Also right next to town so walkable to many shops and restaurants. Enjoyed eating nearby and the apartment was very clean. The AC is a lifesaver for days when humidity is very high

This is the second time we have rented from Deb. The unit was as described and Deb is so responsive and helpful. We had one small issue and Deb and her husband we on it. Thanks again, Deb....see you next time.
We loved our stay at Deb’s place - the sunrises are magnificent over the ocean and the place is well-stocked, clean and comfortable! Highly recommend to others!
Thank you. Really nice place to stay, beautiful view through balcony. Had everything we needed. Was pleasure to stay there :)

Debs place was fantastic. We very much enjoyed our stay, and the location is perfect. Located right on a paved path that runs along the ocean with perfect views of the sunrise every morning (from your lenai, OR the beach right outside) and close to restaurants, grocery, and bars. Parking is also easy with lots of spots right out front. Will hope to be back sooner than later!

We had a fantastic stay at Deb’s condo at Pono Kai! The unit had everything we needed and was in a great central location for exploring Kaua’i, with a great deck for watching the sunrises. Deb was a very communicative host, and gave helpful recommendations in her guest book and when asked (she pointed us to a great bookstore with bird and nature guides). Highly recommend!
Nothing that Deb could of done but during our stay above us they sounded like doing a remodel that was only negative all hour’s extremely noisy

It was beautifully furnished, with an amazing view of the ocean. The sunrises were breathtaking! She had beach towels, beach chairs and even snorkels for us to use. We enjoyed meals on the deck, looking at the amazing view. The hot tub and swimming pool were nice after a long day hiking. She had a nice book done up with places to go on Kauai.

Everything was just as advertised with even a few hidden gems to make our two week stay that much more comfortable. Massive beach towels, great lounge chairs for the beach and a great view from the patio. Deb was very proactive and very responsive to messaging. The front desk was easy at check in. The pool and hot top came in use often after our 8-12 mile daily hikes and our ocean kayak adventure. Felt very cozy, all the furniture was comfortable and made us feel at home. On-site laundry was very helpful and saved us from going to the laundry mat as we have in the past when staying elsewhere. Overall this was perfect in every and we had a great 5th visit to the island to celebrate our 32 wedding anniversary.

Thx for stay, we felt like home.
Very close to the beach :-))
Great experience at Deb's condo in the Pono Kai resort! Very detailed check-in instructions, and lots of helpful local tips and recommendations. Would stay again and recommend to friends/family

Everything was perfect! Great location in front of the ocean. The residence is superb with a hot tub and giant games. Deb explained everything to us for check-in. We enjoyed watching the movies on Kauai available. Thanks! We hope to be back!

Deb is easy to communicate with. The condo was excellent with a great view of the ocean. we were thrilled with the place had everything in it just like home. It was very clean and well stocked with everyday items even a bag of coffee to get us started that first morning. Did I mention the great view?
If we ever make it to Hawaii again ( I'm sure we will ) we will be looking up Deb for the same place. Overall 5 stars.
Barry & Gloria

This was exactly as advertised while we stayed on this beautiful island. We loved staying in Kapa’a since it was central to all the activities we were doing. The Pono Kai resort was a great low-key spot to enjoy between our adventures. Thanks Deb!
We had a wonderful stay! The room was perfect. The place was vey Clean, extremely well stocked and in a great location. I would definitely recommend this room to a friend!

Cozy place walking distance to the beach. Had everything we needed and they supplied beach towels. Good air conditioning and ceiling fans and good area close to a lot of shops and restaurants. Overall great experience.
Perfect location, beautiful property, all the amenities.

Debs place was great! There is a great view from the patio and living room area. The place felt like home and very relaxing. There was already extra things like beach chairs, beach towels, and a cooler already for you for a beach day!

We really enjoyed staying at Deb’s condo. It was clean, homey, pleasantly decorated, and in a great location for walking around town and along the beach. We especially appreciated the abundant air conditioning (in bedroom and living room), beach chairs, plenty of towels, coffee supplies, and a few basic things for cooking. Deb was attentive and her binder with local recommendations was super helpful. The resort itself has lots of amenities, and it was convenient to rent snorkel gear there, do laundry, use the barbecue, and have a concierge to help plan activities and make reservations. Thanks, Deb!

Deb’s place is beautifully located next to a walking and biking path that is right next to the ocean. It’s peaceful and very relaxing. Lots of local food options nearby and smoothies at Lana’s cafe is a must! Deb was quick to respond and offered recommendations when asked. Will definitely stay here again!

We enjoyed the breathtaking view from the balcony and the wonderful birds. The oceanside walking path was divine.
The traffic was was heavy at times; we were glad that stores and restaurants were walkable.
Deb provided a great library of books about Hawaii and Kauai..... plus novels. The DVD player was a great addition.
I wish we had had more days to enjoy the complex's facilities.

My daughter and I had an absolutely wonderful time on our first trip to Kauai, and Deb made our trip extra special with a beautiful condo that offered a spectacular view of the ocean and great amenities that made us feel better than at home! It was very easy to find with detailed instructions Deb provided, and the Kapa'a location was perfect. We couldn't have asked for a better stay, and want to go back as soon as possible! Deb is an excellent host, and we are so thankful that she provided us with a beautiful place to stay in the most beautiful place in the world.

We enjoyed the ocean view most of all! The condo was very clean and tastefully furnished. There is a wonderful walking path along the ocean - small, not crowded beaches everywhere. Our only issue was the noise level from the upstairs condo - kids running up and down the hallway, pounding, stomping, crying. The walls may be a little “thin”.
Overall, however, it was a very nice place and Deb was VERY helpful.

This is the perfect location for staying in Kauai. Fabulous ocean views, swimmable beach, right on the bike and walking trail, near the little town area of Kapaa (which we love!). We would definitely stay here again. The pool was very nice and this place has a bunch of extra amenities like tennis courts, ping pong tables, an 18-hole putting course, croquet, and more. We used the oat washers and dryers and they worked great. Clean, gentle on clothes, always available when we needed them. The complex is a bit older which I think makes it easier to get a reasonably priced fantastic spot right on the ocean. Deb was super responsive when we needed help with the tv controls. Overall great.

They very first thing we noticed when we walked is WOW, the view! The slider has an open view directly into the Ocean and it is amazing!
The condo is very clean and Deb has an excellent selection of products available such as mosquito repellent, after sun aloe, and other bathroom amenities. There are plenty of bath towels and beach towels. The kitchen has all the necessities and you get a starter pack of coffee for that first morning. There is a good assortment of dishes and pots and pans if you choose to do some of your own cooking.
The condo was perfect for our stay. The resort and grounds were lovely. We had a rough trip off of the island with a delayed and then canceled flight. Deb was great to work with and helped out immensely when all of these last minute changes were happening with our flights. Without her help we would have been stranded at the airport for more than 12 hours!
We would highly recommend for your stay.

Deb is a great host. She leaves clear instructions and is responsive and reasonable. She left a fan for us in the room that made sleeping comfortable. The condo is older but cared for. The grounds are lovely and clean. The best part of this condo is the unobstructed ocean view. Very relaxing. It is located in busy Kapa'a, so shops and restaurants are walkable--and there is also the accompanying traffic. It was helpful to have some staples like oil and a few spices in the cupboard. The beach chairs and cooler are nice to have.
Amazing stay! Already booked to return. Deb was great and we can’t wait to come back!

Deb was a fantastic host from the moment we booked. She provided helpful information about the island and was very responsive. Her place was sparkling clean, and even better than the photos. We loved the ocean view and proximity to walking path and town. Her stay was a great value.

Beautiful View!
Loads of extra's provided within the Condo and for Your Use!!

Absolutely everything was exactly as promised, and there was even more than expected! Gorgeous view of the ocean, everything was very clean and comfortable, and it was roomier than expected too. There were so many added nice touches!! Two sturdy backpack-style low beach chairs, four huge thick beach towels, plenty of towels, etc. plus older clean-up towels for the Kaua’i red dirt, absolutely everything you’d need in the kitchen for cooking, an insulated bag we used as a beach cooler with the frozen water bottles already in the freezer, toaster, coffeemaker plus electric hot water kettle for our hot tea, plenty of paper products, (even zip-lock baggies for a picnic lunch), all the bathroom necessities plus some sunscreen and aloe for sunburns. The welcome notebook on the desk provided all the necessary info plus tips and suggestions relative to the island and the area. The resort itself was beautiful, and there were so many amenities- we could have done so much more there! Wow!

We enjoyed staying at Deb’s condo. The location facing the ocean & being on a busy walking, biking path we really enjoyed. The resort is older but the grounds & building are still well cared for. Kapaa has gotten a lot busier than what we remember but the resort itself is quiet & relaxing. Over all we enjoyed ourselves.

Deb's condo did not disappoint! Stunning views, enjoyed sitting out in the morning and watching the sunrise and it’s within walking distance to Kapaa Main Street shops and the bike path too. Everything we needed and much more was there for us, including snorkel gear, beachchairs, and some toiletries and laundry stuff. Her binder of information was very helpful. She replied quickly when I asked questions. It’s a perfect location to explore the island whether you want to go north or south. Would love to stay here again, when we come back to Kauai!
Debs place fit us very well. The view out the expansive sliding doors of the ocean was stunning. Especially the sunset on our first night.

We enjoyed our stay at so much! The main road is a little busy but the resort is quiet and so peaceful to watch the ocean from Deb’s condo! The location in Kapa’a is convenient for accessing all areas of the island.
Deb made the stay so easy and was great with responding, as needed! Highly recommended and we will look to stay again in the future!
We had a wonderful and peaceful stay at Deb's place. The viewwas stunning. We are looking forward to staying here againin the future.
Loved just opening the door and walking out to the beach
Everything we wanted. Comfortably furnished and well-equipped. Questions/concerns got immediate responses. Great location with walking/biking trail along the ocean right out in front.

Deb is truly a superhost. We loved the condo. The condo was perfect: clean, comfortable, and we had everything that we needed, as Deb provides wonderful "extras". Additionally, the view was excellent!

The condo was very nice and clean. Had chairs and a few staples in the kitchen. All you need to cook and serve a meal, except for the food of course! Bath necessities as well. Books to borrow if you wanted. We were taking the red eye and had kayaking planned for our last day, Deb was very accommodating! Thank you for being such a great host, Deb!

The place is very comfortable. It is located right by the beach so we can see the wave from the balcony. It is also located near a lot of stores and restaurant where we can walk to get coffee and food. the furniture are comfortable as well. Deb provided detail instruction on how to check in and make sure we are aware before arriving so we don't run into problem.

Love staying in Kapaa as it is centrally located and has the small laid back casual beach town vibe. Staying at this place allowed us to walk to many restaurants and shops and was a short drive to many more. The ocean view and sounds provided the peace and serenity we look for in Kauai. The easily accessible boardwalk along the ocean is a definite plus also.

Deb is a phenomenal host and her condo has virtually everything you need for a great stay. The AC units in both the living area and bedroom is a big plus. Although it cooled down it was nice to have. Her condo is cute, comfy and has great amenities.- lots of towels, dishes, pans, stuff for cooking like spices, oils, etc, beach chairs and more! You can't go wrong with Deb's place! We'll be back for sure! :)

Elderly couple from Germany: After the island hopping we were looking for accommodation for a quiet holiday for 7 nights. After everything we saw from the other islands and accommodations (hotels, AirBnBs), the choice to stay with Deb was perfect, as the surrounding area and island are also very nice.
As an urban area, you have Kapaa with the restaurants and shopping facilities. The resort is well maintained, and you have a Hospitallity Room if you want to freshen up before an evening flight to lax or SEA. This will give you a day.
In our opinion, the most important thing about the apartment is the sea view. Instead of rushing the air conditioning (October) we had the sound of the ocean and (priceless) every morning the sunrise. The important thing because you don't really need to talk about the apartment. Perfect for 2 people. Nothing is lacking. Everything is very tidy, flowers on the table, even snorkeling equipment in the closet. In the evening then Netflix, etc. In the apartment there is a small library where the guidebook about Kauai is the best thing to find in the genus.
Communication with Deb was already at an almost personal level before the visit.
The apartments in the resort but also for all other accommodations, just American, are very noisy, but this is only a disadvantage if you have ruthless neighbors – we did not have.
We think we'll be looking for a long time in the future to find something like this.

5 stars BUT.. if you’re a really light sleeper not sure this place is for you. The walls are paper thin. I kid you not I legit heard someone snoring. So that made it hard to go to sleep for me during that night. But besides that the view is gorgeous! Everything was so clean and well organized and such. She is an amazing host!!
A few things I highly recommend:
Moloa’a beach! What a beautiful and fun beach. It was so different on how to get to it. Loved it.
Zip lining. Although we didn’t get to do the whole thing due to weather, it was so fun!!
Breakfast go to kountry kitchen: avocado Benedict w/iced tea w/some of their mango juice. YUM.. and anuenue cafe! Lilikoi tea [now my fav new fruit] and the French toast!
Dinner go to the plantation house by the Gaylord’s for a classy nice dinner. And if you really want to get fancy go to the beach house!

Deb's condo was amazing! Very clean, tidy and had everything we needed. The view from the balcony offered amazing sun rises and the location was a perfect hub to explore the island. The resort was kept clean and the pool area was better than expected.
We were fortunate enough to meet Deb and she is absolutely lovely. She was incredibly helpful with rebooking our trip about 3 or 4 times during the Covid turbulance and made a very stressful time that bit easier.
Amazing condo, amazing host and an amazing honeymoon. Thanks Deb!!

I can’t say enough positive things about Deb’s. The condo is in a fabulous resort with pool, tennis, lawn chess and so many more amenities. The condo is clean, air conditioned ( so important on hot humid days!) The kitchen has everything you need for coffee and cooking. Thank you Deb for a wonderful vacation!!!!!
Deb’s place exceeded our expectations! Beautiful ocean view. Lots of activities and bbq for communal use. Definitely would stay there again.
Loved the view from this room. It was better than expected. it was cean and close to stores and places to eat. Also has beach chairs and towels. Thank you Deb, you thought of everything. ❤

Great condo, was very clean and had a great view of the ocean. There are plenty of small businesses and restaurants within walking distance and the location of condo makes it easy to get to either north or south side of the island. The host was very easy to contact and would always get back super quick! I can't recommend this place more, it was a fabulous stay. My only complaint is that we couldn't stay longer :)

Our stay here completely exceeded our expectations. It is just too good! Location is awesome with stunning view of the ocean which is actually just steps away (really). Deb is a Super hostess! Most highly recommended.

We enjoyed our stay at Deb’s condo. The location is great and we found so much to do within walking distance that you can easily spend many days without the need of a car. The views to the beach were great and the property was well maintained. Our only issue was on the first night one of the neighbors seemed to be watching movies and partying a bit loudly and the noise really carries through the walls. Aside from that, we had a great time and really appreciated Deb’s communication - she is the greatest and does so much to make sure your stay at the condo is as good as it can be!

This is the perfect place to stay - clean, spacious, with a beautiful view! Deb is a great host, she is so helpful and responds very quickly. The apartment has everything you need, we would definitely rexommend it!
Couldn’t have been better. Apartment was beautiful and equipped with everything I needed (and lots of lovely touches / local design). Deb's was very helpful and the location was great.

The location was great! Loved that Deb was easy to contact and ask questions and she responded very quickly. We were able to make breakfast and even dinner a few nights. We had a rental car and went to every side of the island without any problems. The view from the condo was beautiful! Great way to wake up and have coffee!

Great place with Ocean view and easy beach access.
Debs place was a perfect location, quiet, comfortable, ocean view, 1-2 minute walk to the beach. Condo was clean and very well stocked. Comfortable breeze with patio and windows open, air is also there but we didn’t need often. Grocery store down the road, shave ice with in walking distance as well as shopping and other places to eat. Would recommend and definitely will stay again. Mahalo!

We were happy all around with our stay at Deb:
- The apartment was clean and homey, we felt comfortable. The sea view is insane.
- You can see the sunrise from the balcony
- The sea is reachable in 2min walk
- The surroundings are fantastically landscaped (flowers, trees, palm trees, pond, etc).
- The kitchen equipment is good, there are a few spices and sauces that are regularly replaced.
- The location of the apartment is optimal, on the one hand for excursions to the north and south of the island and on the other hand the airport is very close (still no aircraft noise)
- There is a very helpful "guestbook" with house rules and tips for excursions and shopping possibilities
- Deb gave us valuable tips, where we can snorkel well and where we can possibly find turtles. And we were lucky, we saw many colorful fish and even saw turtles grazing!
- The check-in and check-out at the hotel reception worked flawlessly
- Access to the apartment was easy and safe
- Deb was always very quick to respond (via Airbnb app) which we really appreciated
- There is good shopping in the area (e.g. Big Save Market).
- You can do laundry and tumblers
The only thing we didn't like was that the bath towels and swim trunks barely dried. However, this is weather dependent and Deb can't improve on that.
We were very happy and can definitely recommend the accommodation!
Great location.

Check-in was easy. Lots of parking. The resort has plenty of amenities (outdoor games/pool/etc) if you're hanging around at the resort during the day; however, most shut down at 7pm. Convenient location within walking distance of the main street in Kapaa. Beach at resort is not lifeguarded and conditions were unfavorable for swimming/snorkeling (June). The condo had a strong musty smell and felt fairly dated. Carpet and some fixtures could use an update. Deb was very kind and her binder could be super helpful for anyone looking for suggestions during their stay.
Great location, comfortable condo, right on the beach.

The condo is perfectly located in the east central part of the island and provides equal driving time to the north and south coasts, and on the edge of Kapa’a allowing us to walk to shops and restaurants.
The condo was extremely clean and very comfortable. Deb is very pleasant and easy to communicate with. I highly recommend this one.
Great location! Had everything we needed.

This apartment was comfortable and in a great location. Good shopping within walking distance and some good restaurants close by. We were very close to the beach and the view from the balcony was very enjoyable. Deb was always very responsive and very sweet. We had some bad flight issues and she left both a bottle of wine and coffee for our arrival.

Love this condo! The whole booking experience was so easy and Deb is a wonderful host being so accommodating and communicative. Perfect location right by Old Town Kapaa and the view simply made it for us! Impeccable grounds and staff. Can’t wait to come back!

Everything you’ll need (groceries & restaurants etc) are all centrally located in Kapaa. Walk if you can, as traffic can be bad at times. Big save was the place to shop for groceries and there are farmer markets all over the island. The Lemon Grass restaurant was our favorite along with the Oasis.
very friendly, great driver with knowledge of different routes during heavy traffic; also great communication and reliability!...........thanks, Deb

Imagine staying in the middle of the most beautiful spot on the island….a place where from your lanai you can watch the sun rise with all its glory! A place with beautiful artwork and little island touches everywhere sprinkled around the condo. There IS such a place, and it’s this very lovely spot, owned by Deb! She was a joy to work with from the moment we booked with her last July. She immediately made us feel so welcomed as tenants in her home throughout our conversations on Airbnb. Her condo was very well furnished and has (seriously) the most spectacular views. She was easy to communicate with, had swift replies, and was extremely helpful. If we get the chance to come back to Kauai, I’ll definitely try to grab this same condo / both for the the place and the owner!
Perfect place to stay while seeing all Kauai has to offer. The condo is spacious, comfortable and has amazing sunrise view. Your won’t be disappointed!
Great place to stay. Clean. Efficient air conditioning. Very short walk into Kapaa town. Beautiful sunrises. We recommend.

Deb’s condo was perfect in all ways. Great ocean view and loved the walking path just outside. Great host with all amenities, super suggestions, local knowledge, and responsive for all questions. Would love to stay there again
Excellent host. The unit is not super fancy but the location is great. The resort only has one small pool and hot tub. Not really enough for so many units.

Awesome location; even better than expected. Ocean breezes and a view that is hard to beat. So many great food choices within walking distance. Deb was quick to respond and super friendly. Would love to stay here again.
This condo has the location! Right on the beach! Well stocked and supplied. It is within very short walking distance of shopping, restaurants and grocery.
Great location. Lots of BBQs. If the one in front of your condo is busy simply find another close by. The kitchen was great. Everything we needed was provided. The view was suburb. Loved it. 👍🏻😀
Loved Deb's place! Perfect location!

Deb’s place was perfect for us. Beautiful ocean view. Only a few steps to the beach. The town of Kapaa is conveniently located for traveling up and down the island for excursions. We like to prepare our own meals, so having a spacious, full kitchen and dining table were us what we needed. We enjoyed coffee and watching the sunrise each morning. Deb was a wonderful, responsive host. She even gave us newly picked avocados and was kind enough to ship us our binoculars after we forgot them after our stay. I highly recommend her place.

Unit has great view of ocean to East including fantastic sunrises. Beach is about 75 yards straight out. Plenty of amenities around condos to keep one busy if you are not at beach most of time. Numerous restaurants and shops within walking distance. Walking/bike path along beach about 1/2 mile in either direction.

Debs place is great!! Perfect location. Easily accessible to everywhere on the island. The view, walking trail, restaurants and shopping are all close and convenient. A great municipal golf course right down the road.
The condo was well furnished, the bed and recliners are the best!! So comfortable to relax after a day of adventure. Loved that there were hammocks throughout the property to lay around, read a book and sway in the ocean breeze.
This is our go to place from now on!!
Great place to enjoy all of Kauaii!!

this place was perfect. Located on the second floor,, it provides a beautiful view the ocean. We spent every morning drinking coffee on the balcony. The kitchen was fully stocked with coffee and some condiments in the fridge. The condo itself was fully stocked with beach towels, shampoo, soap, beach chairs, books, a helpful guide, etc. The condo was so clean and comfortable. It is also very centrally located to tons of shops and restaurants. We really had a beautiful time.

Deb’s place is amazing. I saw the sunrise every day. The location was perfect for us. A lot of good restaurants and stores at a walking distance. Deb checked on us and made sure everything was fine. Will definitely stay here again when coming to Kauai.
Husband and I had a wonderful babymoon at Pono Kai, Deb is a great host!
0utstanding airbnb
Great location. The on site were amenities were nice, and the proximity to beaches and restaurants were amazing

Deb’s place is in a great location in relation to the shops of Kapa’a. The view from the lanai is beautiful and a great place for breakfast. As others have mentioned the recliners in the living room we’re so cozy and the bed as well. We’ve stayed in other Airbnb’s where the bed was not comfy at all so we appreciated it. Deb was also a total sweetheart and brought us some additional towels during our stay. Check in was flawless. Overall a great airbnb!

Great location. While this unit sits in the second row of buildings back from the ocean - no worry. It has a great view of the water with fantastic sunrises. Complex is not far north of the airport - about 15 min north. Located at the south end of the bike/walking trail - although bike rentals are scarce for some reason.
Deb is a great hostess. Very helpful with communication, etc. Check-in process is a breeze and while this is technically a condo it is operated kinda like a hotel complete with front desk and concierge. Enjoy your stay!

The view, location and accomodations were exceptional! Deb was a fantastic host. We had everything we could possibly need or want and the Pono Kai Resort was fantastic for us and our family that came to visit.

This was the most comfortable Airbnb experience my wife and I have had so far. Not only was the bed comfortable but the recliners in the living room were beyond comfortable. I may have fallen asleep on them once or twice. The location was absolutely perfect as well, my parents have a timeshare at the same resort so it was really nice to be near them. Now we did have a problem with the AC units but Deb was more than accommodating, and honestly as long as we kept the sliding glass door and windows open, the ocean breeze was more than enough to keep the place cool. When we return to Kauai, we hope to stay here again.
Great place to stay!

This place was perfect! It was super clean and the furniture was so comfortable. Also the sheets and towels were hotel quality! The condo is in the perfect location to walk to restaurants and shops and there is a bus stop right out front which is super convenient! We spent hours on the patio relaxing and basking in the sun. Hopefully in the future we can make it to Kapaa again and we will definitely be looking for Deb’s place. She was easy to communicate with and made sure we had everything we needed. I can’t say enough good things I’m just sad we eventually had to leave!

This condo is the PERFECT spot on Kauai. It is steps from a public beach that is rarely busy, located within a very well kept complex with many amenities and a great location on the East shore in Kappa. Great restaurants and shops are within walking distance and the resort is within easy driving distance to everywhere we needed to go on the island. Deb is a fantastic host providing great detailed instructions and suggestions. The condo was in great shape and as described. Can’t wait to go back and stay at this same place. Did I mention, the sunrise can either be seen on the lanai or a few steps down to the beach. It’s breathless and wonderful to be so close.

Elaine and I have been going to Kauai for 40 plus years and Deb’s condo is now at the top of our list of places to stay. The unit has an incredible ocean view. Deb had obviously put a lot of thought and effort into selection of the artwork that graced the walls and in the selection of furniture. I don’t think we have ever stayed in a place in which the owner not only promptly responded but did so with a finely developed sense of humor. So, bottom line: If you are going to Kauai you cannot go wrong by staying at her Pono Kai condo.
This place is beautiful and Deb is amazing. When she can she will work with you and when she can’t she is very upfront and honest. She communicates wonderfully. I recommend this place and her highly.
Amazing view from this comfortable condo. A short walk into town. Excellent host and all the amenities you could want.

Deb was a great host. She went out of her way to help us. Gave us great recommendation on what to do, what to see and what restaurants to eat at. Views of the ocean from her balcony were amazing, especially the sunrise. We will be back. 6/2/21

We loved our stay!!! Pono Kai’s location is excellent; walking distance to the town (make sure to brunch at Java Kai) and is right next to the beach. Ample parking, safe area. The apartment is very clean, well equipped (incl beach gear!!) and oh my the view is so amazing. Check in was a piece of cake, Deb is an experienced host. Can’t wait to be back!
Deb provided great information on the area and an excellent price for a beachside condo. Will stay here again!

This place is a great Condo in a great location. The Olympic is 2 blocks away, various shops and the best part, the ocean, beach and walking path is just steps away. And even better, it's centrally located on the island. Wanna go north? OK! Wanna head south? No problems.

Highly recommend staying at Deb’s place! Located near the heart of old historic Kapaa with proximity to shops, restaurants (we frequented Sam’s Oceanview, Olympic Café and Java Kai). The unit is well equipped for all your needs and provided us with awesome morning sunrises while enjoying breakfast and coffee on the lanai. Steps from oceans sandy beach where we relaxed in owner provided beach chairs, spent time in the water and saw a few monk seals. We ended our last night in Kauai with a sunset cruise to the Napili coast where we got to see spinner dolphins and the gorgeous coastline. Communication with Deb was awesome, and she provided a few extra amenities. Great host and great place to stay!
Deb's place is the absolute best location if you're looking to explore the east side. There are tons of restaurants, bars & local beaches. Must stay if you're wanting the local experience!
Perfect weather, great view, all included facilities , what else would one need for a great vacation, forget your worries and take this place for relaxation and enjoy your time
An amazing apartment with a direct view to the ocean.

We had a wonderful stay! There was everything that one could need - also beach chairs, umbrella etc. The location was great with shops, cafes and grocery stores nearby. Deb was very kind and always available when we had any questions. Would totally recommend staying at Deb‘s condo! :)

Deb is a great communicator. She helped us navigate the quarantine process, and always responded quickly to any questions we had. Great location right on the bike/walking path, and two blocks from the center of downtown Kapaa. A very comfortable place for a long term stay.
Deb's space is really lovely and comfortable. Deb herself was very kind and generous, and we really appreciated the treats from her garden.

Deb's place is in the middle of the island so it is easy to either head north or south. It is located right in the thick of Kapaa town so you can easily walk to shops and restaurants. We really liked Java Kai for a quick bite in the morning and Taps and Hops had a great happy hour. We didn't see any whales from the balcony like the review previously mentioned which we were bummed about but that didn't stop us from enjoying beautiful sunrises on the lanai every morning. The entire resort was pretty empty due to minimal travel with Covid restrictions. Check in and communication with deb was super easy and we can't recommend her place enough. It's more spacious than it looks in the photos and has anything you could possibly need for your stay.

Staying at Deb’s place was awesome! The location is perfect for walking to lots of shops and restaurants and along the path along the ocean. There are lots of activities in the complex itself, (including a great pool and hot tub!) and the unit was clean and comfortable. Deb was also super friendly and responsive when I am a couple of questions.
The best part was that I am saw humpback whales scouting and breaching just offshore while drinking my morning coffee on the balcony. Magical! I would definitely recommend stay at Deb’s condo!

The place is at the perfect location! Just a walk to some of our favorite coffee shops, shops, right on the ocean!
We loved the fresh orchids in the condo and even the soap and shampoo were so good, we ended up buying some for ourselves. She took care of the small details and that makes the stay that much more special.
Deb is such a wonderful host too! She guided us and kept us informed through the covid requirements and was available throughout our journey! She truly made sure we had a good time in Kauai, beyond just our stay.
To me, a place is defined by the food, the people and the experiences. And staying here will make sure all three will be on point!

Perfect place to stay while visiting Kauai. Great central location for driving to all the sites in the island. Within walking distance to town- we loved getting up early to grab coffee and watch the sunrise on the beach. The condo has everything you could need. Thank you Deb!

Deb is very friendly and easy to communicate person. Smooth check-in, quick response to any question, lot of local tips. Also we got a pleasant surprise - fresh avocado and organic eggs! Her apartment is just perfect. You will have everything you need, including full-loaded kitchen, beach&snorkeling gear. Very quiet, comfortable place. Convinient location near the airport allows to reach any part of the island within an hour. And we didn't use AC at all due to fresh breeze from the ocean.
Place was great and so was Deb. Amazing sunrise views over the ocean from the kitchen. Ice cold AC. Centrally located and within walking distance to Kapaa.

Thank you so much! We loved relaxing in the recliners and looking out at the beautiful view! Beach access was lovely and it was such a convenient location to anywhere we wanted to explore! We’ll be back!

We had a wonderful time! The condo is centrally located in town and most everything is walkable. The kauai walking/bike path that runs parallel with the ocean in front of the condo goes for miles. It is a great way to walk the coastline.
Deb was super accommodating and was always reachable.
The beach is spectacular, and the view from the balcony is beautiful.
We traveled to the north and south shores of the island and can’t wait to return!
Excellent place near beach and activity trail.

We had a lovely stay at Deb’s condo. The photos don’t do her place justice. The lanai was like an extra outdoor room with an incredible ocean view and we never need to turn on the a/c, instead keeping the sliding door open with a couple of bedroom windows to get a lovely breeze coming through. The kitchen is well stocked with essentials and the beach gear came in handy. Pono Kai resort is centrally located in Kapaa, within walking distance to several stores and restaurants. The traffic can get so bad in the afternoons that it’s often faster to walk! One pro tip: we should have paid more attention to her guest guide, because we got ourselves lost on the way to the Wed Kapaa farmer’s market. Don’t rely on google maps! ;) Our favorite walk was to head North on the beach path out of town and look for migrating whales. It’s such a magical spot in the world. We’d love to have an opportunity to return.
Great view and good people watching. Lots of extra touches that make a beach stay great!
Great location, just a very short walk to a great beach and awesome location to explore the whole island. Deb had all the essentials for the beach. Very clean and comfortable condo!
Great space! Great view! Great location!
Deb was fantastic! The place with the ocean view was wonderful. Deb was quick to respond to any questions and was very helpful in tips to better enjoy the island.

Perfect condo for a relaxed and oceanfront experience. It had everything necessary to make your stay cozy and comfortable. Really loved the location as it was accessible to all the places around the Island. Would definitely recommend this place 👍🏼

This is one of the nicest places to stay in Kapaa, with beautiful views of the ocean from the Lanai. Deb is a great host and the location is centrally located for checking out all the other places one will want to visit while on the island of Kauai. The pictures speak for themselves.

This cozy beachside condo is the perfect place to stay when you find yourself in Kauai! There’s really nothing like waking up to watch the beautiful Hawaiian sunrise on the lanai. The location is perfect: the airport is about a 20 minute drive away, there are many stores and restaurants in the area to explore, and you’re a mere stones throw away from the beach. Deb is an absolutely amazing host. Her condo is equipped with cooking necessities (pots, pans, even containers for any leftovers, etc), beach equipment (chairs, towels, snorkeling equipment, etc), ac!!!, TVs, WiFi, books, guidebooks...I really could go on, but you really should just visit and find out for yourself! Deb always responded very quickly to all my messages and even let us stay a little later than checkout time. I highly recommend staying here because honestly, I would love to stay there again!

Deb’s place is in a great location in Kapa’a. It’s nicely appointed with AC both the living room and bedroom. There’s a beautiful beach nearby and also a cute town that’s within walking distance. Mahalo Deb for your hospitality!

We have just returned from 2 incredibly relaxing weeks at Deb's wonderful condo. This place has it all - a wonderful view of the ocean, plenty of comfortable space, nicely decorated and a short walk to restaurants, shops and bike rental.
There are beach chairs, big beach towels and snorkel equipment, so you're ready to go...Deb even brought us fresh eggs from her chickens and avocados from her tree. Thanks again Deb - we can't wait to come back!

I was so happy with this place. My boyfriend and I wanted a place that had an ocean view, kitchen, and good location. Deb’s place was wonderful. We had all the beach necessities and didn’t have to purchase or rent equipment for our trip. She had beach chairs, towels, snorkel gear, a little cooler, etc. we walked to java kai for coffee and Pono market for poke almost every day. We had a wonderful stay and could swim at the beach out front easily if we didn’t feel like going anywhere. Sad to leave!

So much attention to detail! Virtually everything you’ll need for a full Kauai experience. Extremely comfortable and stylish accommodations with an outstanding view (exquisite sunrises!), and near shopping and great dining, most within walking distance. All other Kauai adventures are easy to navigate from this home base, such as boat rides along the Nā Pali coast, or a helicopter ride over the entire island. Deb provides a comprehensive list of activities and contact numbers if that’s your interest. If all you want is relaxation and gorgeous scenery, look no further. Whatever your whim for the day, this is an outstanding location for you. I do hope we may find ourselves back one day.
Excellent place with everything you need. Deb is great!!

The condo is clean and well-equipped and furnished. We found the bed to be very comfortable - not too soft or firm. The Pono Kai grounds are very well kept and quite nice. The location is fantastic. It's walking distance to many shops and restaurants. The owner's communication is timely and very responsive. She lives on island so she can handle any issue that may arise. We highly recommend staying there. The price to value is excellent.

The ocean front condo is a wonderful place to stay. We watched the sun rise and Listened to the ocean waves on the patio. The room is very clean with beautiful decorations. Very Hawaiian living! Our host Deb is very considerate and attentive. This place has everything we needed,we’ll definitely recommend to our friends!
Deb and the spot were awesome! Easy access to the beach, restaurants, and shaved ice!
This was a wonderful place to stay. The location, the communication, the helpfulness: everything was above what we expected.

We had a great time at Deb's place. One thing I didn't see much in other reviews is the location. It's in Kapa'a, within walking distance of the main street, so it's easy to go out and get a quick bite -- and, of course, it's right by the ocean. You can drive to anywhere on the island within an hour and a half, and there are great spots within a 15 minute drive for lazier days (Kauai does have some public transit but I would definitely recommend a car).
Easy check-in and great location

The room was much better than the photos showed - great open space with an oceanfront view, bathroom was a lot nicer than a lot of the other places I have stayed at in Hawaii, and plenty of kitchen amenities. The resort itself is great, you’re right on the beach and there’s a pool and jacuzzi for winding down after a long day. Location was central, easy to get to and from the sites we wanted to see. There are also a few waterfalls / lookouts that are close by. Also within walking distance of grocery stores and restaurants. Deb was an amazing host, always responded quickly and did not pester us at all. 100% recommend if you are staying in Kauai!

Deb is a superhostage!!! We are very happy because experience was better that we would imagine.
Very nice place with all facilities and more that we expected!!!!
It has a perfect location and a beautiful place to enjoy perfect vacation
We love it
Mahalo!!!!

This condo is located in a picturesque spot with morning sunrises on the beach and access to the beach right out your door!! The facility is well equipped and Deb was EXTREMELY communicative with us on check-in, willingness to assist in any areas, and phenomenally responsive to any problems we encountered. She even went the extra mile and brought us some eggs from her chickens along with some fresh flowers due to a small inconvenience we encountered! When we were getting ready to leave on the last day, she was kind enough to allow us to leave our luggage at the condo as she had no new guests that day! Could not have imagined a more gracious, attentive and kind hostess!!

Both Deb & her condo deserve 5 stars!
Her oceanfront condo is very clean, comfortable, & well-appointed. It is situated oceanfront, about midway along the 9-mile path, and is an excellent place for enjoying a relaxing, romantic getaway.
The Pono Kai resort itself is older, but the grounds are well-maintained & beautiful! Resort staff are friendly & polite, & Check-in/Check-out were quick & easy. There are many outdoor activities to enjoy without even leaving the resort, and the ample parking is free.
Once inside Deb's condo you can relax & unwind in a comfortable home away from home! The oceanfront view is spectacular & the soothing sound of the surf is all yours!
Her kitchen is well-stocked with all needed for whipping up your favorite dishes! The bed is so comfy, we slept well from the very first night! In the morning the amazing sunrises are right there to greet you as you sip your coffee!
The condo has A/C in the living room & bedroom, but we hardly used it because ocean breezes & fans kept us comfortable.
During the day we took full advantage of using Deb's great beach towels & chairs, as well as the cooler, sunscreen, snorkels, & other water gear. When we returned from our excursions to Princeville, Poipu, and Waimea Canyon & other great places we found the recliners to be even more comfortable than we had imagined!
From the condo it is just a short walk to shopping in old town Kapa'a, & several local eateries. We rented bikes nearby and loved taking morning rides along the 9 mile path.
The condo itself is a real gem but I also can't say enough good about Deb! She is a perfect host: extremely cordial & helpful with every piece of information & all the tips you need for a wonderful, memorable stay! She is easy to work with, & goes above & beyond to accommodate & make herself available for questions prior to & throughout the stay. All of the communication back & forth, was all initiated by us, and our privacy was completely respected & honored.
When our 9 nights were up & we could not bear to leave Deb graciously allowed us to extend our stay an additional 2 nights! She and her husband Dan even volunteered to accommodate our need to store all of our luggage & freshen up for a late flight out, hours after we had checked out!
I can confidently recommend!
We had such a fantastic time at Deb's condo. It was perfectly located right in old Kapaʻa and had everything we needed, from sun block to beach chairs and even a cooler!

Deb’s place is amazing. Close to everything. She provides everything you could possibly want. The unit is spacious and tastefully decorated. The ocean breeze kept us comfortable. We didn’t need to use the AC! We will definitely stay with Deb again.

My husband and I loved our stay here! The location is amazing!! The condo is on the second floor and has a lanai that gives you a front row view of the ocean. We happened to catch the sunrise on our last morning and it was the perfect way to end our trip. It is also walking distance from old town Kapaa so there are plenty of shops and places to eat nearby.
The condo comes stocked with basic cooking supplies (spices, olive oil) and plenty of pans and utensils in case you want to cook. Foodland is also a short drive away. Deb had beach supplies available for us to borrow as well as a notebook full of tips on things to do and how to drive around the island! This was the perfect place to stay and relax for our three days on Kauai.

Where to begin - location is perfect! We woke up to watch sunrises right from the balcony every morning, the walking path is right out the back of the condo, so many amenities withing walking distance! Full AC although we only used it in the bedroom, the breeze was plenty for the rest of the space. Kitchen is fully furnished for whatever cooking you have planned. The pool looked great but we opted for the ocean. Deb is super communicative and had useful suggestions for us - she's available when you need her but doesn't hover. Absolutely amazing stay and we'll be returning!
On the beach. Had great dinners walking distance. Hemmingway Cafe is a jewel. They make the best Bloody Mary. Oceanview - Great food great location. Street Burger. Great food
Deb was very thoughtful as soon as we booked and throughout our stay. Everything was totally as described in the listing, the electros are practically new and very clean.

Deb's place is centrally located on the east coast of Kauai and enables rapid access to both the north and south shores. Old town Kapaa was right next door and an easy stroll for dining/gift buying. You'll wake up to a direct view of the sunrise (if you're an early riser) with the ocean in the foreground. Maintained grass and palm trees also in the foreground make for fantastic sunrise pics! The condo grounds were very well maintained with lots of activities to enjoy onsite (shuffleboard, pool, bocce ball, cricket, etc.). Deb pays attention to every detail to make the condo warm and cozy. Thanks, Deb!

Noisy!
This condo is in a perfect location. Close to the beach and a beautiful view. The walking path in front is a wonderful way to see the ocean and walk to nearby shops. The condo has been partially updated but still needs a few things changed out. (especially the bathtub)
The walls and ceiling are paper thin so be prepared to hear a lot of noise from next door and especially the upstairs unit. We had families with children and we could hear them crying and running around. We could also hear the guy upstairs snoring.
If noise doesn't bother you then this is the condo for you. You will love sitting on the lanai watching the sun come up.

When seeking out a place to stay you are always hoping that what they say it is, is exactly what it is. There are times it is not all that they make it out to be. This place was everything they said it would be and a bit more. The best centrally located place on the island when wanting to explore the whole island. Everything was easy access and at our fingertips when wanting to shop, eat or go do activities. The only surprise we had (no idea that they are all over the island) was the chickens. At times they wanted to be up earlier than we wanted to be. We got through it because everything else outweighed the chickens. Kauai is still our favorite island. Our host was warm and welcoming, informative and was quick to respond. I would come back again. Great memories were built here.
This is a great place, if you’re looking for a place with a terrific view, access to the beach and beachside trail, and a short walk to old town (Kapaa) you will be happy here!

Great location with views of the ocean. Walking/bike path along the beach nearby. Lots of restaurants and shopping within walking distance. Place was super clean and Deb was great with fast communication and recommend local events/activities to check out.

Pono Kai unit G204 was just as advertised with the added bonus of some of Deb's beautiful orchids! The unit is well stocked with everything you need from beach chairs to a knife sharpener. The view from the Lanai is just as pictured, just with more chickens. (Please do NOT feed them, I would throw ice cubes at them to make them shut up!) The condo was clean and comfortable with the A/C unit located in the bedroom to help keep us cool while sleeping. There's a BBQ located just in front of the Lanai and Deb's kitchen is well stocked with some basic spices even! If you don't feel like cooking, there are some great restaurants nearby. I can personally highly recommend Sam's Ocean View, the dinner we had there was excellent and the service was top notch.
My wife and I had a wonderful stay. The only quibble we had was some noise from the upstairs neighbor, but there's not much you can do about that.
Terry Stead.
Wonderful condo. Great ocean view, comfortable, convenient to shopping & restaurants. Everything we needed was available and great host.

Deb is a fabulous host. She is very prompt in her responses and her place is lovely. It's a very comfortable, clean and spacious place for two people. The patio and ocean view was amazing. The kitchen and bathroom are new and clean. The facilities at the place seem fantastic but we were too busy adventuring around the island to take advantage of them! Deb gave us lots of great tips on what to do/see. I would definitely try to book with her again when I come back to Kauaii!

Breezy Oceanfront at the Pono Kai resort is just as advertised. It is a well cared for, clean and comfortable unit, stocked with all you need to settle in and enjoy Kauai. Deb was most helpful in giving us valuable tips on local markets, dinning spots and other highlights of the local community near Kapaa. The location is ideal, next to a sandy swimming beach and within walking distance to grocery stores, shops, and restaurants in old town Kapaa.
Nice place and great location. Comfortable bed. Thanks Deb for the beach chairs and snorkeling equipment!
Great view nice location.

Deb's place is in a fantastic location and has an amazing view of the ocean! We loved our stay in Kapaa. The place has the most comfortable reclining chairs I've ever experienced and all the kitchen tools you'll need to cook up a storm. We definitely recommend staying here!

Our stay at Deb’s place was great. The view of waves from the porch of condominium was very cool. Every morning, through out our stay, we would walk yards to watch the sun rising off the horizon. The property itself is at great location. Good food and bars within walking distance. A mile drive gets you to General store and more food options.
We will definitely try to reach iut to Deb if we again plan to visit Kauai.

Overall I highly recommend this place and I would come back! Spacious unit with separate bedroom. Great location with local shops in walking distance.
