The owner was very pleasant and quick to respond. Chairs and bed were comfortable after long of activities. Beach chairs, snorkel gears, extra amenities were available as well.

This condo was great, the pool and hot tub were excellent and the view is incredible.
The kitchen was well equipped, the layout and size of the place was better than we expected.
Parking is free. There is a great path along the ocean for several miles. I highly recommend this place.
A perfect place to stay without any worries. Loved Kauai. Really clean and comfortable apartment. We hope to be back sometime

This was a great spot. Deb was very responsive. We wanted to visit family in Lihue as well as make sure we were in a central place to explore the island. We had hikes up North and West. This was a great location to stage our days. The beach was literally out to the back of Deb's location. I was able to sit on the balcony and enjoy the sound of the waves. Also, this location was a very short walk into the main strip in Kapaa. That was a bonus. We hit up spots like Java Kai, Bubba's and Mariachi's. All within a short walk. You can even take the beach/bike path back to Deb's place. With a short drive, there was a Longs and Safeway close by as well. Her place was clean and the instructions were clear. There were plenty of towels. She even provided extra's like a cooler and other beach toys (which we didn't use.). The location had a small exercise room, pool, and tennis court. The resort staff was very nice and helpful. Parking was plentiful and easy. I would stay here in the future.

We really loved Deb’s condo! It has perfect location, everything you need for privacy and coocing. The resort had very good services and the view was awesome! You can have breakfast at the sunrise on the balcony!
And Deb is so lovely! We are defenately coming back. She really made our honeymoon!
Great place. We had a really nice time. Close to the restaurants and shops

Deb is a great host! We spent lovely days in her beautiful condo. We enjoyed the stunning ocean view. The balcony was big enough to enjoy our meals outside. Great communication, every necessary information was provided upfront. We really loved to stay with Deb.
The quality of the appliances and kitchen items were great. The view was amazing. You can hear the waves at night. I especially loved the lazy boy!
We had a wonderful stay! Daves place was great!
Convenient location, nice lanai, large kitchen! Having a laundry machine in unit was a nice perk!
David was very responsive and provided information about the local area. The view from the lanai was as advertised - Amazing.
Thanks you for letting us use your beautiful spot for a few days. The views are second to none and the place is comfy cozy.
Wonderful stay at David’s place. The view was amazing and the suite has everything we needed to have a comfortable stay.

The condo was very comfortable and clean. The view was beautiful. I especially enjoyed listening to the ocean while we were at the condo. Having the availability of beach accessories including a cooler and ice packs was wonderful.
My family and I had a wonderful experience, thank you!!!

David's condo was as described.
The view is beautiful if you look to the left. The main highway to the right, takes away from the beautiful bay view.
The road noise and court yard noise is very noticeable. Bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper.
I noticed other condos had vinyl windows with louvre windows, I bet this would have helped tremendously.
I would recommend picking up your own supply of coffee as you are only provided with 4 Kcups.
There was a kuerig as well as a regular coffee maker.
Host provides beach chairs,Umbrella and cooler.
The condo is walkable to the coconut market and lava lava beach club.
Easy access to the North shore and west shore .

David’s place was perfect for us — close to everything we needed, also quiet and private with a beautiful view of the beach and ocean from the balcony, where we ate most of our meals. The a/c was a bit noisy but we hardly needed it with the lovely breezes from the windows and balcony. The place was really well equipped and we appreciated the kitchen equipment, coffee makers, cooler, beach chairs, umbrella, high end dishwasher, washer/dryer, comfortable bed, newer furniture, and bathtub rather than just a shower. We enjoyed the pool and the location close to grocery stores, bakery (across the street), restaurants, and the airport. David was very organized about the confirmation and check-in information and exceptionally accommodating when we had a request; he always answered us promptly. We were even greeted by little treats. Would highly recommend this condo for your Kauai vacation!
A perfect landing pad for our adventures all around Kauai - and David is a very communicative and thoughtful host!

It was a great spot to relax and end our trip after spending a week camping on the island. We enjoyed the view and being close to restaurants. The bakery across the street was delicious! It was a nice bonus to be able to do our laundry and come home with clean clothes.
Great place with perfect location and all the amenities we needed during our stay. Highly recommend staying with David
This was our first trip & we already can’t wait to go back to explore more! We had an amazing stay at David’s beautiful condo & we are so grateful for his hospitality!

We liked everything about this place. David is a great host, everything was clean. The manager on site is a great guy and does a good job at maintaining the place. The beach just in front is far from being the prettiest in Kauai but it makes for amazing views and we saw lots of turtles swimming. Highly recommend this place!
Great place to stay! Had everything we needed, from chairs coolers, views, and umbrella.

We were mostly comfortable overall, but there were some aspects that left us with mixed feelings. On the positive side, the condo boasted an excellent pool, which was a real highlight of our stay. The view of the ocean was truly breathtaking, earning a solid 10/10 in our books. Watching the waves and sunsets was a memorable experience. However, there were quite a few rules in place, and we also had to buy our own toilet paper, paper towels, laundry soap and dryer sheets, which was inconvenient. The towels provided had a tendency to become moldy due to the humidity, and they didn't dry out properly. We had to purchase white vinegar to address this issue, which was somewhat frustrating. Also, the swamp cooler air conditioner didn't work effectively, leaving the condo feeling hot and humid most of the time. This made it less comfortable than we had hoped for. Lastly, the manager's constant presence created a slightly uneasy atmosphere. It was a bit awkward to see him constantly.
Very well appointed ocean front condominium. Nice complex. Beautiful pool. Great bakery across the street.
Great place to stay. Very nice pool. Beautiful view from lanai. Highly recommended!!
It was a great location, beautiful view, and friendly manager. Only complaint was that the pool was too warm 🤣
fantastic central location

Staying in this location was amazing! The view was breathtaking and there was things to do all around. The checkin was a little confusing but the manager on site was a delight and very helpful whenever we had a question. This place really made our stay lovely.
Awesome place. Would love to come back when we plan our next trip back to Kauai!!

“David’s condo was great! —tastefully decorated, clean and equipped with everything needed to function as a home
base. check in was easy and laid back.
we made extensive use of the balcony, having our morning coffees and afternoon cocktails there while watching the beautiful views of the beach and ever changing cloud patterns which presented themselves early morning and evening.
The condo is centrally located and
it was easy to explore any portion of the island from there. it was a welcoming place to return to after numerous shopping expeditions and adventures throughout the day and offered a cool and relaxing respite from the hustle and bustle .
We were fortunate enough to have the trade winds blowing while staying there so did not need to use the a/c that was offered. the fans were adequate and quiet.
the pool was a wonderful way to cool off at the end of the day and was seldom crowded . several bbqs were also available for use.
thanks for a great place
Steph and Steve
Clean, centrally located condo, perfect for our quick trip to Kauai. We appreciated the extra amenities, especially the beach chairs and cooler, which made our traveling a breeze.
Beautiful place. Ate all our meals on the lanai. Great location. Would definitely stay there again.
Absolutely beautiful home to match the beautiful location. Everything as described. Absolutely would recommend!
David’s place was just as advertised. We loved the location which is central to a lot of places. The deck/balcony was by far the greatest. Loved the view of the water and beach.

Overall, this place is absolutely awesome! Great location, easy parking, super quiet little complex, excellent views, relatively well equipped, amazing pool, walkable to restaurants and beach. Couple things I wish had been there was creamer/sugar for the provided coffee, and a water filter of some sort. Minor things, but would recommend the host consider them to rule out the need for a grocery store run. All in all, it’s a really really awesome spot and highly recommended! Would absolutely stay again!
Nice place and great location! The unit is outside of the pool which can be a little noisy if you’re going to bed early.

David’s place is fantastic! Centrally located, Kapaa is perfect if you want to check out north and south Kauai. There are lots of great restaurants nearby. Make sure you get pastries at Passion Bakery! They make a mean loco moco too! Great coffees as well.
The manager on site at the property was super nice and greeted us to help set up the parking pass. He gave us local info and helped show us to the room. Very friendly!!
The view is amazing and you won’t be disappointed. Great pool too.

Our stay at David’s place was spectacular. Location of the unit was perfect, in Kapaa and right across the street a gastarían should you need anything. The unit itself had everything we needed including coolers and beach chairs which we used at Tunnels Beach. David was responsive to our questions. I’m definitely recommending his place to others.
The location and view for the price are unmatched. Very clean and it was great having access to the cooler and beach chairs. David was great about responding to questions. A gem!
What a wonderful place! We had an amazing time and the views were excellent. Perfect place to call home for a few days. Great communication, laid back complex, and great location.

We absolutely loved our stay at this condo. It’s the perfect location on Kauai, right in the middle. It’s close to grocery stores, coffee, great restaurants and cute downtown Kapa’a. The condo exceeded our expectations and we enjoyed the view, the warm pool and the comfortable accommodations. The manager at the property was super friendly and helpful as well and we felt welcomed and at home the whole time. Thank you for giving us such a wonderful stay here!

This place is amazing!!!!! Very affordable for the views and location! We were close to the water, grocery stores, and walking distance to shopping and restaurants! Highly recommend! David was a great host! When we did have issues he was very quick to respond and find solutions. We were very grateful for our time here and the memories they helped us make! The pull out couch is very comfortable.

David’s place was absolutely beautiful. We were there for a 5 year anniversary trip and getting to wake up to that view, was the Cherry on top of our trip. He was always responsive and the home was spotless. We couldn’t have asked for a better location!!
Beautiful place. I wish we could have spent more time there but they were all booked up. Glad I got to squeeze in a weekend there!

David’s place was great, and perfect for our family. Well-equipped, both in the kitchen and with beach supplies. The view out over the bay was a great thing to wake up to in the mornings or over dinner. David, as well as the on site manager Mark, were responsive and friendly. Great overall stay! There was some noise from the road, but generally not a problem. We were sad to leave, and would absolutely stay here again.

Everything you need for your vacation is provided at this locations. Fully equipped kitchen came in handy. The bed was very comfortable. Let’s not forget the beautiful view from the balcony. I’m would highly recommend booking this place for your next vacation.

Lovely place. So great to be so close to the ocean. Kitchen was great (except we couldn’t find the cutting board!). Nice being able to grill, and also to have such easy access to the beach. Thank you!
Great place to stay

This was an exceptional one bedroom condo right on the ocean with a beautiful view. The host provided way more than anyone would expect in a condo. You will want for nothing but food. Amazing place. Resident manager was so kind, helpful and friendly. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again. We loved it here and wish we would have had longer to enjoy this place more.

David's place was perfect! The pool is right out in the front and the beach is right in the back. The sunrise on the lanai was perfect. Local beach (when waters are calm) is a great sandy beach. Nothing beats the view! The condo was cozy and perfect for our stay. Mahalo David!
Such a a beautiful place and location was perfect
Awesome spot for visiting Kapa’a! Great view from the terrace! We traveled in a group of 4 and it was perfect for us. David left us some complimentary biscottis as well!

The lanai opens up to the ocean! Lovely place, great location right by the Wailua river, beautiful sunrise views from lanai. Very clean, and spacious. We enjoyed our stay thoroughly! David is friendly, and very responsive. We called him when we hit a snug during check in and he was right there on the phone to help us out (even on thanksgiving eve). Def will come back!!
Awesome and gorgeous place: great getaway

David's place is just about the perfect vacation place! Fantastic view of the ocean , cozy living room with a well equipped kitchen. Bathroom is clean, brightly lit and the bedroom is just he perfect resting spot after a long, weary day. It has the state of the art facilities which we hardly even used as we were outdoors most of the time.
We just wish we had more time to enjoy all the amenities he had to offer.
The sound of the waves was so calming soothing . The sunrise was absolutely breathtaking!
Nice place with amazing views of the ocean. We loved eating breakfast on the lanai and watching the sunrise.

Short but very enjoyable stay. The view from the lanai is gorgeous but especially at sunrise and dusk. Appreciated the Keurig coffee maker and well equipped kitchen. Nice big LR with plenty of places to sit, work or eat. We didn’t borrow the beach stuff but there is plenty of it. Location is very convenient to airport; just leave extra time for road construction. All in all, happy we chose it.

David’s place is perfectly located and there are several stores within walking distance. The coconut market place had live music one night we were there and there is a great little Thai food but. The sea was a but rough out front to swim but the waves were wonderful at night and put you right to sleep. We enjoyed watching the kite suffers and the normal surfers. You will need a car to get around but the bus drops you off practically across the street. You have to take a bus from the airport to get to the bus that will take you there but it costs 4$ for both. Getting there was a breeze but flagging the bus man down to get back to the airport was a challenge. They did not stop and we ended up calling a Lyft. David has everything you could need in his apartment and they even have a pool with a couple of grills.
great place, great view
Nice host.

David definitely goes above and beyond to provide the things you will need for beach days.

Great spot. Walkable to all sorts of fun things (including delicious malasadas!). The sunrise on the beach was excellent as well.
Perfect spot to stay in Kauai with a GORGEOUS view! Comfy, clean, and spacious. Really enjoyed this stay and will definitely be returning!

The apartment was really beautiful, great decor and the view the best part, drinking our coffee in the morning looking at the ocean was priceless. Really clean and ready to host 4 guest easily. Such a great place if you’re in Kauai!!! Definitely recommend! Beautiful view of the beach and everything you need is available

Book David’s place if you can- the location is fantastic- we had the beach nearly to ourselves for the entirety of our stay, sunrises were magical from the lanai and the beach, the view from the lanai will spoil you! -Wonderful location

The view is symple amazing!

Love this place. The view is amazing!!!

beautiful location! I wish I knew what brand the mattress is because I loved it. loved the condo

Nicely decorated condo not far from downtown Kapaa. The building is a little dated and the condo gets a bit humid, but the AC helps. Beautiful beach views. Good communication with host and easy check in.

This AirBnb surpassed all of our expectations. Most homes are not as pictured, but this home is even more amazing than the pictures. We highly recommend it to anyone looking to visit Kauai and will definitely be back! PS, we were not at all bothered by the chickens and were never woken up by them which was a pleasant surprise!
An awesome stay, clean place with an excellent view, not to mention a really great doughnut shop across the road!

What an awesome spot! We’ll definitely be back!

Beautiful condo, as pictured and seriously AMAZING view. Price is great as well.
Great place to stay, with a beautiful view!

Great location! I loved being a quick drive or walk away nice coffee shops and restaurants. (Aloha Roastery & Passion Bakery) Never got tired of waking up to the beautiful view of the water. Loved having a fully functioning kitchen and the washer & dryer was a very helpful amenity to have. Would definitely stay here again :)

The view and the location of this Airbnb are amazing. The apartment is correctly equipped to have an enjoyable stay. We stayed one week and could travel easily around the island. The communication with David was great when we had some issues (ceiling fan, insects).
View + size + price = will come back
Sweet condo! Great location!

This was a great place and location. Perfect size for a couple. We could watch the sunrise from the back deck which was great. The owner provides everything you need for the beach like chairs, bags, snorkeling gear. The home was clean and comfortable. It was a little noisy at night being so close to the highway. Other than that we had a great stay and would return.
Great place - Clean - Centrally located - Amazing Sunset - Ocean View - Host is always available to answer any questions.
Beautiful place to stay! Everything we needed, good places to eat close by and everything was very clean and neat! We will be coming back.

Stayed 4 days, overall was perfect for what we needed. Big comfy bed, large fridge, updated bathroom, close to the airport, AC and fan worked great, water pressure is amazing, includes 2 beach chairs, a cooler, an umbrella, and 2 beach towels. I wish there had been extra towels since we took them on hikes for when we swam and they got dirty and there isn’t any laundry (so maybe bring your own extra ones) - there were extra bath towels though which was nice. Sometimes parking was difficult if we came back late. Super short walk to a grocery store that also has hot food and a coffee shop, lava lava beach club (food and drinks), Jojos shave ice, and some stores. 15 min walk (or 2 min drive) to boss frogs snorkel shop to rent snorkel gear. Short walk to the beach but you can’t swim there and the sun doesn’t rise/set in this area but it was still pretty. 15 min to airport, 45 to Hanalei bay / shuttle for the napali coast hike, 1 hour 15 min to Waimea canyon, 40 min to Poipu beach

The shower was awesome, great water pressure!! I was also surprised to find beach umbrellas, a boogie board and clothes steamer as I don’t believe those items were listed. The beach in not great for swimming but perfect for hanging out on, watching the sunrises and possibly an even seeing the monk seals like we did multiple times. The Lava Lava next door had great breakfast, with lunch and dinner options. Tom’s place is easy walking and close to The Coconut Market Place for some shopping and the The Island Country Market that has all your last minute needs, a coffee bar and tons of deli options (hot or cold) dine outside or take to go. We would definitely stay here again.
Lovely grounds. Poolside bar. Firm mattress. Great shower pressure. Really enjoyed our stay.
Great stay. Beautiful sunrise views and perfect if you are wanting to walk to restaurants and shopping.

This is the second unit of Tom’s that I’ve stayed in on this property and both were really beautifully updated (light and bright inside- some of the more original units feel a lot darker). It is also very well-stocked (especially the kitchen) to get you through your stay. This unit isn’t directly facing the water but still has an ocean view to the side from the patio and is still only steps from a great little quiet beach. Also an excellent location right on the ocean walking path, and walking distance from many shops and restaurants. Definitely hope to stay again!

Tom was great! Tom was out of town during our stay, but he provided an alternative contact right away. Whenever there was a request, it was handled very quickly!
The place itself was very clean. The bathroom was recently updated and doesn’t match the photos of the listing (it’s way better!).
We loved our stay - perfect place for a couple.

This was perfect for our last four nights in Hawaii. We appreciated the luxuriant, well-tended grounds of Islander-by-the-Sea, and its location along a beautiful stretch of sandy beach. A wide beachfront walk connects to trails along the coast in both directions. Although swimming is not recommended directly in front of the resort because of strong currents and lava ledges, there is a fine pool available in the resort, and just a few minutes walk to the south you can find tidal pools great for swimming, with small beaches protected by rocky outcrops from the rougher surf. Tom's studio is modern, clean and comfortable. A sliding glass door opens to a patio with a view out to the ocean - ideal for breakfast after sunrise. It was convenient to be just a few steps from the oceanfront restaurant next door, and there are also excellent Thai and Italian places at the neighboring outdoor mall. A minor qualm: we did miss a closet to hang clothes, although there were a few hooks.

Very convenient location literally steps away from the shore, some fantastic restaurants, and a shopping center. The unit makes great use of its space despite being on the smaller side, and it is charmingly decorated. The beach had surpringly clear water for snorkeling, although we only saw a few fish. Lydgate beach park is a short drive away for better snorkeling. If you are looking to stay in Kapaa, the location doesn't get much better than this.

This was the perfect place for two! Well appointed, extremely clean, and a wonderful location. It was booked for a few days as an extension to our trip and had everything we needed- inside and out. Easy access to the beach (just steps away) the walking/bike path, restaurants, and easy parking. We would definitely book again!
No surprises, everything as expected which was really nice! No communication was necessary because everything went smoothly! Would love to stay again!
Great location to see the sunrise on the beach just steps out the door.

WOW, where do we begin? This was the perfect spot for a couple wanting to get away. We spent our wedding/honeymoon here for a week and we never got bored. Nice place in a nice complex. Good size space for a couple with nice kitchenette and good size bathroom. Ocean view from lanai was lovely to enjoy at sunrise.

Unit was exactly like the photos. Just steps away from the beach. Clean and very well stocked kitchen. Chairs and boogie board for use.
Lots of good places to eat and shop nearby. Location was safe and great for exploring the entire island.
Tom was quick to respond to any questions prior to our trip. We didn't have a need to contact him during our stay.
Wonderful condo, great location with so much to do within walking distance, Tom is a great host.

Tom’s place was very clean and well maintained. The unit was fully stocked with everything we needed to cook a few meals and pack lunches for day excursions. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend to family and friends.
Tom’s place was exactly as described. Great location - steps from beach, shops, and restaurants. Would definitely stay again!
We had a wonderful and relaxing time! Perfectly located and beautiful condo right next to the beach, but still private. Will be back!

Exactly what we were looking for. Very clean, bright, ground floor studio from which you can walk onto the beach. And sit on the porch for breakfast and cocktails and watch/hear the ocean. You can’t beat the location! Nice setting and comfortable unit. Nice shower!

Tom’s place is the perfect amount of comfort and convenience in a great location. The ocean as your back yard is always amazing. The grounds are beautiful, friendly people around, and an overall good vibe.
Place was in a great location and the resort area was nice.

Tom’s place was beautiful and exactly as advertised. You can see the ocean from the lanai and is only footsteps away. The location is perfectly central to explore the entire Island. I would love to stay here again and would reccomend to my friends and family.

Absolutely perfect place to stay and explore Kauai. It was my first time visiting and I can’t wait to come back and stay here again!

the Coconut Market Place is a 2 min. walk from you. Essentially, you wouldn’t need a car and could pretty much get everything you need there. My husband and I had a great stay! The place had everything we needed for a week in Kauai. Awesome little studio that was even better than pictures. Comfortable bed was a plus. Would definitely stay here again!

This place was amazing! We loved how close it was to the ocean, the opportunity to grill out and the pool. There is also a great tiki bar next to the pool where we met so many great people and got tips for places to visit while on the island. The place was super clear and a two min walk from a shopping area and a bunch of restaurants. Great stay and would definitely recommend.

We absolutely loved staying at this Airbnb. The property is beautiful and within a short walk of the beach. The room itself is clean, bright, and comfortable. We also enjoyed how short of a walk it is to some shops. We would absolutely return!

Tom’s place is fantastic. Great location on the beach with many options for food, activities, etc. nearby. My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here during our honeymoon and we would definitely stay here again!
Great place and location! We would definitely stay again!

It was in a good area, stores and everything you need it pretty close by. The beach wasn’t what I expected, it was hard to walk on, the sand gave way under your feet very easy and it was deep. (I had knee surgery not too long ago so I wasn’t really able to walk on that beach easily) but it is still very close to the room and with a good sunrise view off to the left ☺️ Tom is also a lot of help and easy to get ahold of. Made the whole process very easy!

The room was as described and pictured. We stayed there toward the end of our island visit as we were fairly close to airport.
Need to bring your own coffee and shampoo.

Tom’s place was absolutely perfect! Hands down our favorite place we stayed on our honeymoon. The bed was so comfortable and all of the amenities were very accommodating. Would recommend without reservation!
Stayed here in June 2021 and everything is correct as described in listing. Loved being so close to the beach. Liked having the Market nearby for food options.
Great location! Comfortable room!

We enjoyed every minute of the time we spent in Tom's oasis. Tom was extremely on top of communication and willing to chat with us about whatever we needed. The LOCATION was perfect. The beach is steps away, and there are even little pockets of coral that attract lots of fish to watch. My partner and I really enjoyed the fact that this place is central to all of the activities in the North and West areas of the island. The Coconut Marketplace complex next door provides a sunny, casual vibe. There is a sweet farmer's market in the parking lot some days. Try the local fruit called Longan! The coffee shop right by the place and the grocery there are so convenient if you need something quick. And Kapa'a is a cute town!
The studio condo is set up really well, so you never feel like you're crunched for space or in one another's way. Multiple times, we said "It'd be great if this place had..." then we'd open a drawer, and it was there! Tom provides beach chairs, towels, and an umbrella for ultimate beach bum convenience. Parking was a breeze. The hot tub and pool were lovely amenities, especially with the rising moon over the ocean in view. We loved the location and the security of staying in an established resort while having total independence.
If you want to explore the more noted parts of the island, you definitely need a car, but you can just as easily enjoy a more intimate few days biking or walking around the Kapa'a area.
I guess we should be making up bad things to tell you, so we can stay here whenever we want :-)
Thank you, Tom, for providing this experience!

This condo exceeded our expectations. It had everything we could need
-including beach chairs and towels. The place was very clean and well stocked for everything. If we were inclined, we could have cooked a great dinner and enjoyed it on the lovely patio. The decor was lovelas well. Tom provided great communicatioas well.We would love to stay there again. Parking was not a problem during the time we were there.
A wonderful time. The market place has everything you need! Loved snorkeling at Lydgate close by.

This place is perfect. My wife and I took our honeymoon here and it was wonderful. The studio is small and has everything you could need. The induction burner, fridge, and blender make it so you can cook and make drinks from home if you want to. It's close to a store, close to a bunch of restaurants (Lava Lava Beach Club right next door is great), has a coffee shop on the property, and it's right on the beach. There are lots of little touches, too that made the place feel special and add a lot of value – beach towels, beach chairs, boogie boards, a lunch box, a book of recommendations, and a guest book. Tom was very accomodating and answered any questions we had. The sunrises are beautiful. The pool and hot tub are great to have but do be aware they will kick you out at 10pm when it closes. The pool bar is currently closed (May 2021) due to COVID. All of this and it's still a great price! We will be coming back for sure.
Amazing scenery, friendly neighbors, and great location. Close to shops and restaurants. Right on the beach too! We had such an amazing stay!
Location was perfect. We will be back soon.

There is NOTHING I would change about this stay. A perfect central location on the island, but if you never want to leave the complex you don’t have to. In our humble opinion, it’s also the best beach on the island. We will definitely be back as it’s as close to perfect as perfect gets.

This was the perfect spot for our honeymoon. Absolutely incredible. Extremely comfortable bed, convenient location, and we were able to watch the sunrise from our lanai (and bed!) every morning. Tom is an extremely accommodating and communicative host. We highly recommend and definitely plan to return!

Tom takes Super-Host to the next-level! Super helpful host with a perfectly located condo. Right on a beach access just a couple miles away from awesome hiking and a 10 minute drive to the airport.
We took the quick drive to Poipu beach for snorkeling with sea turtles and just down the road to Kauai Beer Co for the amazing flight of house-brews and fries.
Perfect honeymoon stay, and we will 10/10 be back for an anniversary down the road!

The place was clean and the towels were soft. Had everything we needed for our week stay. It is right on the beach and we enjoyed being able to hear the waves crash in the mornings and evenings. The location was great for us because we went all over the island and it is not far from anything. We loved the hiking, the views from the mountains were breathtaking. This place was a great value for what it was. I would recommend to any couple. We would definitely stay here again and Tom was great to work with.
Incredible location. Steps from the ocean, pool, and hot tub. Get ready to get up to watch the sunrise.
Convenient check in process. Prime location if you want to explore north and south shore. Close to airport. Nice market nearby. Great experience!

Great travel items in the apartment, Travel books in the apartment were very helpful and also a pair of binoculars to use for sightseeing. Being right next to the ocean was a huge plus on our trip, steps away from the beach!
It was exactly what I was looking for! Footsteps to the beach and centrally located on the island, it’s a great home-base for exploring Kauai.
Great location.

awesome studio right next to the beach! you cant see the ocean til about 10 feet away from the back door. we shared the beach with a seal 1 of the days! strong bleach odor at first so we let it air out for a bit. we'll definitely come back thx!
We loved this space. It’s conveniently located, and the condo had everything we needed, and nothing more. It was small, clean, adequately supplied, and the pool and hot tub area were a bonus.
Had a great view of the ocean, enjoyed being so close.
Nice place near the beach. Big comfy bed (king size?). Pool area was nice although the hottub was inoperable during our stay. Overall, would stay here again. Mahalo :)

Excellent location!!
Great sized room. Perfect for relaxation!
Great location.

Great place to watch beautiful sunrises! Very close to the ocean. The grounds are wonderful and the workers are very nice and helpful. Bottom floor unit makes it easy to get to the ocean fast! I love the location of this unit because it is located by wonderful restaurants and a market that has just about anything and everything you might need or forgot. Also, it was nice having beach chairs in the unit to use. Thanks for everything and I hope to return in the near future.
Wonderful place & steps from the beach. Great basecamp for Kauai exploring!

The location of this condo was great with the coconut mall nearby to watch the hula show as well as a few paces to the beach and ocean. Nice little kitchen and a cute room that was nice to settle into in the evening and watch some TV. We enjoyed staying here for the last few days of our trip.

Excellent stay all around! Very well appointed, comfortable and clean. Lots of drawer and armoire space if you're staying a while and the wide vanity makes life much easier for couples. The clothes drying wire in the bathroom was a life saver! No issues with noise at all, just be mindful of the chickens and roosters!
The condo was conveniently close to the airport and almost everything on the island could be reached in under an hour. Tons of amenities within a very short walk- restaurants, shops, coffee, a large drugstore, ABC store and a poolside bar.
All in all, no complaints whatsoever. The only reason we wouldn't stay here again is if we were camping!
Awesome zone, great pool and happy hour spot! Fish tacos at sleeping giant grill were A+ and a short walk away. Loved it so much we came back!

The unit is clean, has a pool, spa and you can see the beach from the porch.
It is a short drive to Safeway and foodland and is walking distance from coffee shops, restaurants and an ABC store.
We enjoyed our stay there and would recommend it to others.

Great location in Kauai, this place had most of the things you would need for a week stay in Hawaii including beach gear. Would recommend to anyone that is looking for a reasonably priced place to stay on the island that is in a central location
Lovely place to stay in the best part of Kauai! We will definitely be back!
Location and complex (pool and hot tube) were great. The Unit is perfect for 1 to 2 people. If you like to cook, you’ll want a bigger kitchen not it works for basics. Steps from the beach!!!

CAREFULLY read and understand the CANCELLATION POLICY. Unlike many of the other AirBnB's I've stayed with their policy is not flexible. Lesson learned. Ok, on to the good stuff... The condo is very comfy (nice bed!), clean, near the pool, beach and some good eats (Lava Lava Beach Club and Coconuts Fish Shack). The hosts have an extensive lists of recommendations which was helpful. And what a nice surprise with the tiki bar and live music (Saturday night) around the pool. Within 10 minutes of getting in to the condo we were poolside relaxing. I can't say enough how much the property is in a fabulous location! You'll enjoy it!

This condo is centrally located, nicer than the pictures. Conveniently located within walking distance to restaurants/shops. Cooler and chairs were provided which came in really handy. Would stay here again.
Great location!
Exactly as described by host. Beautiful grounds and best spot for sunrises!

The condo was clean, close to shops and restaurants. We ate out the entire time. Not really room to keep food in the condo. The Little fridge is good for water and soda. It's great for a quick visit. We loved the Lava Lava Beach Club. Excellent breakfast right on the beach. While the beach is right there, which is amazingly beautiful, it's not a "walkable beach." It's steep to get to the water and you can't lay out easily on the sand because there is a lot of tree debris. There are beach chairs just before the steep hill to the ocean. We had to go elsewhere for sunning and swimming. All in all it was a cozy place to sleep with the necessities.

Lovely place at great location just a few steps from the beach. The condo has everything you need and for a good price. Close to all parts of the island and ideal for day trips. We were very satisfied!
Host answered the phone on the first ring, and calmed me down when we had trouble finding our room. As I stated before, we should have gone to the lobby first.
It was a great location! Good eats close by. Beach was right outside. Room was very nice and clean.
This place is a must if you are just traveling with two. It’s a nice studio apartment that is right by the beach!

I had a lovely time here. The studio is super cute, it’s walking distance not only from the beach but from restaurants, bike and snorkeling gear rental, a grocery store, coffee places , all sorts of shops- you could walk to everything you need. The big beach towels and beach chairs are a great touch - and the binoculars! As a woman traveling alone, I felt safe here. I loved falling asleep to the sound of the ocean, and watching the sunrise on the beach. And of course , as everyone says, the view from the lanai is excellent. And the unit’s AC is very powerful.
I had no trouble parking . Friday night there were spaces well into the evening. Saturday I got in early so I’m not sure what the situation was then.
Mary sends very helpful tips before you arrive - be sure to read her emails.
I would love to stay here again.

The location of this rental was amazing! You literally are a 30 second walk to the beach and you can see the ocean from the lanai! We loved the pool area too! It’s walking distance to lots of shops and restaurants as well. We will definitely stay here again!

Mary's condo was perfect for us - we loved being right at the ocean, and right next door to Lava Lava Beach Club. We went in the shared jacuzzi every evening. Wailua is a good half-way point between North Shore and South Shore. There is a great burger place across the highway - easy walk - called Street Burger. Pricey, but oh so good!
Lovely space in a great location. Lots to do and see very nearby.

This condo was a safe, convenient, and comfortable launching point for all of our Kauai adventures. It's cleanliness, prime location, and plentiful supply of beach towels were notable features. I recommend this condo to any couple. While we spent most of our time away from the condo and pnly slept there, I could see those travelers who are more about staying put, getting hammered at the pool or beach, grabbing a meal at the Lava Lava Club, and then stumbling back to the condo really enjoying Mary's place too.

This is a great place for a vacation! There are so many delicious restaurants all around (breakfast, lunch, dinner) and a beach right outside the door! It’s in a great location on Kauai- close to the north shore and airport! The condo was perfect - it had everything you could need, even beach supplies!

I would have given this 1 star, but the view from the patio area was beautiful and it was steps from the beach. This unit is not as it appears. I am not sure if this is a cleaning issue or just wear and tear overtime in the unit being close to the ocean. When we opened the door we got hit with the smell of must. I almost did not want to stay here. The bathroom has a worse must smell than the rest of the unit and we made sure to keep the door open the entire stay and not keep clothes in there. The top bedspread was damp. When I opened the cupboards looking for a cup for water the one on the top left where there were crumbs in it and 3 bugs running around. The closet with beach chair and coolers has a musty smell worse than the room. There is also black mold in a few places on the white curtains going to the patio. The light shades by the bed were rusted. Parking was a nightmare, the lot was full day and night. We had to take out our own garbage and as unclean as the room was when we arrived, the host had the audacity to ask us to tip the cleaners. This place was not clean. I emailed the host when we left and have not yet received a response. I would not recommend it to anyone.

The place itself is as described, however don’t expect a direct view of the ocean. The host isn’t very friendly and seems a bit impatient. Also, the instructions of the check-out are extremely unfriendly and say things like take out the garbage and clean any dirty spots with detergents and such nonsense. To top it off it includes a part about leaving a tip for the cleaners, when the instructions essentially tell you to clean the entire place yourself before leaving.

LOCATION!! So close to the ocean, 1st floor, quiet! Beautiful. Loved the bar and hot tub vibe at night (although it closes so early, 10 pm, even on weekends!) decent snorkeling right on the beach, used the snorkel gear and fins provided (thank you!) what a great stay in paradise!!
Great place!

The place is perfect located near many places! The complex is beautiful, has a pool area and is very well cared for!
The room is very complete, in addition there are lounge chairs to go to the beach
We went back and stayed there because we loved it!!
#158 is a perfect place to stay, love the simple and tasteful decor, the location, the resort itself is very beautiful and friendly, we will be back!

This place was perfect. Very amazing value, and it was steps to an awesome beach. There was a pool and a hot tub right outside as well. The room was comfortable and nicely decorated and the bed was very comfortable as well. A fantastic location next to many great restaurants. We loved it. Thank you.

We stayed at this rental for 8 days and absolutely loved it. The resort it is on (Islander on the Beach) was wonderful. It is very well landscaped, right on the ocean and has a great pool/jacuzzi and poolside bar. The location on the island can’t be beat - staying on the east means you can easily go to the North or South for day trips while also having a ton of stuff to do nearby (great restaurants, hiking trails, waterfalls etc). The unit had everything we needed - comfortable king sized bed, A/C (which you will be thankful for), a kitchenette which saved us money from going to restaurants for every meal. If we ever come back to Kaua’i we would try and book this rental first again!
Ideally located.

We really appreciated the price point, seamless self-check-in, amazing beachside location and well-appointed studio. Make sure to check the closet and its drawers for bonus amenities like snorkel gear, beach shoes, cooler bags , etc. Note: light-sensitive sleepers should bring eye masks — the lovely white curtains don't block much sun.
This was a great place for us to stay. It was comfortable, close to the beach, close to the pool and restaurant. Loved the whole Marketplace!
Great location to watch the sunrise; and to shop and enjoy food! lava lava beach club right next door for a great pineapple chicken rice bowl!

The condo is located in a fantastic place directly at the sea. We especially enjoyed the veranda overlooking the sea. Super quiet location. Good shopping (and cafe with good coffee) nearby. Perfect starting point to explore the island. Everything was absolutely TOP NOTCH. Highly recommended.

Perfect space for a trip to Kauai! The condo was sparkling clean, everything you'd need was provided, and the small kitchenette was a great touch. Mary is an excellent host and she always responded quickly if I ever had a question. Mahalo!
Nice condo and great communication.
A great place in a great location! We look forward to returning here in the future. Thank you!
Exactly what you expect! Beautiful place and it’s a perfect location on the island!

The condo is very close to a beautiful beach that’s great for swimming or just relaxing. The condo itself is clean and comfortable. It’s perfect for two people.
Besides the beach, the location is amazing. There’s a grocery store, snorkel rental, shops, and restaurants all close by. Great restaurants (go to Street Burger!) are a short drive away.
Things to note (not dealbreakers, just be aware):
There are chickens all over the property and the roosters start crowing at 5am. If you want to sleep later than that, bring earplugs and/or download a white noise app. I found doing both worked perfectly.
Mary has a lot of rules, and it can be intimidating at first, but it’s all common sense and courtesy. Be prepared to treat stains, take out the trash—little things like that. Remember it’s not a hotel.
There’s a shampoo and shower gel dispenser in the shower so if you use conditioner, bring/buy your own.
Overall, a lovely place to spend a Kauai vacation!
great location.
Nice room :)

What a great place to stay while in Kauai! It’s centrally located for you to explore all parts of the island and close to the airport. It’s also walking distance to some shops and great restaurants. The coffee at Imua Coffee is great and dinner at Hukilau Lanai was amazing. The view of the ocean from the patio was great or you can walk a few hundred steps and be right on the beach. The pool, hot tub and pool bar were great too!

Don't hesitate to book this place! Communications were accurate and prompt. Pictures are reflective of the place and amenties as well as the beach. Location can't be beat. Would suggest utilizing door to ventilate and bring fresh air in. AC works well but it helps to get the air circulating and the ocean noises are amazing.

If you are looking for an affordable place with the ocean right outside your door with all the amenities you need then this is the place for you! Mary’s place was a perfect home base for exploring the whole island. Check in was a breeze and Mary was easy to get a hold of. She even accommodated us when we wanted to add another night to our stay. It was comfortable, clean and had everything we needed within the unit and walking distance. The property is beautiful and very well maintained and being on the ground floor was definitely a plus as we were able to walk only a few short steps to catch the sunrise on the beach. The coconut market place is only a few steps away where you can shop at the local stores, buy groceries and even check out the farmers market on Wednesdays. Lava lava beach club is directly next door where you can grab a bite to eat while enjoying a mai tai right on the beach. I would definitely recommend checking out the pool bar during happy hour, especially on Tuesday’s and Saturdays when they have live music. Only 15 minutes from Lihue airport, you really can’t go wrong! What a wonderful time we had on Kauai. Not to mention the cute 4 legged friend that came for a visit every morning :) Thanks again Mary, we will definitely be back!

The property is located directly on the sea and while having breakfast on the terrace you can see the sea. The decor was great, we didn't miss anything. Even beach equipment was available. Contact was very good and fast!

Lovely place right by the beach! Fun family friendly environment with a good blend of couples and full families, with a nice pool area. The beach supplies were a fun plus, and we really appreciated how stylish and fun this place was in real life!

We had a great time... good location, easy check in, and the apartment serviced our needs for a quick 3 day stay in Kauai as it was in the middle of everything we wanted to see on the island.
the Home is as shown in photos but one thing is that there is not much ventilation and it’s rather damp inside the room without aircon on... so, stay here if you’re okay with sleeping with aircon and keeping the doors closed otherwise you can get a damp room.

This was paradise! Walk out the back door every day to swim and lounge on a beautiful beach! It was amazing. Onsite coffee place, poke and fish tacos, and drinks right on the beach. The studio is beautifully decorated and very comfortable, with everything we needed. It was really, really hard to leave!
Space was ok. Location was great. Just a bit expensive.
The place was very clean, had great AC, and a nice pool. The ocean is maybe 400 feet away from the back door. There are lots of shops and restaurants very close by.

We absolutely loved this place!! It was centrally-located (right on the beach, near restaurants, bars, coffee shops, grocery stores) and we easily drove to other parts of the island for our daily excursions! Super clean and great amenities - while we already had snorkeled and did some scuba diving in Maui, but it was so nice that they added the snorkels, masks, and fins in the room (a very nice and much appreciated touch)! Oh yes - and the extra cooler for our surfing/beach time!
Thank you for contributing to the success of the last leg of our destination wedding/honeymoon!
Great condo and so convenient to everything! Loved grilling on the public grills in the resort. We loved lounging on the lanai. The condo was comfortable and clean. We had a great stay in Kauai!!
Great location and perfect spot to rent
Great location and amenities.
Great central location on the island. Great restaurants and grocery stores near by.
Wow. The location, the unit, just amazing!!
Great stay at Ali’s place! She is an amazing host. Great location and a great price!

Allison's place was really great. I enjoyed it thoroughly and it had so many amenities close by. The view of the beach was beautiful and you have access to a pool and hot tub. It was perfect for 1-2 people.

Great place to stay. Allison is an awesome host that communicates very well. The check-in and checkout process was seamless. This condo is walking distance to several nice restaurants and has an ocean view. Allison also adds a really nice touch by having robes, chocolates on the pillow, boogie boards, snorkeling equipment and anything you could want at the ocean. I would highly recommend this condo and host to anyone. Great value and even better host.
It was a beautiful room that was very clean and well maintained, as well as very welcoming and cozy.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay at Allison‘s condo. It was in a very convenient location- right on the beach and walkable to many restaurants, grocery store, the farmer’s market, JoJo’s Shave ice and coconut marketplace. Lava lava Beach club was right next-door also! It was the most perfect vacation. We cannot wait to come back soon!
Very nice place and the price was great. Allison was available to answer any questions anytime of the day. Definitely worth the money

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay! The on-site amenities and tons of walkable restaurants and shops made our stay most enjoyable! The room was perfect and the air worked great. We loved the location- it was a comfortable driving distance from all the hiking trails and beaches we wanted to visit. If it's available we will most certainly stay here again on our next visit to Kauai!

Such a wonderful customer experience!!! Her place was perfection and do cozy and beautiful!!! I will always come back… It was so easy to book and secure start to finish.. After a full day of adventuring and snorkeling, I booked this place last minute and late!!! Allison made the whole experience wonderful. She was SO HELPFUL and stayed on phone to make sure I was safe and comfortable and it was late for her. She is an angel🙏🏽 Truly wonderful oasis and so clean and cozy!! Everything was perfect!!!
We had a great time even though our visit was short! Allison was very friendly and really easy to work with! The place was perfect for us and we look forward to returning in the future!
Allison was extremely proactive. She reached out several times to offer suggestions and to make sure we had smooth experience. Much appreciated!
Allison’s place was so so special!!! I feel so lucky and blessed to have been at this spot! It was absolutely gorgeous and Allison was super communicative and helpful!

This stay was a gem. It was clean, private and tucked away from busyness but close enough to walk to local amenities. It is also a short walk to the beach so that was a plus. Allison was communicative and responsive throughout my stay making sure I had everything I needed which added to the comfort level of the stay. Definitely enjoyed staying here and I would stay here again. Absolutely recommend to future travelers.

Lupe and Christian’s condo was absolutely perfect for our first visit to Kauai! The place itself was very cute and tidy, and was really well-located. There were several dinner options and a super tasty coffee shop within walking distance. We loved staying in Kapa’a, and found it was a great starting point for all of our Kauai adventures. Lupe and Christian responded very quickly to our messages. I would definitely stay here again!
Absolutely loved our stay. We had such a wonderful time. Lupe’s home was so clean and the AC was ice cold!
I am very satisfied with this choice, the various travel needs in the house are perfect and great value for money.
Beautiful place and aligned with the description.

We enjoyed our stay at the Islander on the Beach. The resort is nice and clean and we love the town it is in! Lots of good eats and easy to travel around the island. Be sure to check out Wailua Drive-in!

Our short stay was extremely enjoyable! Lupe and Christian have done an amazing job at decorating and making the studio feel very homey. Lupe was helpful and quick to respond to any questions I had. We loved the area! The Coconut Market was within walking distance for restaurants, grocery, and souvenir shopping. We were able to take a kayak/hike tour with Ancient Tours right next to the property. Traveling around the island was easy from Kapaa, I just wish we had more time to see more.

Absolutely wonderful stay! Lupe and Christian were excellent communicators and wanted to make sure we felt at home and had everything we needed. The space was squeaky clean, comfortable, cheerful and was stocked with all beach stuff and kitchen supplies. The coffee shop 15 seconds away was such a nice extra touch (but the condo itself has coffee etc!). Wonderful experience! We can’t wait to come back.

Only stayed for one night, but it was a wonderful experience! The place was clean, cozy, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The host was friendly and helpful, making check-in and check-out seamless. Would definitely book again for short trips in the future.

We really loved this place. Perfect for two people. Lupe and Christian were proactive and responsive, clearly wanted us to have a good time. Lots of things available in the condo…beach towels, kitchen stuff,,beach chairs, etc.

Great space and awesome hosts! 2 min walk to the beach, dining, bike path and with boogie boards and snorkel gear- what more can one ask for? I would definitely stay here again. Very comfy beds, ac and coffee shop next door! Half kitchen was awesome.
Great location, complex is on the beach, lots of close places to eat! Most responsive hosts I’ve ever rented from!

The instructions were very clear and the place looked exactly as pictured and had all listed amenities. We did not run into any issues so we did not need to reach out to hosts, but it was because we had everything available to us. The location is perfect and we slept great each night. Book it!!!
Great host and location, I will stay again in the near future!

As described and very convenient location with restaurants/shops within walking distance. We had some maintenance issues (broken chair, broken kitchenette pipe) but the host was responsive. Host left welcome treats (fruit, nuts and chocolate) which was nice too.
Thank you Lupe and Christian for a great place to stay! It was perfect for my husband and I and our baby. Very clean and had great extras!

We had the best week at Lupe and Christian’s place. I cannot say enough about the location, just steps from the beach where we watched the sunrise most mornings, a couple hundred yards from a market place with a grocery store, a few restaurants and some shopping, and then 10 min to the airport and a short drive to great places to eat. We rented a car, had free parking and it made the experience 10x better. The hosts were very quick to respond to any questions I had, and overall provided a great air bnb experience. The space is exactly as described and it worked well for 3 ladies. Thank you for everything Lupe and Christian, you have a lovely space!

What a great location for our stay. I very much enjoyed it there. While there was some issues on checking in; due to maintenance. They did a great job helping me out and communicating with me immediately. Had a splendid time for my first time in Kauai!

Lovely place, it was perfect. We were able to watch the sunrise right on the beach. The kids enjoyed the hot tub after a long day of hiking. Highly recommended this place. Lupe and Christian were very responsive.

Lupe and Christian were incredibly accommodating. They allowed us an early check in, and then were more than welcoming for us to extend our trip due to the wildfires in Maui, when we were originally supposed to continue on our trip there. The resort itself is breathtaking, and it was a perfect place to feel like a local and take in all of the amenities surrounding us. Thanks so much!
We enjoyed our stay. We were a family of four, which was a little tight for our group with luggage but worked well for a short stay! Having the garden lanai was key!

We loved our stay! Near beautiful beaches, walking paths, market, and restaurants. We felt at home in the condo and loved the ground floor patio. Close to airport and excursions. Would stay here again!
Great location near the beach, restaurants, and stores. The host was responsive to our requests and made it easy for us to stay. Would recommend to anyone visiting the East side of the island.

Beautiful Condo located inside the Aston Islander on the beach hotel. Exactly as described and photographed. Walking distance to pool which is infront of the beach and offers a happy hour. There are a few restaurants within walking distance as well. Free parking was definitely a plus. I enjoyed my stay. Mahalo, Lupe and Christian!
Lupe was super accommodating and helpful.
Very nice ground floor unit in a resort setting. Close to shops and restaurants. Lupe and Christian are quick to answer questions.
It was very pleasant and comfortable. If I come again next time, I want to come again. There was also something to do in the interior closet, so I enjoyed the water even more. Thank you.

Lupe & Christian were very helpful and quick to reply. They provided a great place to stay and lots of great beach material and a guid book. The only note I have is to put a note in the check in about the door automatically locking behind you. Great experience overall!
It's a pretty good getaway here.The house is clean, the location is quite good, and transportation is convenient
Well located to reach all destinatins on Kauai. Very good communication with the hosts!

Excellent hub location for us to explore both ends of the island! The place had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Plenty of restaurants nearby and a store within walking distance. Lovely room, just like the pictures! Very clean and located close to many restaurants, shops, a pool and the beach! We had a wonderful stay
Well located on the island on Kauai. Chris and Lupe were available to answer any questions we had. Wonderful place!

We can recommand the apartment! The bed is comfy, nice terrace, very close to the beach, the pool, a cool coffee/breakfast place, markets/restaurants/grills (1-4 minutes away) & much more. The resort area is big, but it is calm and peaceful!
Lupe and Christian are very nice and flexible and the communication was super easy. We appreciate everything very much, thank you!

All around lovely place and host. We had a great time using the pool and walking around Coconut Marketplace right next door. We even caught an amazing sunrise one morning. We would come back again. Convenient location, close to many restaurants and things to do.
Beautiful place! felt very clean and safe. the beach was a walk away! would stay again!

Amazing location!! Lupe’s place was amazing, right by the beach & very central to a lot of places! We had a great trip & felt right at home in her place-she provided everything we needed and was very detailed in her directions. Thank you!
Had a great stay at Lupe’s! Was the perfect location and the room had all the amenities we needed! Would definitely stay again

Lupe’s place was a good location, it was nice to have a few restaurants and Coconut Market close by. The grounds and sunrises were beautiful. Two cons (we were there with our toddler) - the swimming pool isn’t for small kiddos and the beach isn’t for swimming.

Lupe was very responsive to me when I had questions and a delayed flight. She co firmed I made it in and that everything was going well. The place was clean and bright, perfect for a short stay in Kauai. I loved the large SMART TV too because it'spart of my nighttime routine to watch my old sitcoms. Lupe provided coffee and small welcone snacks. I definitely recommend staying here!
Nice place, comfortable in a nice location.

Location is the true value of this stay. Right next to the beach, great restaurants and shopping. The grounds of the resort are stunning. We were pleasantly surprised by fresh flowers in the bath room as well as a boogie board and chair in the wardrobe. Overall a very enjoyable experience!
Great place. Close to everything
Beautiful location for me and my 3 friends to stay— amazing area with plenty of shopping, pool and beach options
Great location to stay at!
Very convenient location. Room was as described and Lupe was responsive. Exactly what you’d want from a host.
Very nice!

Lupes place was amazing!!! Such a great spot and easy walk for my Dad to beach, we had a yummy brunch at lava lava on the water such a cute spot so close, coffee shop across from place was convenient too plus handicap parking :) I totally recommend Lupes place. Plus she had shower chair delivered for my Dad within the hour. Such a delight to have her thoughtful communication and service to our family. Lupe, hope to come back again! Mahalo!
Thank you Lupe for the amazing stay! Such a great spot and perfect location wise on the island to go explore around.

Lupe’s place was perfect for a last minute stay for my girlfriend and I. It was very clean and provided everything we needed for a couple of days taking it easy on the beach and around town.
The resort the private condo is on is very nice and quiet at all times. We enjoyed that it was almost directly next to the nice sandy and peaceful beach which was perfect for sunrise and sunsets. The patio at the condo was also perfect for reading or a small meal.

It was such a pleasure staying at this place! The process was extremely easy. It was an extremely clean room with all the amenities and more! Beds were very comfortable and there was a decent amount of space in the room. The best part was that it was a minute from the beach (walking distance). We ended watching sunrise every morning! Parking was easy and it was right next door to an ABC Store and a bunch of shops/restaurants. I highly recommend this place to anyone!!! A must stay and we plan on staying here again in the future!!! Thank you Lupe! We really appreciate everything!

Lupe’s place was awesome. She was always able to answer any questions we had and provided everything we needed for a comfortable stay. They unit was so close to the beach we walked down every morning. Great atmosphere next to an amazing restaurant on the beach and great coffee place. Everything you needed was right there including the market. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to stay close to the beach in a nice area.
Great little spot near the ocean, shops and restaurants. Clean and cozy vibe.
Beautiful accommodation, the beach 50 m away all amenities nearby. The apartment is just great

The stay has been fantastic, although for 4 people it stays a little small, it is clean and the location is perfect and Lupe cares about your well-being and always available.
Absolutely recommended
Great apartment and the location was perfectly near the Kapa‘a city center. The check-in was super easy and communication with Lupe was great.
Great place to explore the whole island. Loved the pool and hot tub area. Nice place outside for having breakfast/dinner.

I can only agree with the consistently positive reviews. The apartment looks like pictured. The beds are comfortable. On the terrace you can have a nice breakfast overlooking the garden.
The kitchenette is very small and has no oven or stove. A toaster, a kettle, a coffee machine, a rice cooker and a refrigerator are available on appliances.
The two large beds in the property make it pretty tight.
Communication with Lupe was great, check in and out went smoothly.
The location of the apartment is great for exploring the island.
I highly recommend to stay at Lupes appartment for a Kauai vacation!

The location could not have been better! The resort is right in the middle and close to everything. The resort beach and the restaurants within walking distance are great, you wouldn’t need to rent a car if you didn’t want to. The kitchen was small but exactly what we needed to make breakfast in the room. There were beach towels, a mat, a small umbrella and a guidebook to borrow. Loved it, we will be back!
Perfect for our stay on the island!

Perfect location right on the coast. Central point to do all things wanted on the island. Very clean, spacious and quiet condo. Beds were extremely comfortable and the amenities were abundant for any use we would have ever had.
Awesome stay, amazing location. Lupe is very responsive and helpful.

What I most loved about this stay was the location! Really nice resort area walking steps to the ocean, walking trails, restaurants, market and souvenir shops. We swam on a natural pool next to the ocean walking distance as well. We had everything there! Lupe was very communicative, reliable and very helpful. I had so many questions and she answered them all very quickly! I would definitely stay here again and I recommended 100%.
nice, clean and convenient location.

Easy to communicate with the host. Beautiful and perfect place to stay in Kauai. Near restaurants, beaches, shops…
The place was clean and perfect for our stay. I definitely book for my next time in Kauai.
Perfect place to stay for a few days in paradise. The location is great, the property was well kept and clean, no complaints here at all.

The location for this BnB couldn't have been better for us. It's easy to walk to a beach, ABC, and various restaurants (including a JoJo's shave ice :D). Since it's around the center of the east coast it's also a good location for if you have activities all around the island.
The BnB was nice and had everything we needed for a great stay in Kauai.
Everything was great and as described. Lupe was easily accessible for communication and her place had everything we needed!

Had a great stay. Location was perfect for everything we wanted to do. There is also a marketplace walking distance that had a lot of food and shops. Lupe was also super nice and responsive. Thank you!

We had a wonderful stay in Lupe's apartment in Kauai. Communication was easy and we received a lot of information before arrival, therefore, check in and check out went very smoothly. The apartment was very clean, and although the kitchen is not so big (exactly as shown on the pictures) we found everything we needed to prepare breakfast and snacks. The apartment is part of a very well kept condo with beautiful gardens and an own beach access, so it is literally 1 min away from the pool and the sea. There is a big parking lot and a small shopping center with some restaurants and a supermarket in direct vicinity. We really enjoyed our stay here and would love to come back one day :) Thank you for hosting us Lupe!
I would 100% recommend. A central location to everything! Beach, restaurants and little shops. We had a great visit and would would absolutely stay here again :)

It is a real paradise here! I recommend 100%!
Thank you,
Alex and Audrey

It was a very pleasant stay at Lupe's condo. Kapaʻa is quite nice located, in the middle of the island, so you drive as long to the one side as to the other. Also the location at the beach offered lovely views and the resort itself was very tidy as well. The condo itself was very clean, and the furniture was very descent, within the little kitchen you will find all you need if you're not feeling for having a dinner outside at a restaurant. Lupe was very responsive and very helpful if you needed her, although she is not on the island. All in all, we would choose Lupe's condo anytime again, when we return to the island of Kauai.
great location, very nice apartment, I would recommend it!

We loved staying at Lupe’s place. The room was clean and ready for us when we got there. It’s tucked behind a cute outdoor shopping center and has a great coffee shop Imura steps from the parking lot. The location was central on the island which made it convenient! Lupe was easy to communicate with and responded quickly. Beds were comfortable and hotel staff was helpful with any questions about the property. The property is on the beach so you can walk there for sunrise. Would definitely stay again.

Apartment was super beautiful, at beautiful place with a lots of shops around.
I will definitely come back!:)

We had a wonderful stay here. The location was perfect, very convenient. Close to stores and restaurants. The linen and towels were clean. They provided lots of amenities to meet our needs. Would definitely stay again.
Solid location.
Location was good and place was nice. Only issue was the mattress needs to be replaced.

We enjoyed our stay in this little house. The bed was comfortable and indoor and outdoor furniture worked well for us. That being said, there was a fair amount of traffic noise at times, and we had trouble with the TV and dishwasher controls. The local restaurants were great and we liked the short walk to the beach.

This was perfectly located on the island! It was walking distance to the beach, a market, shops, and restaurants…but it also felt super secluded bc of the landscaping. It’s an older house so some items are dated, but it’s full of charm and extremely clean. I would definitely stay there again.
Ps. It can obviously get humid/hot in the house bc of the climate, but the little ac units will freeze you out!! We left them off 90% of the time and only turned them on for a bit before bed.
Such a beautiful little place to stay and experience all of Kauai!

Wow what a beautiful cozy house to stay in. It was very clean comfortable and had absolutely everything needed.
The location is perfect. Walk to the beach, walk to great food and drinks.

My wife, 16 month old and I stayed here for a week and it was absolutely wonderful. Because of having our little one, we did rent a car (Enterprise); however, it was only about a 10 minute drive from the Lihue Airport so that was nice and convenient. The self check-in instructions were very clear and the house was easily accessible. The pictures on AirBnB accurately represent the cottage 100% and everything the host(s) provide is a plus. We found ourselves going to the Lava Lava Club a lot since it is not only beachfront but there’s a large grassy area where our daughter could run around. More friendly family places include Salt Pond Beach, Poipu Beach (West side) and Lae Nani Beach (5 minute walk). Go to Poipu Beach after sunset to watch the sea turtles come up on the sand. There’s a playground there which is also a plus. Salt Pond and Lae Nani have areas enclosed by rock so small kids can enjoy the water. Coconut marketplace has some great stores and Hukilau Lanai is a great dinner.
The place was very good. Could have had better linens, bath towels, pillows and beach towels. Otherwise-great location and quiet. Good time 🍾
We enjoyed our stay here. The rental unit met our needs and expectations. It was nice to be able to easily walk to shops, restaurants, and the beach.

This place was our haven during our few days stay in Kauai. It is clean, organized, and clutter-free. Grocery store, shops, and restaurants are of walking distance. The beach, especially, is only 5mins away. This lovely house felt like home and it had basically what we needed. We could not ask for more. Naomi communicated very well, responded quickly, and helped us a lot during our trip. We have enjoyed our stay here very much and we would definitely come back.
Location was great, easy to get to food trucks, the beach and the river!!

We stayed at this property for a few nights on our vacation to Kauai.
Pros:

-easy check-in
-decent wi-fi with smart TV for nights after long days
-marketplace close by
Cons:
-dated
-bed and pillows uncomfortable, we didn’t sleep well
-shower could use an update (even maybe just a better shower head?)
-beach chairs and umbrella were awesome to have!!!
The beach that is walkable isn’t the best for swimming however we did walk there for the sunrise a couple times. Walking distance to the local market with groceries and deli, shaved ice, bars, and restaurants.
Our stay here was just fine. However, given the price and the second half of our trip it’s much more comfortable to stay at one of the 4* local resorts just for the bed and shower alone.
Great place great location!
Great location and place to stay! Would recommend.
Nice house close to the beach and easily accessible by car. Now and then some noise on the streets you notice

It was a lovely place and nice to be about a block walk from the ocean. Everything one could need was in the cottage - extra fans, coolers, beach chairs, snorkels - and some basic kitchen supplies. I wouldn't call it quiet and peaceful but it wasn't too bad considering you were in a combination residential and commercial area. I'd stay again if I went back to Kauai. Kapa'a is a nice midway point for visiting the north and south sides of the island.
Was a cozy spot in a great area! The home was well thought out with helpful amenities (beach chair, snorkeling gear, umbrella, etc). Clean & just what we needed to cruise around the island!

Perfect size for two and a lot of privacy.
Very peaceful surroundings and a central location.

Great stay! Location is great for getting to see all sides of the island!
