The beach equipment was so nice to have, and the host even let us access it a little bit before check in, while we were killing time to check in. The cottage it self was great and just as described. And the AC works well. It felt a little private with the tress too beside the proximity to the shared unit. Overall great stay and we would probably stay here again.

A great place to stay on the east side of Kauai! Close to the beach, within walking distance to some good restaurants, and convenient for the things we planned for the first half of our stay on Kauai. We felt like we had our own little Hawaiian cottage while we were here! Would definitely recommend to others and would stay here again. ALOHA and MAHALO!
Beautiful cottage. Everything we needed is there.
Evolve was awesome. A block away from the beach and super cozy. They have every utensil and beach gear you can think of. 10/10

I had such a great experience and this property was clean, perfect location (right in middle of North and South Shores), and was so private and peaceful. It had everything we needed for a great trip and would stay here over and over again :)
A perfect location, truly felt secluded and tropical. Yet it was a quick walk from a gorgeous beach and places to eat and explore.
Beautifully decorated and peaceful bungalow. Such a zen vibe, clean, flexible and super comfortable. We totally recommend this!

We loved our stay in Kapa’a. The location was awesome, the home is comfortable and peaceful and to boot the decor is thoughtful and unique. We enjoyed the walkability to the beach and farmer’s markets on Tuesday and Thursday morning/afternoons. We felt so at home and enjoyed cooking our own meals due to the full kitchen. We can’t wait to come back and feel so fortunate to have stayed at this AirBnB. Loved it.
This was a great getaway! Amenities were top notch and the AC was a huge plus! Convenient location and would highly recommend.

great little spot for a quick getaway! Easy Uber to & from the airport. Short walks to find coffee, bars & restaurants, and beaches. Private & secluded for the times you want to spend to yourself. Definitely recommend for solo travelers and couples!
This residence was everything advertised and more. We had an excellent stay and would recommend it!
great little spot, near everything

Beautiful! This cottage was the perfect size, location, and everything. It was so close to the beach, but was tucked away in trees that made it feel cozy and completely private. The air conditioning was a major factor in the comfortability of our stay. Would recommend this place 1000%.

We were celebrating our 20th Anniversary! This place was AMAZING! We almost didn't get the dates we wanted but they opened just in time. There was nothing "bad" that stuck out with this spot. We used the extra amenities. I couldn't imagine not having A/C like other places posted. This place was extraordinary in more ways than one. Thank you and we will be back here to stay.
No problems. We were happy to be there and nice central location.

Great location, very walkable to beach, and very quite and private. a great, private alternative to the nearby timeshare type rental properties. The unit was definitely dated and not particularly clean, but was good chill vacation rental. Again, very good location.

A beautifully decorated, relaxing beach cabin. Open the windows, put on some tunes and feel the ocean breeze flow through this comfortable oasis. We were grateful for such a unique space amongst the condo complexes and hotels.
Great little place
Clean and cozy spot. The cottage is perfect for one or two people and is stocked with all the necessary tools and amenities for an enjoyable stay. The 5 min walk to the beach was the best part!
lovely and secluded but also close to everything.

Flexible check in and clean/well thought place

The home is perfect, very confortable and well situated. Very quiete.

My partner and I really enjoyed our stay here and I could definitely see my family renting the other cottage on the property too. The outdoor shower is convenient for hosing off after the beach and there’s a bbq and shaded hut/cabana(?) outside. The only part that I’m iffy about is the very expensive cleaning fee and still having to take out the trash/clean up but for us, but it seems to be common with airbnbs nowadays. Thanks for opening up this place to us! We had a lovely stay.

Loved the private stay
Great time in the comfy cottage

My one compliant would be the cleaning fee plus the check out instructions and requirements. $250 is a pretty high cleaning fee relative to other airbnbs we stayed at on Kauai that were bigger than this one. We knew about that upon booking so can’t complain. However, you pay that then have to do a decent amount of cleaning yourself upon check out (take out trash, clean dishes, strip beds, etc).
I’d still recommend this Airbnb with that caveat/warning.

This bungalow was perfect and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay in the Kapa'a area. Perfect porch, and minutes walking distance to restaurants, bars, coffee shops and the ocean with the feeling of being at home.
Fabulous all the way around 🤙

There's a binder with a lot of useful information, and they left out a welcome snack for us. There's a shopping center across the street with restaurants, boutiques, ABC Store, etc. The bed is comfy, and I didn't feel like we were missing anything.
Cons: I do feel like the cleaning fees are very high, and we definitely saw a few cockroaches, but that's pretty typical for Hawai'i. All in all, we had a really beautiful stay.
Great location, well appointed and clean. Bed was comfy and we made great use of the beach coolers and games provided. Would totally recommend this place.
Great location, right next to the beach.
Great little place. Close to shops, restaurants and the beach. We loved it! We would book again.

We loved the little bungalow. It was tucked in at the end of a street, set in the trees. It was quite rainy when we were there and we appreciated having a cozy little place to hunker down. the house is in perfect location. few minutes walk to the beach and stores and restaurants. the house was clean and welcoming. loved the welcome snacks! would definitely recommend and we will surely come back
Beautiful home! Such a sweet and relaxing stay :)

This was a great location with all the extras! The outdoor shower, washer/dryer, and outside seating area was everything we needed to wind down and recharge from our busy lives.
The book with all the thoughtful recommendations was great! When we come back, we will definitely be staying here!
Absolutely Perfect!

With our first stay in Kaua’i, Kaz made our experience as smooth and accommodating as possible. We absolutely loved this place, from the full kitchen to the outdoor balcony, and most importantly, it being minutes away from the water and local shops. 10/10 would definitely book again!

We had a wonderful stay. It was for my birthday and kaz went out of their way to leave me a bottle of champagne and wrote on a chalk board “happy birthday Lilly and welcome!” It was an awe drone trip.

Really nice and clean appartment. the Bed ist so comfortable and everything was so clean. We would love to come back. Thanks!

Amazing host with great recommendations and very responsive! Highly recommend!! :) thank you so much for your having us and providing us with amazing accommodation.

I would stay here again for sure!

Kaz was so helpful during our planning of our trip. He communicated quickly and was very helpful regarding advice of activities to do around the island. Great stay at Kaz’s place! Perfectly described! Had a very relaxing time in Kauai!

Pay attention to Kaz's directions for finding the driveway entry off the main road. The first time it snuck up on us, but once you get the hang of it, it's easy. And superbly easy access to the airport when you leave.
The only thing missing for us was a toaster. We would stay again.

Really enjoyed our stay at Kaz's place. The location is very good between the north and south shores. The condo was very comfortable and clean with an excellent usable kitchen, sitting room and bedroom.

Location was great! Walkable to Safeway, a super quiet beach (which felt private), and right between the south and north parts of island. Made exploring all of Kauai very easy! Kaz provided a super excellent list of recommendations well in advance, giving us an opportunity to make any reservations if we wanted.
Loved staying at Kaz's place! The apartment was very clean and in a convenient area. Kaz was a great host and we will definitely be back!
Great stay! All went great and really enjoyed Kaz’s place! Spacious, comfortable bed, clean, and easy to access!
The location was great. Only a few minutes from the beach. Excellent beaches in the area. Great walks along the ocean.

Great home, in a perfect location to get everywhere. Lots of nearby restaurants! Parking was a plus! Host was very flexible, friendly, and welcoming. Would definitely recommend!

We had a wonderful stay at Kaz’s place! Great location & just as described! We will be back! Great communication & recommendations!

Which was very nice. Kaz is awesome and by far the best host EVER. We are already planning our next visit and will only stay here… Kaz’s place is definitely a gem!

Perfect place to stay to check out the island! Centrally located and walkable to so many great food spots. Kaz was a great host, would highly

great location next to the beach, close to shops, absolutely everything is OK, I recommend it to everyone

Pros - great location, right on the beach, keyless entry(hate needing a key or card), mid-stay cleaning/restocking, attentive hosts

Seriously consider staying here!
A great time

I got sick the first two days there so it was nice to have somewhere to just lay down with AC and Netflix and just wait out the sickness. Allison was very communicative with everything from before we came to check out. They have lots of beach gear outside in a storage bin. Whilst we never used them it was a nice gesture all the same when visiting somewhere. overall it was a nice time!
It’s a nice spot, and if you’re looking for an ocean view and to be right on the water, it’s a good option. But there are way better places to stay around the island for the price.
We LOVED staying here! Great communication, great amenities, great location! Can’t rave enough.

We really enjoyed our stay! It’s a central location on the island and makes it easy to use as a home base to explore the north and south sides of Kauai. The patio looks out to the pool and the ocean - we enjoyed eating dinner outside each night. Allison and David provided a lot of great suggestions too. We rented bikes for the time we were there but didn’t really use them because we were out exploring each day - I would take this into consideration. The kitchen is very small but the bbq’s by the pool are great. Would definitely stay here again!

Great location. Right near a tiki bar and great food options. There’s a cafe for the mornings too. Beautiful beach with not that many people in the sand. Highly recommend taking a bike on the bike path heading north.

Wonderful location! The condo is small but functional; we stayed busy during our trip so we really only used our room for showering and sleeping, anyway. Proximity to the beach, market & shops was very convenient. The grounds are beautifully manicured and the pool/hot tub area is great. Very attentive host provides lots of recommendations and helpful information. My only criticism is that the water pressure in the shower is low so it takes forever to wash thick hair/the sand off your body. The toilet was also not working properly during our visit (talk about a bummer!) but I didn't inform the host until after because I didn't want to deal with a plumber stopping by while we were there. Overall the condo was a great homebase for a memorable trip! We will be back.

Excellent stay! Communication was prompt, yet we had no problems. The location has everything at your fingertips… easy access to shops, restaurants, beach, and pool. We especially appreciated the beach chairs, beach towels, and soft cooler to take with us. There was a free ice machine one floor down which we utilized for our beach time. The area is close to things, but it’s not noisy or too busy with people. Our vacation was wonderful! We definitely recommend staying here.

Loved the thoughtfulness and attention to detail at the condo! It had everything we needed and was the perfect stay for part of our vacation. Despite some initial hiccups, this place was super clean and comfortable. Wonderful location central to everything!

Loved the place! Location was great. Clean and thoughtfully stocked with everything we would need - umbrella, beach chairs, boogie boards , etc. Host responded to my questions quickly. Very enjoyable time spent here. Beautiful balcony views. Would highly recommend. Mahalo.

Ali was absolutely wonderful! The condo was perfect - the most scenic views of the ocean and added bonus of a pool on site. She was great with communicating the best spots and to-do’s in Kauai. Can’t wait to go back and stay there again!
Allison’s place was amazing! Great location with great views. We would definitely stay here again

This was a beautiful stay! My son and mother accompanied me and it was amazing. The views are to die for and Allison made sure the room was properly prepared and communicated very well with me the whole time- from booking until checkout. It was such a nice, beautiful room that my mom already booked it for November! I definitely recommend this for either family or couples. Thank you, Allison! Mahalo!

This place had everything we needed to make us feel relaxed and pampered during our three day stay. The unit had plenty of space for my wife and I, and everything was very clean. The kitchenette was very well stocked, and had a toaster oven in addition to the microwave and fridge. The Wi-Fi worked well. The balcony was very nice and had a good view of the ocean. The ocean was just a short walk away and provided beautiful views of the sunrise. All the little extras really added up – plush comfortable bathrobes in the bathroom, olive oil in the kitchenette, really tasty instant oatmeal for breakfast, many kinds of sunscreen, and a very well stocked first aid kit (which we fortunately did not need). If we are lucky enough to come back to Kauai, we would definitely stay here again.
This was a beautiful hotel room! Great view of the ocean and right outside the pool area. Plenty of shopping and food near by! Would definitely recommend it!

Allison and David's home is an ideal location for your vacation right on the beach of Kauai. The setting is quite and relaxing yet shops and restaurants are within a walking distance. The room is very clean and decorated with a charming honu theme. Coffee, tea, glasses, cups, and bowls, you name it, they thought of everything to make your stay comfortable. Prior to my visit they provided names of nearby restaurants/cafés so i don't have to scramble to find and some sightseeing locations and activities to explore.
Be aware of rooters in the property. They may be beautiful to look at, but I have lost the sense of time.
When I return to the island, I would stay with Allison and David's beautiful condo on the beach again.

Just finished a week at Allison's place, on the first leg of a 3-week island-hopping adventure. Allison's place was absolutely the perfect way to start the vacation, and set a high bar for others to follow. The location was perfect; the pool, hot tub, pool bar and beach were great. It's right on the bike path, and centrally located for so many activities. Allison's communication could not have been better, and she offered so many suggestions for activities and places to go and eat. She was truly an outstanding host. I can't wait to come back!
Awesome location, pool and bar

Allison’s condo is perfectly located within walking distance to a variety of restaurants & cute shops. The condo is spacious and has everything you need to relax and enjoy your time on the island.
I’m looking forward to returning to The Islander soon!
Allison’s place is absolutely perfect! The location is great within the complex and she has thought of everything to make your stay epic! Highly recommend staying there!

This was our honeymoon and stayed for 13 days. Perfect location, wonderful price for what the unit offers and what the property offers. Allison was great to work with and highly recommended her and the property.

If you are running an Airbnb or small inn their communication and support and local things to do was perfect
The room is Super clean and makes you feel like you are on vacation- all the necessities you could need and plea to of great ideas of what to do .... definitely a role model of how I want to run my little inn

Hosts were great, they had nice little touches around the unit (e.g. left us a bottle of wine for our celebration) that went a long way to us. Unfortunately we had 1 more day left on our trip and the unit was reserved (we had booked this trip last minute) for our last night so we stayed in a different unit on the same property and that one failed in comparison on many levels to this one. Would highly recommend staying here given its price point relative to the major hotels that were charging $700+ a night at the time, not overrun with tourists like the major hotel chains, it was well kept and in a great location.
Great place and great hosts. One of the great places on the east cost. If you want to stay in the middle of the north and south coasts this is the place. We’d stay here again for sure.

Great stay! Very easy checkin and we appreciated the amenities like beach chairs, boogie board, beach bag and snorkels. good location close to lots of things and sites on the island. Great communication from Allison and David!
Thx u!
Great location, easy to get around to popular food and beach locations. Beautiful scenery an overall stay was really comfortable. All neccesities are within walking distance. Highly recommend.

This was the perfect hub for our exploration of Kauai. I just wish we had a few more days so we could have taken advantage of more of the great recommendations and had more time to enjoy the local area too. To be fair, this place was nicer than what my wife and I expected. It wasn't our preferred location but in the price point, for a king size bed and a beach view (which were our requirements) - and we are so glad we chose Allison & David's place. Check in was simple, the bed was comfortable and the close by bike path and restaurants were pleasant surprises. We'd love to stay here again if ever back on Kauai.
Best location and view for a more than reasonable price

The location is absolutely perfect. We sat out on the balcony and watched the ocean waves everyday. The unit had everything we could have asked for and so many thoughtful items included. The bed was comfy and the place was very clean. We will definitely come again.

Of course, it's Kauai, but...our stay was incredible. We showed up about an hour early and we found the housekeeper getting our room ready. She let us stow our suitcases and we went out to explore the area. This was a perfect place to stay for me and my wife. The Condo is clean and comfortable, the owners made the experience as easy as could be. It is a very (I mean very) nice place to stay, just a few steps away to the beach. We enjoyed the view of the ocean from the patio every morning for about an hour as we lounged before heading out for the day. The lava lava beach club restaurant is a 2 minute walk and the place was awesome. Thank you Ali and David!

This place was really great! It was right by the beach, had a pool and hot tub and the place came with beach towels, chairs and snorkel equipment. Allison was very responsive, helpful and accommodating. It’s also located right next to a coffee shop and plenty of other shops and restaurants literally right outside of the resort property. I would recommend this place to others!

Great spot! We really enjoyed hanging at the pool and taking advantage of the happy hour at the pool bar after hitting the beach. Traffic seems like a regular occurrence on Kauai, but luckily the location makes it easy to get around, and there are a lot of things to do and places to go within 10 minutes of the condo. There are plenty or close restaurants within walking distance too. We hope to come back for a longer visit!

This place was so cute! Right on the beach, and just a very short walk to an awesome dinner spot on the beach with live music. We had a blast, the room was clean, and checkin and checkout was a breeze. Definitely want to come back again.
Great spot.

This was a steal! Great location near a bunch of local shops and a marketplace. Close to multiple beaches, views, hikes. The host was always quick to reply and had stocked the condo with extra beach gear like towels, chairs, umbrella, snorkel gear, etc. The bed was more firm which wasn't our preference but we loved the pillows. This resort is beautiful and we enjoyed watching the sunrise each morning, even on the cloudy days.
BTW highly recommend getting a car on this island if want to see the whole island. Taking the bus still required lot of walking. We ended up getting a car after a couple days and enjoyed our stay much more.

Allison’s place is a perfect getaway for your vacation of Kauai. Located a few miles south of the town of Kapaa, Allison’s place is a perfect condo for a relaxing beach day or island adventure. The Coconut marketplace a few minutes walking from the condo has everything you need in terms of shopping, dining and contains a small marketplace for anything you may need for your stay. Everything on the island is about 1-1.5 hours away (max) and many of our adventures were 5-15 minutes driving from the condo including snorkeling beach and jungle mountain hikes. Highly recommended for your stay of Kauai!
loved this perfect little gem.

This place was great. It had everything you needed! Walking distance (like 1-2min) to the pool, beach, and food/restaurants. The room was very comfortable and they provided beach chairs and beach towels and more! Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend!
Communicating with the hosts was easy and they were super responsive.
Great location. Clean & comfortable room. Close to everything you need for your stay. Outstanding communication from owner. Sunrise from the lanai worth twice the cost!
Outstanding location! Beach, pool, food, shopping, views. Probably the most magical place I’ve ever stayed. We brought our kids and they loved it!

Exceptional stay. Allison went out of her way to make our honeymoon extra special. The listing was well equipped, comfortable beds, great water pressure, and all the amenities you could need for a beach stay. The lawn chairs and boogie boards were a great surprise. The space is cozy, but absolutely perfect for two people for a couple days. We loved the property, the beach was fun — and lots of great restaurants near by. Fish Market Deli is a must stop for lunch. Thanks again. Highly recommend.
Expect a wonderful stay! The room is amazing and beautiful. Get swallowed whole by fluffy cloud like comfort. Enjoy!
Excellent location, walking distance to restaurants, bike/kayak rentals and overall great place for a R & R vacation!
Perfect location, friendly and communicative hosts, and clean. Highly recommend!

Great location near the coconut market and lava lava beach club. When we had questions, Allison consistently responded in a timely manner. We enjoyed all the amenities offered, especially the beach gear!
Great location, very close to a market, restaurants, and stores! Fantastic amenities and very clean place. Highly recommend staying here. Location is in a central area and easy to get around.

We did a last minute trip and Allison made the process very easy for us.
The place is perfect. It has all you need so you save a lot on rentals. The resort is awesome, everything is walking distance. The pool/bar is really nice and clean, we spend most of our stay there!
We were celebrating our first year anniversary and Allison added chocolates and wine for the occasion!
Wonderful host! Perfect spot in paradise! Very convenient location to food and shopping within short walk! Gorgeous Gorgeous Gorgeous!!! Can’t say enough good things!
Great location and very clean! Nice amenities at the condo.
This is a great place with all the ammentities . Location is right on the ocean . Host is very responsive and offered good ideas on hikes and dining .

Allison and Dave have an amazing place that truly is in paradise. Great location, easy key pad check in and the unit has all the things you need for your vacation. Don’t need to bring your own beach gear! Allison and Dave are easy to reach as well. The mid-trip check in to see if we needed anything was thoughtful and appreciated.

This was a great spot! The area is convenient and cute with lots of shops and restaurants to go to. Allison was great at answering questions and having advice on places to go to. I liked that they had things like boogie boards, a beach umbrella, and other beach necessities. Thank you for the welcome gifts too, the special touches added to the experience. We will be back Mahalo

Beautiful airbnb that is in a great location! Easy check-in and check-out and communication was on point! They had complimentary chocolates, and provided beach towels, snorkel gear, and beach chairs! It was so welcoming walking into the clean airbnb with flowers scattered around all the rooms!

We had an amazing experience at Allison’s condo, the resort is great and the location can’t be beat!
Nothing to do with the home, but plan extra time to get to the airport, who knew there could be such traffic on Kauai!

The entire experience could not have been any better. Everything was clean and the check in and out process was very easy. We really loved the ocean view, the pool and jacuzzi, and being right next to the coconut marketplace. I would definitely go back again!
The resort vibe was fantastic. Right on the beach, a nice pool and hot tub, and a comfortable room with all the amenities!

The condo was extremely clean, comfortable, and centrally located. We loved being able to see the ocean from the lanai and having beach chairs provided at a private beach. The surf was rough when we were there, but it was possible to swim and play in the waves. The AC was also a welcome perk since many places on the island do not have it. Also, the bed was very comfortable, which is important when traveling! Definitely recommend!

Absolutely amazing place. We had the best time! Super quick communication made it an easy and carefree stay. The air bnb had everything you needed and close by shops. The beach was so close by! We can’t recommend this spot enough!

We stayed at 3 different airbnbs for this trip and this was by far our favorite!
The location is perfect, we could walk to the market, to dinner and right down to the beach. The bed is SO COMFORTABLE and the room was extremely clean and so relaxing. Also, the little touches of flowers around the room was gorgeous. Highly recommend!
Amazing stay, communicative hosts, and beautiful room. Appreciated the additional beach gear provided.

We had an excellent time at Ali and David’s place. Some of the best customer service I have ever received from Air BNB. Ali attended to our every question and need even though we were only there for two nights. Very comfortable and complete for a small place. Centrally located. Definitely recommend staying there

This place is the best!! So close to the beach. It was so clean and Ali and David’s ocean toys were a great plus (boogie boarding and snorkeling, anyone!?) It was so clean and had so many adorable Hawaiian details. We loved it here. It is a studio so has a hotel room feel. Perfect for my husband and I! The balcony is the perfect spot to eat dinner and watch the ocean.

This is the perfect place to stay in Kauai. It was just me and my wife. The place is perfect for 2 people. There is a small refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. Place was clean and in a great location. The balcony overlooks the swimming pool and has a great view of the ocean. Within walking distance is the coconut plaza which has shopping and many different places to eat. We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back. Alison is very responsive to all texts and emails and check in was super easy. The front door has a keypad that you enter a code to get in. This was a nice feature as we didn't have to worry about keeping track of a key when going to the beach or pool. Highly recommended place to stay in Kauai!!!

Allison and David's place is AMAZING! We enjoyed two wonderful weeks in their condo, with amazing ocean views from the room, and a beautiful private beach to enjoy. Not to mention the pool and hot tub and all the outdoor/beach essentials they have to offer. Their condo had everything we needed, with all the added amenities that made our time in Kauai so fun.
We just stayed here. May/June 2021. it was very clean. Very comfortable bed and towels were like new. Excellent location. Hosts offer great communication. We would stay here again.
Great area to stay and the beach is in your backyard. Would definitely stay there again!!

We couldn't have had a better time our first time in Hawaii and we think it was because we chose to stay here!! Our favorite things: seamless checkin and checkout, all the beach equipment you could dream of!, sunsets at the beach just steps away, super easy parking, being right next to coconut marketplace and so many good restaurants, and being in such a central location and close to many great hikes and the airport. The hosts were also so kind and were helpful every step of the way. 100% would stay here again!

What an amazing place! Super easy check in, location and beach!
There is an ABC store in the village located next to the resort, a super market within walking distance, neighboring restaurants and bars, and a great little beach break great for floating… even saw turtles!!!
Will definitely be staying here again!!
Great experience! Loved staying at the condo, it was very clean, and had everything we needed for our trip. 10/10 would recommend.
The perfect place to stay in Kauai! Has everything you need and was stocked with all the beach essentials. A very comfortable bed too! Highly recommend.

What a hidden Gem!
Allison and David were the best.
So helpful and made everything seam-less.
Place was spotless and perfect.
Awesome view and great beach, just literally right in front of the pool.
Hottub was so amazing! You could hear the crashing waves. I enjoyed the BBQ area and how the restaurants and shops were just next door.
Best part was the location!!
So close to the kayaking on Wailea falls and all the cool areas on island, plus it was less than 10 minutes from the airport.
I plan on coming back every year now and bringing my friends.
Best value on the island!

Five words: screaming crying baby next door. Would not wish this on anyone. Got it twice in a row at 5:30a and 6a, lasted for hours and kind of threw me off. It's right where the bed is too. Then there was weird loud stomping the first few nights, right after my long flight when I was trying to chill.
And it's Hard to find coming from the airport. The buildings aren't labelled which doesn't help either. Called Kaz but no answer, luckily the cleaning lady was able to help lol. Then the code in my itinerary was wrong. Pretty unclear and frustrating experience overall.
Great location
Love the ceiling fans
Bed is not very comfy
Only 4 towels for 6 nights, really?
Kauai Shores is right down the street, is cheaper and is an actual hotel. I'd stay there if I were you.

I had a very stressful stay in this unit. I would recommend staying at this resort (Aston Islander on the Beach) in a different condo if you can live with a few problems.
As to the resort, there are 3 things I had to overcome. First, is the roosters. They crow loudly and you can hear it well even on the second floor). I know lots of people are bothered by that because I googled Aston Islander on the Beach TripAdvisor. Lots of people mentioned it. I’m a pretty heavy sleeper so I just downloaded a sleep app that plays ocean waves. That was good enough to drown out the sounds for me. Second, there is currently construction on the road coming out of the resort complex that is an issue. During the day the traffic backs up really bad and some people might have a problem turning left (lots of things are to your left). At night, after a luau that was 7 minutes away, it took 40 minutes to get back home. The third thing was construction on the sidewalk in front of the pool/spa/bar area. The construction noise was so loud some people might not enjoy that area. They just started that construction the day before my last day.
Having said that, I really loved the location. The grounds are BEAUTIFUL. There are restaurant options within an easy walk. I especially loved the Lava Lava Club next door. There is also a small grocery store that is within an easy walking distance. There is also some shopping within an easy walking distance. It is only 10 minutes from the airport and right on the beach. It’s so nice to be centrally located on the island as well.
I loved the unit itself as well. There is quite a bit of essentials packed into an efficiency and most of the items are in good shape.
The tough part of my stay was with the owner. I’ve only had good things to say about other Airbnb and VRBO stays. He either entered the condo without telling me in violation of Airbnb policy or he didn’t and lied about doing it. I have sent screenshots of our conversations to Airbnb in the hopes they will let him know if he does it again he will be banned from the site.
The reason the owner did it was because of a problem with the lock. Jilian, his property manager, told me other people had problems with the lock as well. He kept blaming the problems on user error, but I sent videos proving otherwise. It’s either a defective lock or the batteries were bad. (I have a similar lock). After no one would commit to coming out and fixing it, I was messaged that the batteries were changed. The batteries can only be changed from the inside.
When I confronted David, the owner, about entering my unit, he then said he didn’t. He only tested the lock. I don’t know which time he was lying, but, either way, I would not stay in this unit again.
One other issue is the code on the lock. It’s super easy to remember and guess. Based on a message from Jilian telling me to enter a second code, I know there are two super easy codes to guess. I can’t prove it, but I believe that he’s not changing the codes between visits. That is like giving a guest a physical copy of the key and letting them keep it so a previous guest can re-enter the unit and sexually assault or rob you.
I hesitated in posting this, even though I was lied to at a minimum, but I don’t want this to happen to anyone else. By posting about it, I’m hoping the owner will be shamed into doing the right things going forward.
